name: Boom Bots
description: Where the Build-A-Bot art support team hangs their helmets.
landmark: Black Flag with Large White lettering, B-A-B

name: I'm OK, You're OK Corral
description: Wanted!  Put yer dusty boots on and giddyup on down to the OK Saloon to wet yer whistle.  We are servin' up cold drinks, trash talkin' and more! Daily stick horse races, darts, Jenga, horseshoes and cornhole too.  Bring yer own glass and your ID.  21+
landmark: OK Saloon 30 x 30 - our camp is behind it.

name: Camera Obscura Tribe
description: Camera Obscura Tribe Camp (COT Camp) is an invitation to the world of photography: from inreaching visual experience to technical support and guidance. Entering through the mirror/bead curtain of the camera-shaped gate, you will find yourself inside the giant Softbox with a Photoshoot Corner, photo accessories and advice readily available.
landmark: Big 7 ft gate shape like Photographic Camera

name: Warp Zone: Sauna Edition
description: Warp Zone is back and hotter than ever!!!
landmark: Big Purple Sauna

name: Rumor Mill
description: Prototopia gives you a space to come think, express, and communicate as humans with humans, while exploring what that means in the context of technology and artificial intelligence. Come share your ideas and stories of how to create a real-life utopia, sit down for a coffee date and connect with a perfect stranger, learn the 10 Burning Man Principles by interacting with our robot companions, or simply join us for our nightly gratitude circles.
landmark: wooden tree and the glowing wooden sun behind it.

name: Jail of Hedone
description:
The 3rd Alternative camp mindset is perfectly aligned with the 10 Principles of Burning Man, by adopting the 4 paradigms to 3rd Alternative thinking; I see myself, I see you, I seek you out and I synergize with you.  We practice self-awareness and value the different viewpoint that others represent; we seek to understand that viewpoint thoroughly and find synergy – you and I together are far greater than we are alone.  

Our camp features live music every night, by Daring Greatly. Their goal is to continuously share the message of being fearless, free and vulnerable – to 'step inside the ring' and to dare greatly.  Their philosophy is to remain relevant, connected and creative. The 5-piece group gathers heavy influence from the 60's & 70's classic rock era – offering a contrastive music alternative to the Burning Man community.
landmark: a 20X20 Stage with "3rd alternative camp" sign

name: ICU:  Impromtu Crafters Union
description: Black Rock City's source for alternative medicine. We play doctor!
landmark: Faux western style general store facade on 8:30Ave

name: The Dusty Nuts Tavern
description: Come join us at the Dusty Nuts Tavern, meet interesting people and enjoy improvised drinks.  Open daily from whenever our hangovers wear off to dinner-time-ish.
landmark: Plywood Bar with "Dusty Nuts Tavern" spray-painted

name: Unfolding Humanity Art Support
description: Unfolding Humanity Art Support Camp provides a space for the creators and builders of our art installation to live, relax, and rejuvenate. Stop by for a drink of ice cold water, get to know us, and find out more about the inception of our art project and what it took to build it!
landmark: illuminated pentagonal Unfolding Humanity sign

name: 7 Sins Lounge
description:
Come Embrace the Heat as the Playa's Friendliest Little Slice of Hell returns for the 18th straight year!

Daytime brings what Sinners need - shade, chill music and slushy drinks. But NIGHT brings what Sinners want - Flaming Libations and the ever popular WHEEL of SINS! Our highly skilled and dedicated staff will happily deliver absolution & encouragement with a FIRM hand!

So come earn your "Get Out of HELL Free" card and remember:
Start your SINS at 7!
landmark: Giant red 7 out front

name: Chronomorphic
description: We are an art support camp for the Pan Genius project, ya know, the giant robot cymbal-banging monkey. We also brought a Lego bar. Come on by if you'd like to meet us, play with our Legos, have a tasty beverage, and talk about percussion-playing cybernetic simians.
landmark: Pan Genius sign, blue scaffold

name: Tickled Mink
description: At Tickled Mink  (... where everyone's a star!)  we are here to help zhuzh you at our Hollywood minkup mirror vanity before you start channeling your inner diva. If you don't know how, we'll teach you to smeyes like a mink, so once you sink into our fuzzy, plush, cerulean photo throne  ("... it's not just blue, it's not turquoise, it's not lapis, it's actually cerulean …")  you'll be oh so ready to strike a picture perfect pose as your cover page photo shoot begins. You've never looked more minktacular!
landmark: cerulean banner poles around a white covered dome

name: Journeys Hangover Remedies
description:
Journeys is where your spirit and mind come into divine convergence through love.  Stop off the chaotic road and get refreshed with vision, hope and dreams. Come sign up for our creative photography class to capture your spiritual journey through the eyes of a lense.  Bring your CAMERA and learn to SEE WITH NEW EYES, Releasing your Vision, your Creativity and your Truth! Learn some keys to reveal your authentic perspective, capture your message of visual inspiration, and tell your heartfelt stories. 
 We offer:
Spiritual expression of who you are, true self,
Spiritual readings to empower your journey, healing into hope
Bring in the light, inner grounding, soul filling, releasing negativity, 
Healing sessions available spiritual guides and guided group meditations with drums and singing bowls.  

Or just come hang out in our tent with misting system!
landmark: Large Journeys banner

name: Camp Shutterbuggy
description: Stop by Camp Shutterbuggy every night from 8-10 for Snappy Hour. Have a cocktail and get a souvenir photo from our mobile photo booth, the Shutterbuggy. It's great fun for all ages. Look for us on the playa, too!
landmark: Canadian Flags

name: WHAT THE PIC?
description: Cotton Candy Camp serves up delicious, fluffy cotton candy cones in a multiple of flavors, all of them sweet, every day during the event starting Tuesday.
landmark: Red Block Letters:  Cotton Candy Camp

name: pandemonium
description: we are pandemonium  ..where chaos becomes joy. where pain becomes pleasure
landmark: 2 pyramids and the white rabbit art car

name: Leopard Martini Lounge
description: Leopard Martini Lounge, Palo Alto, CA, US
landmark: Camp with dome in front & lots of white camo nets

name: Martini Village
description: Martini Village offers cold martini's, fun cocktails, entertainment and much more!  Look us up for our daily scheduled events or just stop by and check out a random happy hour.  Be prepared to be immersed in the 10 principles of the playa.
landmark: Yellow tent, Martini Glass on top N bright red bar

name: Gallavant
description: Ahoy from the Pirates of the Playa (infamous creators of the Mutant Vehicle USS Nevada)…look for us "Gallavanting" around the playa spreading fun and adventure and hop a ride with us! !   Our mighty USS Nevada will be doing 2+ tours around playa daily from our home port so come visit us, enjoy our signature grogs concocted with our homemade distilled rum in an awesome full-fledged pirate bar, The ArrghBar. pARTicipate in our 2+ daily theme parties 10am and 2pm, come get your drink on, play games, get flogged and then relax in our Pirates Den – an amazing chill space with couches and tables visit our Wayward Wenches Bazaar because we got what you forgot and a Pirate Fueling Station complete with water spritzes, protein drinks and icy otter pops … Come Party with us – it will be a sure adventure .. All our events ARRRGH listed in the WWW guide.
landmark: Light House,  30x30' tent & green canvas army tent

name: Lotus Ranch
description: I don't think we're in Texas anymore.
landmark: Our big camp sign and look for BOB our camp mascot

name: Fire Conclave Convergence
description: Fire Conclave Convergence is the place for all members of fire groups, ambiant drummers, and processional performing in the Great Circle to check in and get the latest information.
landmark: 6:00 Keyhole art project

name: DeMentha
description: Come join in the minty fun at DeMentha. You'll find music from out DJ line-up, enthusiastically prepared fresh mojitos, aromatherapy, ample shade and plenty of cooling mist. Combined with a hearty welcome you've got the perfect recipe for a awesome time. 1-6pm daily.
landmark: DeMentha corner sign, scaffold and PC47 container

name: Hang-Out, the
description: The hammock is an ancient technology: simple and perfect. Tension, elevation, motion. Harmony between ground and air. A dusty burrito drifting through the continuum.  A great place to take a nap. Come ye unto the Hang Out.
landmark: 27 mast; large tan shade sails; and 24 hammocks.

name: Black Rock Socks
description: Our camp can easily be spotted by the pirate ship / ocean RV
landmark: Large RV painted as a pirate ship / ocean

name: Dusty Christmas
description: Camp Inevitable brings you the Heart of Reflection and Moroccan Lounge. A place for relaxation, personal introspection, a romantic meander, an engagement, or wedding.
landmark: Giant Red Heart on the ground.

name: Under the Bridge Collective
description: Neighbourhood bar and eternal well of Turbo Juice
landmark: TURBO BAR sign painted on a white bar

name: Circle J Inconvenience Store
description:
Did you forget your shampoo, deodorant and other hygiene products at home and you're now stuck with the natural scent of 'get out of my tent, you smell'?  Have you just crossed the sun-beaten playa, leaving you with the desperate need to refuel with a light snack or carbonated drink? 

Well you're in luck! The playa does provide with a can do, fuck you attitude. Stop by Circle J™ for an irresponsible selection of products designed to make you feel like you're back in corporate America. With our location inconveniently located not near you, we're waiting to serve you with a frown that will turn your day upside down.

Sorry, we're open!
landmark: large Circle J flag and sign.

name: Lamplighters
description: Lamplighters, longest running project on the Playa. Come over everyday at 5pm to help light OUR city!
landmark: Lamplighter signs and shade behind Centercamp

name: Lamplighter Lounge
description: Help us light OUR city! Every day at 5pm, join us in our procession and help light our City! Lighting the city without fail since 1993!
landmark: 2 Large black shade just behind Center camp

name: Be There Now
description:
Be There Now presents The Glitch Arcade. A series of Maker projects you can play with in the shade or enjoy with a cocktail at night. Featuring music making toys and table top robot fights.

We also have a projection dome you can just chill in.
landmark: Projection Dome next to animated LED lights

name: Creation Nation BRC
description: Creation Nation BRC! is bringing craftiness back to the playa. We host 2-3 sessions each day Mon-Sat, where you can learn a New Skill or Crafting/Making.  We supply and give all the materials, and burners leave with the keepsake they made. Check out the Creation Nation BRC! facebook page to see the schedule of classes, workshops and more!
landmark: colorful sandwich board of events

name: Sakenoma
description: Sakenoma, come wet your whistle at the Playa longest standing Sake Bar!!
landmark: Sakenoma sign out front at our bar area

name: The Shire
description: Come celebrate your inner child in the Shire, a playground of giant games and frisky, hairy-footed friends. Take flight on the Merry-&-Pippin-Go-Round or brave the 4-story climb to the flaming peak of Isengard.
landmark: fiery Eye of Sauron atop a 4-story scaffold tower

name: Camp Not For Prophets
description: Camp Not For Prophets--Where we serve the hottest holes on the playa,sd  freshly made Donut holes to get your morning started with a hot hole.
landmark: the Camp Not For Prophets sign at the road edge

name: Snake Farm
landmark: Green dome shade structure w/ Snake Farm flag

name: Le Kafé
description: Warm.  Loving.  Sexy.  Coffee.  Home.  Le Kafé seeks to be one of coziest landing spots on playa at any hour.  By morning we perform a thriving café, and after that, a welcoming lounge open to all at all hours.
landmark: Large Le Kafe sign in front of camp

name: Beijing Burners Armor Camp
description: In the tradition of our Mongolian ancestors that ruled China for almost 100 years, we welcome Burners to visit us and engage in a fun game of Archery, rest in our traditional Mongolian yurt afterwards, enjoy Mongolian milk tea, cheese and the hard spirit that Genghis Khan's troops once drank. For Burners that prefer to be active in the evening, come for a workshop of the traditional Chinese martial art Bajiquan with our artist Lu Ming.
landmark: 20m tall full metal Mongolian armor

name: Desperados
description: A hitching post for forlorn outlaws and seductive renegades. Begun in 2011 with a dollar and a dream and a bunch of stuff we found at the dump, Desperados has blossomed / decayed into an opulent shantytown, a depraved palace full of freaky desert creatures. Come by, take a load off, have a drink, duel someone, exchange bodily fluids! Lie to yourself about who you are as a person, and make those lies come true!
landmark: Desperados sign, giant covered wagon

name: Contraptionists
description:
Contraptionists Afternoon Snowcone and Fire Fries, from 1 until 3 each afternoon, Monday through Saturday, or as ice lasts. Kids to the front.
    Guests who wish to power our human powered shaving bike may do so, so we may split the crystallized H2O into a fine feathery powder of flakes ready to fully accept the flavors of Our choice, and encapsulate them into the jewel colored crystals that are so desired by the weary travelers visiting our humble establishment and which we know you will very much enjoy.

The FireFry experience brings to life the long forgotten art of the "julienne the pommes frites". Our carefully curated stock of individually picked potatoes makes for a subtle yet palatable snack in the early afternoon hours. Complimented with homemade spices and a homemade tomato and vinegar sauce recipe. Bring a beret, cook us a souffle and enjoy our pommes homemade. 
Check out the art and events schedule for more Contraptionists activities.
Don't bring a cup.
landmark: day, 40 foot white tower, night colored by lights

name: Camp Hot Cheeks
hometown: San Francisco, Los Angeles, New York, Kapaa, Taipei, Kitty Hawk, Wilmington
description: Body Painting, Portrait Studio, Daily Kava, Blended Ice Drinks, and music invite you in to chill with awesome people from around the world.
landmark: Hawaiian Flag

name: Black Rock City Tea Company
description: Bring your broken robots to the Robot Repair and Tea Shop. Enjoy a cup of fine tea during the day or an alcoholic libation at night (21+ only) while we inspect and repair your robot.
landmark: a 16x10 color facade featuring images of robots

name: Camp Scone Fucker
description:
Camp Scone Fucker
Come spin the Wheel of Scones and enjoy some refreshing iced tea
landmark: Giant Scone at the entrance

name: Bait Shack
description: We are a group of salty sea dogs that want to help YOU catch what you NEED!  Please stop by and tell us about the biggest whopper you ever caught.  "IT WAS THIIIIIIIS BIG!"
landmark: Lit Bait Shack Sign and Floral Stop Sign

name: Black Rock Gladiators
description: Quench your bloodthirst with consensual combat at Black Rock Gladiators - a Rage Space for People with Safe Issues.™ Now with 300% more glam.
landmark: Giant wooden sword mounted on tall spike racks

name: Genital Portrait Studio
description: Genital Portrait Studio, the playa's premier genital photography studio since 2000, celebrates genitalia as glorious and beautiful. A body positive and consensual space, we are welcoming to all genders and we invite you to capture your most intimate side in a keepsake laminated ID badge.
landmark: 12 ft Corner Coral Reef Facade, Orange Sea Dragon

name: Twisted Swan Celtic pub
description:
TheTwisted Swan, the new incarnation of the Dusty Swan, a full service celtic pub with a bar, pull tap, whiskey, irish coffee, live music sessions, and a good old fashioned pub feel in BRC! 
Come each night we have a theme to suite your geek needs along with our friendly pub feel.  If nothing else for a respite from your woes and a pint.
landmark: Blue pub facade with a standard red door.

name: #My last burn
description: Slavic people come together over HERE
landmark: The 3D hologram with the height of 12 meters

name: Battle Born Burners
description:
Battle Born Burner Bar - Friendliest Bar on The Playa!  Come by for a little Nevadatude! Beat the heat with one of our Frozen Frosty Fruity Beverages! Monday is Mimosa Monday @ 10:00 Mimosa's till they run out.  
Wednesday @ 2:00 is Top Shelf Shot Party. Get your choice of top of the line booze and Keep the Souvenir Battle Born Burner Shot Glass!  
We also have Giant Beer Pong and Giant Jinga - Come Play with Us!
landmark: Battle Born Burner Flag on front of bar structure

name: Chromania
description: Chromania is the ancestral home and art-support camp of the Chromaforms Collective, creators of the infamous jumbo JACK, the ZOA, Cosmic Voyager, and RE-CYCLONE.
landmark: Glowing star at the top of a tall pole.

name: CounterCulture
description: Counter Culture is the work support camp for Black Rock City Census, so the majority of campers will be dedicated BRC Census volunteers. Visitors to Counter Culture will find friendly faces plus information about our volunteer team so we can help to educate Burners about Black Rock City Census and what we do.
landmark: Pink Census logos and the A-frame camper trailer

name: Kamp Suckie Fuckaye
description: Kamp Suckie Fuckaye- A home for socially awkward circus artists of all varieties! You should probably talk to us first, otherwise we'll just sit in corner and play with the cat.
landmark: Tall red Suck N' Fuck sign

name: Burners without Boundaries
landmark: 20 foot dome made of wood

name: Synapse Conduit
description: the Synapse Conduit camp is a fun and casual place to have a drink, soak your tired feet and get to know your neighbors. We love to play games, engage in conversation, and have fun with the primary goal of interacting with our visitors.  We offer Tarot card reading, fortune telling, giant bubbles, giant Jenga and other silly activities to engage one another. We invite you to come hang out with us!   And if you are in need of support we have trained campmates to help deal with difficult situations
landmark: 7 foot tall "Synapse Man" in front of bar

name: Stretch a nymph (SAN)
landmark: flag with ballerina

name: Chalice in Wonderland
description: Chalice in Wonderland - Home of the Maddest Tea Parties on the Playa
landmark: The long tea table and the giant chalice sign

name: ONE TRIBE
description:
We R 1 TRIBE!
Our foundation is a shared vision of inclusion and unconditional acceptance. Join us for one of our many connecting workshops and/or experiences happening all week or come sit by our fire at night. We have 2 sacred tipi spaces you are invited to experience 24/7. We have an new this year all womans space honoring the connection of women and igniting sisterhood. Every morning you are invited to join us for tea, music and connection as we start our day rising with the sun. During the man burn we are hosting a womans cacao and dance journey; White Warrior Rising.
One Tribe is an international camp (20 countries in 2017). Our intention is to be your home on the Play and everyone is welcome
landmark: big tipis with flags

name: Cereal Thrillers
description:
We are the Cereal Thrillers
We serve that sugary breakfast cereal your Mom would not let you have as a kid.
landmark: "CEREAL THRILLERS" sign in front of kiosk

name: Mary E's Lavender Hand Wash
description:
Plays Well With Others: Provides lavender hand washing and hand pampering Tuesday through Saturday from 11:00AM to 5:00PM.
We will be having a Dance Party USA on Friday night from 6:00 to ?
landmark: large dream catcher in front and camp sign

name: Triangulum Ki
description: Scutum Sie art support camp.
landmark: Pitchforks, bones, chains, adorable stuffed things

name: Decadent Oasis
description: A glowing multicolored oasis in the dark of night, a windswept grove of white palm trees by day--our magical oasis and sheltered lounge welcome you to dance, play, perform, and chill. Hula hoops, DJ's, dance parties, and friendly folks all around--in an eco-conscious camp made from mostly reclaimed/reused materials. Stop by for a warm welcome!
landmark: grove of glowing palm trees & cozy public lounge.

name: Hoh
description: The Pacific Northwest is a great place to be with beautiful forests, grey skies and bitter over priced coffee. We want to share our home with you. Our camp will offer the soothing grey skies and perpetual misting rain of a typical Washington day. For those people that aren't used to endless sun and beautiful blue skies we have what you need. Overdosing on Vitamin D? Come sit under our gloomy grey skies and moop free rain forest and detox awhile.
landmark: Giant eyeball on each Westfalia

name: Electric Giraffe Safari Park IV
description: Come and see a whole safari park of wooden animal obelisks, lovely night time lighting effects, and the big robot beast, The Electric Giraffe!
landmark: wooden animal obelisks.

name: P³ Oasis
landmark: Two story wooden structure with green shade cloth.

name: Happy Hour
description: Hard day on the playa? Unwind at Happy Hour, where you'll be greeted by one of a kind refreshing spirits served with smiles! Enjoy our lounge, bar, and dance floor!  Start your day with Happy Hour!
landmark: Semi Circle Bar

name: Gypsy Witch Camp
description: Virgin burners and lone travelers are welcome. Please come and share our games and then homemade salsa and witches brew, or juice, on Wed and Sat!
landmark: 2 Big signs that say Gypsy Witch Camp

name: Playa Penthouse
description: Come enjoy a view over the Playa, from our viewing tower. Start your day with the first peek of sunrise and enjoy the most glorious sunsets this earth produces, from high above the Playa floor. Come relax out of the sun during the heat of the day, in our interior chill space.
landmark: Shade structure day and Chinese lanterns at night

name: Dusty Mule Saloon and Playground
description: Dusty Mule Saloon and Playground - Mules, Mimosas, iced tea, playground games, shade and a space for whatever -ation you may have. Come shake you dusty booty with jackasses each day.
landmark: 30ft Dome, 10 ft dome and playground in between

name: The Living Room
description: Did you forget to bring your living room to the burn? Don't worry, you can use ours! We have comfy spots to chill out, relax, and/or socialize. Join us in the morning for yoga, the afternoon for a radically inclusive musical jam sesh, or anytime you're looking for a place to hang out, day or night!
landmark: white dome with green lights and a flag on top.

name: Perky Parts
description: We Can't Pace Ourselves
landmark: Mannequins

name: Mountain Mayhem
description: Colorado meets the desert.  You meet fun.
landmark: Ski fencing and Mountain Mayhem flag

name: Northwest Mist
description: Northwest Mist provides a soothing northwest atmosphere to escape the heat with misting and quiet music.  Step though the tent doors for a refreshing and friendly encounter.
landmark: Red/white striped tent with flags on the sign

name: Sharks and S'mores
description: Sharks and S'mores - Be attacked by a shark(alcohol) and have some s'mores.  Sign where you are from, and what brought you to Burning Man.
landmark: A large flag of a gecko.

name: El Station BRC
description: We take out the remote controlled porta potty and we a Portable Pizza Party art car.
landmark: 2 large 2'x8' illuminated PORTA PARTY signs

name: Orgy Bus Camp
description: Orgy Bus Camp provides a safe and clean space for consensual adult activities on the playa.
landmark: Large Kissing Booth and the Purple RV.

name: Mobility Camp
description: Mobility Camp provides a wheelchair friendly Camp, and services and education to the Mobility Impaired and information and Education to those who want to be more accessible.
landmark: Rising Sun  Made of painted Crutches .

name: WayLate
description:
WayLate - come join us when you are late for whatever you were supposed to do...as you should in BRC!  
great music, chill place, slackline, great drinks, massages, face paintings, who knows...we are way late, like you!
landmark: Dome with the Unicorn on top!

name: Dare to be Rare
description: Dare to be Rare is a meat-inspired day camp. We love our meat, especially on the playa. We run events all week so stop by early to get the inside scope. Take your meat like good little boy's & girl's. Confess your sins at the Meat Alter or try your luck at our Glory Glory Hallelujah Hole. Dont forget to get tanked at Tanked Twister or Truth or Dare Jenga. Check out our board for other fun events all week.
landmark: Look for Dare Sandwich board and nighttime strobe

name: Infinite Community
description: Infinite Community Loves You! Come visit our immersive experience on playa or say to the support crew in our camp.
landmark: CA 20ft covered wagon

name: Flat Tire Cafe
hometown: San Francisco and New York primarily, though we have campers from Los Angeles and a couple other cities as well. But our primary group is in San Francisco, New York, and Los Angeles.
description: Come get your bike fixed while you have some cold brew iced coffee or tea 10AM to 2PM Mon through Sat, and play some games in our activity lounge! Bring your cup! Join us for one of our acculturation, LNT, or other workshops, game tournaments, yoga classes, or Open Mic days! We provide a community space for events, conversations, and games, and we host multiple events throughout the burn. Come on in out of the dusty day and enjoy our shade, we love having lively conversations, impromptu workshops, and hosting events (planned or not!).
landmark: Large Purple Octopus Cafe Sign on front scaffold

name: Nothing Butt Art
description:
Nothing Butt Art
We supply the canvas and paint, you supply the cheeks or any other body part, together, we will create nothing butt art! Complimentary T-shirts provided to participants. We also feature body stamp temporary tattoos . Stop by, make some art and get a tramp stamp.

Additional Activities:
Sunset Journey Home Table. Share your journey "Home" while enjoying an ice cold IPA. Our bar table has become a focal point for all to express themselves with marking pens, paint, pictures or gifting their stories for all who visit the camp. We found each person had a unique and fascinating story of their journey to the Playa (home) whether it was their tenth or first time.  We found these opportunities to express and share their journey's Home were fun, spiritual and often emotional.

The Music Box. What do you get when you cross a box full of second hand instruments and a Playa populated with wayward musicians?  A spontaneous magical, musical jam session! Come by and join in this event.
landmark: Hanging Flags  with Butt and Breast prints

name: Cotton Candy Vibes
description: Perform for your chance to slurp our hot wet noodles. This is your chance to show off your under-appreciated talents on our custom built stage for a spaghetti dinner!
landmark: red and yellow banners flowing in the witnd

name: Rancho Arroyo Adobe
description: Rancho Arroyo Adobe- A Geo Camp for Burners interesting in discussing and learning about taking part in environmental sustainability projects, biohabitat restoration, sustainable construction techniques, renewable energy use, water conservation, and promoting the use of bicycles as transportation.
landmark: Big Blue-Green Ball Float above the RVs

name: Double Helix
description: This is the Art Support Camp for the Cosmic Stellarator Installation.
landmark: black Cosmic Connection Flag

name: Sunset Lounge
landmark: The big Arch and green lasers

name: Grateful Floyd
description: Grateful Floyd is a camp dedicated to good music, cold draft IPA, and volunteering with a variety of BM departments to support BRC. We welcome all to come hang out with us.
landmark: Grateful Floyd sign on the corner of our space

name: Red Herring
description: "The Red Herring: the dilapidated and sumptuous salon of an eccentric aristocrat. A special place where special things happen..."
landmark: Red door with long tunnel leading into bldg.

name: Big Puffy Yellow
hometown: Charlotte, Philly, Asheville, Chicago, LA, SF, NYC, New Orleans and more...
description: What began as a Burning Man Theme Camp in 1999 has grown into a collective of burners, artists, DJs, performers and general badasses who love all things Big, Puffy and Yellow! We are very happy to have Philadelphia-based Camp Phuck It joining us this year. They are brining their stoops and energy you'd expect from the East Coast events they contribute to.
landmark: Yellow flags, Stoops, Ice Cream Truck

name: Pretentious Fox
description: A very international and inter-state gathering of pretentious foxes and other eclectic and venerable animals! We provide an essential neighborhood BAR with good MUSIC, a giant SWINGSET, and several EVENTS including Bloody Mary Brunch!
landmark: 20 foot shaded tent with lit pendant on top

name: Raised by Wolves
description:
A real wolf pack is primarily composed of brothers and sisters. We're not related, or wolves, but we do yell at the moon a lot. Raised by Wolves is a community of artists and doers who gather together in the desert to create epic fun, howl at the moon together and invite everyone in to share our space and run with the wolves. 

We serve iced cold brew coffee every morning, have the playa's most banging hip-hop/reggae dance party—complete with Dark 'n Stormys—and lots of opportunities to move your body in our dome.
landmark: Wolf head LED beacon atop our pyramid-shaped dome.

name: Dr.Baron von Realz, Esq. Sideshow
description:
Burning man will be here before you know it and "Dr. Baron von Realz Esq. most spectacular Steampunk Sideshow of altered reality and debauchery" is back! Our circus of freaks will be up to our shenanigans again.  Flaming girls, tattoos, body modifications, piercings, carnies, performers, suicide girls, freaks, geeks and other oddities are welcome.
  
Our mantra is "Participants become the art and the art is Participation". If you have ideas for the camp or an event we are all ears. We gift multiple events to the community including aerial acrobats, a fat Tuesday party, game shows, charka clearing, Body painting ect... 
 
We are a group of 18 to 40 year olds from all across the world and thrive on meeting new people from different cultures and we love virgins burners yum.

Peace
Dr. Baron von Realz esq. 
)'(
 "More magic less bullshit"
- Dr. Baron von Realz Esq
landmark: 30 foot dome with camo parachute cover

name: Camp BYUS
description: A place to park your bike and chill while meeting new friends, listening to great music, and maybe finding all the answers to questions you didn't even know you had!
landmark: 20x20 shade structure, Camp Byus hanging sign

name: SPIN ART CAMP
description:
SPIN ART CAMP - Come and make your own art-work. Create designs with our paint and a 4-foot Spin Art Machine! Bring a T-shirt or article of clothing to 
spin ! Lets experiment with colors !!!
landmark: Spin Art Sign and colorful flags around perimeter.

name: Whiskey and Dust
description: We are a Whiskey camp with a small habitual yoga problem.Our concept is simple. Capitalize on what the Burning Man community desires more of (Yoga, Lyra performances, Juggling, and Hooping). At the same time, be challenging and creative to show the community something; anything that is new and different.
landmark: 3 cute houses in front

name: Camp D^5
description: Camp D5 - Dusty Dirt Dogs Dining at Dusk, This is your obedience destination.  Enjoy dogs nightly from evening until dusk and participate  in obedience training.  Visit the Dog Park OTC and get your fastest obstacle times noted on our prominently displayed leader board.
landmark: High rotating sign with lighted D5 in 5ft letters

name: Grand SnakeOil Exhibitionist Soc.
description: A society of the Grandest of gentleman, carpetbaggers, confidence men, hustlers, swindlers and the greatest of all deceivers dedicated to the art and craft of snake oil salesmanship. During the day we offer a "safe space" for those who would like to practice their craft . Once a day we hold our competition. Dressed in their finest of garb, contestants bring their elixirs to exhibit, share and enchant with their tall tales and wild promises. (Signup at our booth and see "happenings" or our camp board for the content requirements for the day)
landmark: bleachers in a semi circle facing the street

name: Cantina Vida
description: Cantina Vida- Creating hand crafted cocktails one cup at a time.
landmark: Orange and white camp flag on a 25' flag pole

name: Aquapuss
landmark: Giant trampoline

name: Flamingo Camp
description: Walk among the flock... The Flamingo camp welcomes you!
landmark: 400 plastic pink flamingoes

name: Miki Beach
description: Miki Beach is your place to find an oasis in the desert.  With beach, breezy vibes that combine Miami and Cuban flavors with a dash of NYC eccentricity, our goal is to welcome you in from the playa, provide luscious amounts of amazing house music, sensual delights, and the warmest, most welcoming vibes possible.
landmark: Neon-lit MIKI BEACH sign on a 12-foot wooden tower

name: Cheshire Alley
hometown: Denver, Minneapolis, Montreal, San Jose, Akumal
description:
There's a lot going on at Cheshire Alley. Join us!

Come play Flamingo Croquet every afternoon into the evening. No headlamps required as the course lights up when the sun sets. 

And, when the sun sets we also have black light face painting. You can paint yourself, but, where's the fun in that? It's more entertaining to paint others or have new friends decorate you!

Our hosts at the "Last Restaurant in the Universe" and the "Round About Bar" are on hand serving amazing drinks and snacks.
landmark: Large Cheshire Cat in Tree

name: Adult Novelty Shoppe
landmark: Large Gnome and Camp Sign

name: Cingulata Camp
description: Cingulata Camp, home of MV Cingulata, and purveyor of the best gourmet grilled cheese in BRC.
landmark: One yellow & one blue streamer on 25' bamboo poles

name: Red Tea Camp
description: We are the Red Tea Ceremony Camp, we are celebrating the 20th anniversary of bring Japanese tea ceremony to Burning Man.  If you speak Japanese or are interested in Japan, stop by.
landmark: Large red umbrella

name: And Then There's Only Love
description: ...and then there's only LOVE - home of the world famous Orgy Dome -  where couples and moresomes of all orientations are welcome to explore the benefits of Informed Enthusiastic Consent.
landmark: lighted circular Orgy Dome sign.

name: Crackwhore Camp
description:
Stop on by Lil' Crackwhore Camp to learn how to work those streets! We have many surprises, friendly face, and many stories to tell!
Meet us at Crackwhore/TechTonic dance party on Monday night on esplanade and come have a drinky poo on Wednesday Happy Hour from 4-6p! And cups.....we have cups!!!
landmark: Tshirt shade structure and red velvet lounge

name: Remote Control
description: We are about repurposing, remaking, reworking, recycling, and rethinking. We remake old clothes into MOOP bags (pick up one,  return it full, win a prize) and rework discarded TV remotes into decorations, lamps, games, and objects of wonder.
landmark: camp sign, & green "Get your MOOP bag here" banner

name: Devachan Lounge
description: Devachan Lounge is a sanctuary for authenticity. We live the 10 principles both on and off the playa and support an environment where everyone can bring their best selves to the community. We have gathered a revolving crew of passionate Burners, always at the ready to help new people acclimate to the Burning Man culture and the challenges of thriving in the Black Rock Desert. This is the true magic of Devachan Lounge. For anyone who finds themselves in our space, the Lounge is a peaceful, revitalizing, and reaffirming oasis. All are welcome.
landmark: 20' flag and Devachan Lounge sign.

name: Wolf Pack
description: We're Wolf Pack, and we're the camp destination if you want to learn about leather working, body bead work or stained glass crafts. Or come and cool off by some misters and howl, meow, bark, chirp or whatever your inner animal tells you to do! So come down and join the pack!
landmark: Big hand painted sign with wolf's in a forest

name: Monkey Pirate Pirate Monkeys
description: If you need bacon in your belly or a hammock in the shade, the monkey pirate pirate monkeys have you covered. Plop ye tired bones down with a cocktail and enjoy the cool ocean breeze from our swamp coolers as you plot your next plundering play adventure.
landmark: 5 carports, lifeguard stand, pyramids, & tramp

name: TOC Does Le Chalet
hometown: New York, San Francisco, Sacramento and Portland!
description: The Other Camp - Jungle Breakout! Come and see if you can escape our Jungle
landmark: Trampoline and dome covered with a parachute

name: Decadance
description: What is your myth of self? Our camp holds up the mirror for self exploration of ones self ideals.
landmark: Flock of pink flamingos

name: Camp DIY
description: Camp DIY is an assemblage of thinkers, tinkers, makers and dreamers.  We welcome all visitors particularly those with a preference to self reliance and self sufficiency.
landmark: 4'x8' lighted sign that says "Camp DIY"

name: BAR MACTROPOLIS
description: BAR MACTROPOLIS where every body is aV.I.P. we will solve all your Hydration ,entertainment , and chill needs.
landmark: at 3Oclock & K strs.

name: Kindergarten Kamp
description:
Kindergarten Kamp is returning for 2018 and we invite everyone to come play 24/7!
Our main interactivity will be a playground with multiple structures for all ages, children and adults (with a welcome invitation to families as priority), and NEW features for interactivity and creativity for all Playa participants.
landmark: Giant Kindergarten Kamp Sign lit with spot lights

name: Tower of Slackjaw
description: Visit the Tower of Slackjaw, the best view on the playa.
landmark: 60 ft geodesic tower with giant eye ball at top.

name: Bad Boy's Discover Your Kinks
hometown: San Francisco South Bay Area (Cupertino, CA)
description:
Introductions to BDSM through an electronic quiz and optional personalized instruction in the Playfully Yours Village dungeons.

Also hosts the very popular Cool Mist Experience automated cooling misting booth with pleasant surprises.
landmark: Booth on corner has 8 foot tall white PVC poles

name: SwagMart
description:
SwagMart is an Oasis of Gifting and Creativity located in the heart of the Black Rock Desert.

Our cherished and sought after Swag includes Man Pins, Man Date Pins, Necklaces, Earrings, Decals,Great Costume Trophies for Costume Appreciation, Playa  Postcards.

Enjoy our morning and late night Swag Coffee and Lattes, Experience making  your own  necklace's during our afternoon sessions, we supply the materials. This our 8th year of nightly Branding of Burning Man designs on your Boots, Belts, Hats etc. This will be a cherished addition to your Playa experience.

Stop by for a creative fun positive experience and meet Burners  from all over the Planet. Always close to Center Camp it the 6:00 sector.
landmark: Large lighted HERE I SEE MORE ME or SwagMart Sign

name: Oral Fixation
landmark: Pirate Flag

name: Hair of the Dog (HOTD)
description:
HOTD is the longest continuously operating full service dive bar and live music venue on the playa. 
You bring the booze and music and we provide the music and the booze.
landmark: 4 foot tall orange H O T D  Sign

name: Contradance Community Camp
hometown: San Francisco CA, Gainesville FL, Morgantown WV
description: Join us for an energetic, easy to learn, tribal-feeling form of group dancing known as contradancing.  We dance every night to amazing live music - everything from traditional celtic to an electronic mix of DJ'd records and live instruments.  There is a "caller" who leads, but there is still room for dancers to improvise and embellish.  There is no need to arrive with a partner - most dancers swap after each dance.  Lines of couples flow through each other creating a bonding, playful, noncompetitive, beautifully geometric, community dance for all ages and skill levels.  There is no required footwork and contra is possible for many with disabilities.  If you are smiling, you are doing it right.  Everyone who shows up will have fun.  Morning dance or yoga instruction.  Swing and waltzes.  Afternoon chill space, music jams.
landmark: Large open sided tent w/dance floor and signs.

name: Rat Trap
description: We are the notorious bar that never closes. Come by day or night to drink our booze, ride our horse and join us as we strive for Radical Self Stupidity.
landmark: Giant steel rocking horse and circus tent.

name: Bubbles and Boobs
hometown: Salem and Portland and surrounding areas
description: Join us for bubble play and practicing consent opportunities - it's what we're all about. Fun for everyone!
landmark: Giant boobs with large pink nipples (  .  )(  .  )

name: Club Neu Verboten
description: Club Neu Verboten continues it Eternal Service to The BRC Popular Masses. Music, Parties, Workshops, Shade. Stop by.
landmark: large two peak tent with Club Neu Verboten on it

name: DragonCamp Armory
description: This is a highly participatory workshop where women will learn to make and decorate their own sexy Cyber Armor Bikini to keep, wear, and share on the Playa. dragoncamparmory@gmail.com
landmark: 20 ft green Dragon

name: Barbie Day Spa
description: Barbie Day Spa...pampering on the playa since 2010.  Fingernail painting, foot wash, foot massage, full body massage, body wash, and wine.  Part of Barbie Death Village.
landmark: large pink banner for Barbie Day Spa.

name: Hostel
description: Unexpected adventures for couples.
landmark: Neon sign.... HOSTEL

name: Ludus Symposium
description: Ludus (playful love) Symposium (Meeting for music, drinking and intellectual discussion) is a place to hang out on our friendly deck/bar above the playa and watch cheezy cult movies.
landmark: Colorful flags with Ohm symbols

name: Jub Jub's Plastic Circus
description: Jub Jub, always here to fling those funny hard-to-get drinks, uneasy rest, strange music, weird plays, loud noises, oh-so-friendly grief, bruises, nausea, vertigo, i.e. Monkey Business!!!   maybe poo too…
landmark: Porch like structure with Jub Jub signage.

name: Morphoscopia
description: Hexayurts built carelessly. Shade structures destroyed in a dust storm. Over-eager shirtcockers. These are all examples of one thing: reckless erections.
landmark: White/blue flag featuring a decorative erection

name: El Tesoro
description: El Tesoro:  a place for the weary souls (and soles) to unwind, have some delicious drinks, and dance to some amazing music selections.  El Tesoro is 'The Treasure' of BRC, come hang with us and play life size games such as Jenga, Connect Four, and Battleshots.
landmark: El Tesoro sign (shape of Nevada)

name: Vagabonds & Tagalongs
description: A home for Vagabonds, their friends, and those who aspire to similar heights.  Check out our site for regularly updated information about what we've got in store for this year!
landmark: Three domes, one colorful, two white

name: The Kingdom
description: We are a collection of burners made up of  people of all tribes embracing our primitive nature.
landmark: 2 poles with skulls on top reading Savage Kingdom

name: Peace Camp Community Pantry
description: For over 20 years, Peace Camp has historically supported the artists on the playa and we will continue it as our number one priority.  Before the gates open to the general public on Sunday, we will be available to support the artists as needed.  We will offer bottled water, canned healthy beverages such as juice or coconut water to artists as they are setting up.  If any of the artists need a camp, they are welcome to camp with us where they can share our space.  We would also like to gift dust masks which will be made by our members.  And we will have a very nice supplied first aid kit.  Also, Monday through Friday (10-4) will offer a Peace Camp stencil station in front of our camp.
landmark: Look for the tall blue Peace Camp sign.

name: Camp BORING
description: Camp BORING: art support camp for BORING sign. Promoters of sarcasm and shenanigans. Come by for a sunset happy hour!
landmark: Giant BORING sign (unless it's out on the playa)

name: Black Rock Observatory Theme Camp
description: Black Rock Observatory is a mobile astronomical observatory dedicated to showing people just how amazing the universe is. Started at the Burning Man festival in 2014, we have expanded beyond the borders of Black Rock City to educational institutions and events all along the West Coast.
landmark: Black Rock Observatory illuminated sign.

name: Airstreameri and What Not
description: Airstreameri and What Not - the Best Playa Post Cards & Dusty Science Talks in Black Rock City. Because 'nothing to write home about' doesn't apply here & ignorance is not bliss. We love you people.
landmark: SilverAirstreamTrailers w/big PEACE sign outfront

name: Steradian
landmark: 25 foot tall, white Geodesic Sphere

name: Alternative Energy Zone
description: A Burning Man village free from combustion driven generators and no "dues" required.
landmark: 40' Tower with a 3 sided sign that reads AEZ

name: IcyHands Chillzone
description: Chill out with the Icy Hands crew as they defrost between midday mercy missions: share cool stories, images and video of those touched by icy hands under the sizzling playa sun.  Learn how to turn a simple block of ice into smiles, goosebumps and a truly incredible shared experience!
landmark: Blue Dunebuggy with Eyelashes

name: Ibiza Camp
description: A replica of a Moroccan bedouin oasis with the volcanic energy of the island of Ibiza on the playa. Bienvenidos!
landmark: white tents with black figurines & morrocan decor

name: Howzit
landmark: On the corner of 6:00 and G-Something

name: Darkwad Patrol
description:
Darkwad Patrol
The mission of our theme camp is to increase nighttime safety in BRC by reducing the number of injuries and damage caused by collisions with inadequately lit burners, bikes and structures. Each participant approached will be treated with respect, kindness and love. We will be gifting lights to dark burners and their bikes, etc., engage in community outreach efforts to increase awareness and promote self-reliant mindfulness about the importance of remaining visible at night, encourage re-usable and renewable, highly visible lighting options, and discourage one-time use, moop-generating forms of lighting (i.e. glow sticks). 

Our Motto: Get Lit or Get Hit
landmark: 10 ft. robot installation and Darkwad Patrol sign

name: EGGS Bar
description:
EGGS Bar returns for 2018!
Building on years of well-honed playa experience, EGGS Bar crew of veteran burners will once again create a welcoming venue of deepest interaction.  A jewel on the playa; it is a beautifully designed bar with amazing artifacts. While disguised as a friendly tavern, the space we create is so much more than a place to grab a drink... a storytelling station, meeting place of the minds, incubator of adventures, spontaneous dance party spot, sometimes even a Burning Man debate forum. All that and so much more,  we are YOUR local on the playa!

"Center Camp stalwarts!" — Jack Rabbit Speaks
landmark: to-scale Man-Head

name: Blintz Co
landmark: tall blue flags along the street

name: Identity Awareness
landmark: 25' LED light pole on top of RV

name: TeaCozy
description: Are you thirs-tea? Come par-tea with camp TeaCozy. Feel anxie-tea, uncertain-tea, and hostile-tea steep away as you enjoy our sereni-tea. Guaran-tea-d to leaf you refreshed and red tea to go!
landmark: Disco Ball Teapot Tower

name: House of Sammich
description: Looking for some toasted peanut butter and jelly sammiches? Look no further than House of Sammich and keep an eye out for The Great Sammich Ride delivering gooey goodness to your part of the playa!
landmark: the giant peanut butter and jelly sandwich

name: CAMPSTERDAM
description: Campsterdam is a little slice of old world Amsterdam within Black Rock City, complete with  traditional Amsterdam housing, tulip gardens, and a red light district!
landmark: Red Light Booths with Dutch and Amsterdam Flags.

name: Picklebackers
description: We are The Picklebackers, your one-stop shop for all things pickle. Be sure to attend our notorious Get Pickled with the Picklebackers Party Tuesday and Thursday 11am - 1pm!  There will be plenty of whisky and pickle brine and if you don't feel like getting off your bike just pull up to our Pickle Bell Drive Through window also running at the time listed above.
landmark: Large street facing pickle signs and green flag.

name: Abstininthe
description: Abstininthe is the friendly bar on the playa, providing our special drink to the thirsty of BRC since the last millennium. Come try our many flavors and enjoy the music, ambiance and conversation of our neighborhood bar.
landmark: Abstininthe Sign

name: U R Not Alone
description: Shady Hoop Camp - Learn how to hoop & make one to take with you. Great place to find some new sunglasses, too!
landmark: hula hoops

name: A-PLAYA-MASK
description: Breath easy with the Maskman's quality N-95 dusk masks with their non toxic psychedelic Burning Man logo.  And don't forget our Breathe Pure nose plugs and BM stickers and pins.
landmark: Look for the large A-PLAYA-MASK sign

name: Roasted Breauxs & Coffee Heauxs
description: Roasted Breaux and Coffee Heaux coffee house open M, W, F from 1-3.  The freshest coffee on the Playa - because it's roasted on the Playa.
landmark: 800 square foot multicolored Moroccan tent.

name: Gilded. Golden Snake Art Support
description: Visit Mr and Mrs Ferguson and the team who brought Let U.S Prey to the Playa. Friendly, inviting and answers to your questions.
landmark: Let U.S. Prey Information sign

name: Mom & Dad's Living Room
description: A "classic" living room where you can take a load off and talk with BRC family members.  A kind of stereotypical parent's living room with eclectic furniture. Complete with a wall of family portraits, add yours to the gallery and maybe even find a cold Otter Pop.
landmark: flat top shade, orange & grn swim noodles on legs

name: Lakes on the Playa Village
hometown: Great Lakes Regional - Lakes of Fire
description: Lakes on the Playa is our Village and we all call the Great Lakes regional burn, Lakes of Fire our home at home. We want to bring a taste of the fun, warmth and hard work that we all come from back home and share some moments with Black Rock City. Come visit us anytime of day or night to enjoy some music, shade, sunscreen, fire, community, art, banana suits or whatever we come up with next! Much like the Midwestern cities we come from, we work hard and play hard. Come get a taste of Lucky Lake and take a load off and enjoy the shade!
landmark: 25' scaffolding with a (g), Fire Garden, Discodome

name: Lingerie Lounge
description: Lingerie Lounge - We will adorn you and adore you, fulfilling all your lingerie and costume needs! We have a huge inventory of hand-picked, sewn and dyed items, and our attentive camp members will find just the right item for you. Come see us for lingerie and other fabulous and festive items! We serve all sizes, ages, genders, gender identities, gender preferences, race, creed, religion, and color! Our goal is to remind each Burner who visits us that they are beautiful. Open M-F, 10-2.
landmark: Street light, camp sign, mailbox & red beacon.

name: Dark Sparkle
description: Dark Sparkle is your call to the mysterious, your insatiable drive of self-expression, your community for body positivity and possibility. Through full-sensory burlesque, music, and ecstatic dance events, Dark Sparkle promotes body-positivity and self-expression.
landmark: Flattop draped in pink and "Dark Sparkle" banner

name: F.U.Ego Stage Bar & Lounge
description:
Camp Fuego hosts the F.U.EGO Bar, No Mercy Stage & Backstage A/C Lounge, serving daily the playa's only ORGANIC SNOW CONES and hosting "No Mercy" and "Mo' Mercy" karaoke parties, an open mic and DJ'd dance parties. DJs and musicians welcome! 
Choose any mixed drink, spiked cone, cold craft beer or hard cider. 
"No Mercy" karaoke singers agree to be cut off at any time for any reason or no reason at all, gong standing by. "Mo' Mercy" means well-keyed voices chime in, mic volumes magically adjust and the performance sounds great. 
ALL PARTICIPANTS gain access to Fuego's Backstage VIP A/C Lounge!
Look for Camp Fuego's namesake Art Installation, "Fuego", a life-sized stretched barbed-wire prancing HORSE with flame effects coming from her eyes and mane.
landmark: Life-sized stretched barbed wire horse.

name: PopoVille
description: Popo Ville is about honoring our patron saint Popo, and how we contribute to making the world a better place one burn at a time.  We invite our fellow burners, new and returning, to join us for food, drink, music, games and friendship.
landmark: Large Umbrella on top of structure

name: The Royals
description: Empty your mind, purify your soul, feel amazing and refreshed at the Geodesic Sauna Dome with annual 1000+ visitors. Travel around with our semi-autonomous Lunar Lover - our art car! Use our engraver and stencils to draw and paint with the power of sun.
landmark: Large lighted white dome

name: Whiskey Division
description: Alcohol is a Solution; We are The Problem
landmark: "NOPE" sign , 4 foot shepherd's crook lamp poles

name: Access to Elysium
description: Bring your tired body and soul to our relaxation destination to regroup, recharge and rejuvenate. First you will be offered dust-free spa water, as you soak your feet in one of our oiled footbaths or revitalize your cracking hands at our lotion station while enjoying deep conversations that lighten your soul. Second comes our signature pure bliss back massage with our special lavender massage oil to complete your Elysian Transformation. Finally with a hug and pat on the ass (optional) you will sent on your way knowing you have made new friends on your Burningman journey.
landmark: Two white carports with Access to Elysian banner

name: Luminos
description: Come relax and make a beautiful gourd lantern with us. You can take the gourd lantern home when you're done. We have all the supplies you'll need.
landmark: Gourds hanging in a monkey hut.

name: Honkers Harbor
description: Spank Bank is the playful, sensual playa spanking experience! Let us tease, torment and turn your cheeks a light shade of pink while satiating your thirst with an ice-cold cocktail in one of our commemorative cups. Come play, watch or simply relax in the shade and enjoy the surroundings!
landmark: Large sign with "Spank Bank" on it

name: Black Rock Lemonade
description: Ice Cold Lemonade Oasis Lounge
landmark: Lemon

name: PolyParadise
description:
The Village of PolyParadise has been influencing the Hearts & Minds and Washing the Bodies of Playa Citizens from '2:00 - 10:00' since 1999 celebrating 20 years in BRC in 2018.

Polyamory involves openness to multiple loving relationships, with honesty among all partners. We welcome ALL Poly & Poly Friendly folks to camp within our borders.

The Village of PolyParadise 2018 welcomes the addition of two Theme Camps within its borders | Twisted Swan | Temple of Bacchus.

PolyParadise is NOT a Swinger Camp. Being Poly or Practicing Poly is NOT a requirement for camping with us, but being OPEN MINDED about other people's lifestyle choices IS!!
landmark: 15' Color Swooper PolyParadise Flags

name: Robotronia
description: Robotronia - "Interact with Hotshot and other friendly humanoid robots, experience our interactive video screen or use our robot repair and charging station"
landmark: 12 ft tall static robot

name: The Meowsistance
description:
The King Mahtusahn is from an alternative universe of yestertomorrow, where humans have been fighting a losing battle against common house cats. Human survivors have united to create a war machine that will turn the tide of battle.

If you can read this and you have the strength to fight. Join the meowsistance.
landmark: The King Mahtusahn Mutant Vehicle

name: Mr. Peepers
description: This is our 6th year as a theme camp.Home of Babba's East hydration cart for the deep playa and other Burner interactions.Drop by and chat.All Welcome.
landmark: pink sign "Mr. Peepers "

name: Run Free Camp
description: Run Free is a clean and sober Burning Man camp for folks whose common goal is enlargement of spiritual life through new adventures in being human and living life to the fullest.  The only requirement for membership is a commitment to a clean and sober Burn.  For more info, check us out on Facebook (Run Free Camp) or on our website.
landmark: "Run Free Camp" blocks sign in front

name: Cafe Calm
description: Golden Llama is a small but passionate collective trying to provide you a unique experience and escape from the amazing but at times overwhelming experiences from the playa. Please join us for dusty beats & tunes from Soul State, mind and body bending experiences with our yoga and meditation teachers, refreshing adult beverages and the best playa hugs.
landmark: Beige Bedouin Camp (12ft) looking like Llama hump

name: Homebrew 4A Homebrew
description: We are a daytime bar with cold home brewed beverages, games and a friendly welcoming atmosphere. Enjoy a cold beer, cider, mead or soda served daily from 10am until after dark. We have a pool table and daily events including our Playa famous pickle party! Bring your keg and we will refrigerate and tap it, or bring a bottle to share.
landmark: Bar on the street and pool table.

name: Temple Oasis
description: Temple Homage Camp supporting the Temple and Temple Guardians
landmark: Large canvas red letter signage TEMPLE HOMAGE CAMP

name: Black Rock Roller Disco
description:
A Roller Disco in the middle of the desert? Yes, it's true!!!  Every city has a roller rink. Black Rock City has one as well!!! If you're looking for one of Burning Man's most fun, exciting, interactive experiences, come on down to the Esplanade and go for a roll at the Black Rock Roller Disco!!! We have your skates, we have your size, all we need is you!!!
The Black Rock Roller Disco is open 24 7 like 7-11 !!! Any time you feel like getting your skate groove on, come on by!!!  We will be celebrating Michael Jackson's birthday on Wednesday night and the Black Rock Roller Girls will present a live roller derby game on Thursday evening!!!  
Come by the Black Rock Roller Disco!!!  In San Francisco we are the Church of 8 Wheels, but here we spread "Rolligion" on the playa!!!
landmark: Golden Gate Bridge

name: Frankenpets
description: Frankenpets!  Come create a mutant animal and give it a forever home.
landmark: orange pink yellow polka dot cone hat at entry

name: Unicorner
description: The Unicorner is a haven for creativity, light-hearted fun, sharing, and gallivanting about! The Unicorner is created by a crew of hearty shenaniganists who have several goals on the playa: having lots of FUN, spreading lots of LOVE, and championing the 10 Principles of Burning Man in the most positive and supportive manner possible.
landmark: Structure with 3 rainbow flags and Unicorner sign

name: Camp Party Pants
hometown: We're a conglomeration of burners from Truckee, Sacramento and Seattle
description: Camp Party Pants! Home of the Gypsy Swing Machine. Calling all gypsy misfits and lost circus freaks to join our merry, traveling carnival!!!
landmark: Big white circus tent with the golden pants flag.

name: Bioluminati (Bike Mutation)
description: Bioluminati has been illuminating BRC for over two decades with art, quests and the BIKE MUTATION STATION (formerly Pimp Yr Bike), the mutation/decoration station where Black Rock Citizens can mutate/decorate their rides with that extra get-up-and-glow. Open daily. Donors of non-moopy craft materials get VIP access!
landmark: Fenced Bike Mutation with bright colored flags

name: The Donner Party
description:
The Donner Party
Nice to meat you
landmark: Flaming 'Man" on a spit

name: Mas Komodo Dragon
description:
Tribal Spirit is focused on visual UV art installation and electronic music. We are hosting a Straya Day (Australia Day on Tuesday for all Aussies and their friends)
We will be hosting number of workshops and we will have Yoga sessions 3 times throughout the week. Our space is also available for other burners, who wish to run own workshops.
Tribal Spirit will be repairing bicycles for other burners. 
Daily open bar with refreshing mixers.
landmark: Large white 50ft dome illuminated with UV lights

name: Black Rock Disc Golf Club
description: An open landscape, a frisbee, and stuff to throw that frisbee at!  Come play disc golf courtesy of the Black Rock Disc Golf Club!  We have 9 holes to throw at and some cool stuff to throw around.  Can't throw?  We'll teach you!  It's guaranteed to be a good time!  Open all day, and all night - obstacles, baskets, and discs all light up!  Check Playa Events for scheduled tournament times.

landmark: Large white tent with 6' LED marquee out front

name: Soulshakers
description:
We are a global community of nomads who hail from a tiny secluded beach on Koh
Phangan island in Thailand where yoga, meditation, celebration, conscious living and
community with spirit is the norm. Here we explore new ways of living as we each
challenge ourselves to live a more courageous, less conventional life.
landmark: 50ft green parachute, lined with a 30ft pink

name: Tie it Down Camp
description: We teach and demonstrate how to properly tie down your tent, shade structures, as well as tying down your RV and truck loads for the journey home.

name: Pussy Day Spa

Joie de Vivre, the ageless French expression, reflects our cheerful zest for life as well as our core camp philosophy, and our global group of Joiers welcome you into our camp anytime of the day or night! 

Come and find the brightly colored neon sign and flags atop our Joie de Vivre Arch, step inside and fuel up on a Cup of Joie coffee or relax with a chilled Rose-ayyy! We will also be offering yoga and beauty sessions throughout the burn in addition to our good old fashioned Joieful tunes and vibes!

name: EBB & Glow Village

Ebb & Glow village is a play space all day and all night.  

We host camps that serve refreshments, repair bicycles, serve cupcakes, and take portraits.  Enter Magic Lantern Society to relax, interact, have some tea, hookah, & maybe watch belly dancers.  Climb our play structures any time for views of BRC.   Afternoons and evenings: our stage hosts lectures, dance lessons, neighborhood band jams, improvisation groups, performers, and occasional DJ's.   On open Playa, our Candy HeArt car transports Cupid to the masses, delivering snarky candies and  nearly adequate dating advice.

Don't be a stranger, but do strange remain!

+++Unique Music from Tues till BurnNight+++

Come (((feel))) the difference & Seek the answer

)?(

name: Gravity
description:
Let Gravity do the work. Like love, gravity is one of the many unseen forces of the universe. It binds together our solar systems, keeps us firmly grounded, and rolls off the tongue like an avalanche.

With this in mind, Gravity Camp is the force that attracts and propels participants forward on the playa. 

Our camp's primary activities take place during the setting of the sun, when its gravity propels the earth through orbit and dazzles us with its majestic colorscapes. It is during this time, that we celebrate the success of a sun-filled day, and boldly continue our trajectory into the darkness of the night.

On the outskirts of the city, with no obstruction in sight, Gravity is the ideal location to celebrate the sun and wind-down before an evening of exploration.
landmark: Large GRAVITY signs at 9&K

name: New York Dangerous
description: New York Dangerous - the camp your mother warned you about. Try Running With Scissors, Playing With Fire, Talking to Strangers, "You'll Put Your Eye Out!" Shooting Gallery, and more - plus NY-style pizza and calzones! ...and of course, come by 24/7 for free candy.

Honor your form through body adornment and care, yoga, mediation, and tonal alignment. Celebrate this existence through food events, dance parties, and mind-blowing hosted talks. 

You, the cosmos and the world sacrificed much to bring you to this moment in time. Make it matter!

name: Camp Equilibrium
hometown: Northen California, Bay Area, Sacramento, Canada, Florida, Australia
description: The Center for Corn Bong Equilibrium, a Wuice Co-Op...Yeah Baby (EQ for short), represents the pinnacle in Radical Ritual for the collective first world culture in which we live: vacation. Adhering to a strict belief that our shared time together should be one of joy and relaxation, we seek to strike the all too difficult balance of hard work and play. We are an established camp designed around the confluence of radical inactivity and community support, of which we've coined as "the camp that does nothing, but has everything." It is in this space of in-between action and inaction we are expressing our confidence in the rituals we have set up to ensure that our camp and the community at large experiences the place of relaxation that we all deserve in this place outside the hectic worlds of which we live the other 51 weeks of the year.

name: S.A.T.B. Village
description:
During the sacred time between the Man Burn and the Temple Burn, connect with the "Something Other" often overlooked at Burning Man. Your international Playa Choir welcomes all Burners to come and participate in a 4-part harmony of classic sacred and secular songs. 

Singers of all skill levels, and persuasions are welcome :) Also looking for Musicians! Contact madis_service@yahoo.com for more information, or swing by our camp on the playa!

Rehearsals (open to spectators) are Wednesday through Saturday 10:30 a.m. to 12:30 p.m. To listen, please join us for the Sunday Sunrise Performance at the Temple (5:45am), or the Full Choir non-denominational, non-religious but entirely welcoming, spiritual and moving Service at 11:00am in our Dome. This performance will also be broadcast live on BMIR!
landmark: Huge 44' Dome with Playa Choir Banner

name: Sparkle Love Oasis
description:
We are a camp of cross country and international lovers, jokers, outlaws and unicorn fans. We create a sweet, cool chill out lounge for all to use day and night. We serve iced tea, lemonade and non-alcoholic arnold palmers Monday-Saturday afternoons on the playa. We are queer-loving folks and offer other public activities depending on the year. Our Booty appreciation station attracts ass lovers of all stripes. We often support participants through their first times giving and receiving spankings. 

Our infrastructure is simple but beautiful with a 20 foot blue and white sky lodge at our center. We are open to new friends camping with us for sure. We offer a communal shower and lounge space to hang in for all our camp-mates. It's a bring your own kitchen and camp gear situation. If you need power, we ask you bring your own generator. We have one we use for camp lights and music.

Visit us for a perfect Playa Name. 

You can also be a Playa Namer. We have what you need to do it right. 

Just show up when you want to name or be-named, during the daylight.

Un-naming prior poorly-chosen Playa Names is possible, but ours are permanent so only name or be named when you are ready and willing.

Had enough?  Got a problem posturing and hissing can't solve?  Come to our camp party for a DANCE BATTLE, or don one of our padded cat suits and sign up for CAT FIGHTS!

At Cohesion, you always arrive to a welcoming crew of happy individuals. Whether we are hollering on our megaphones, dancing, drinking, or sitting in the shade we pride ourselves on being a cohesive unit of weirdos ranging in all ages and vibes.

COME TICKLE YOUR TUTU TUESDAY PARTY: 3-7PM

Come to our party for a Polish & Paint. Sorry guys, that's not a blowjob. It's a mini facial (again, not the money shot) and face paint station. After you've freshened up enjoy a fresh cocktail and help us get the dance party started.

Any other day of the week you can find us at the bar. Come try your luck and see if it's open. *Hint: We like sunset.

Welcome to Boobietown, population: you.

name: Clue Bar (Murder Mysteries)
description:
Clue Bar Murder Mysteries! 
Cocktails & Hydration Daily, Monday - Sunday 
3:30 - 5:30 pm

Tuesday Murder Theme: Murder under the Big Top (Circus)
Wednesday Murder Theme:  Highschool Homecoming
Thursday:  Clue Bar Drag Races (bring your bad ass self in heels)
Friday Murder Theme:  Santa's Workshop
Saturday: Back of House Tour of Twat Wash (neighborhood cooler water disposal)
Sunday: Neighborhood Block Party & Back of House Tour of Twat Wash

A murder mystery is a type of theater in which you, our cast,  cooperate with each other and interact in order to solve a fictitious murder scene. Each cast member is assigned a role of their choosing and Act I commences.  Murder mysteries are most often comedic in nature.  Costumes and props encouraged and also provided.

description: Gypsy Nebula Village home of the BRC Boardwalk, Gypsymonkeys, Social Cancer, Bad Ice shaved ice bar, Gypsy castaways and trailer trash and Selim's gyration station where day or night Burners can always find fun and interactive play 24/7. Enjoy shaved ice popcorn or cotton during the day and themed libations in the cancer dome at night. Adopt a mutant monkey, get a spirit card reading, play games and win prizes. You can ride the biggest cock on the playa or make a sock animal. The gypsymonkey lounge is shady during the day and black-lighted at night and always welcome the weary traveler to rest and enjoy our ambiance.
