name: Pretty Pickle
description: Pretty Pickle Camp is a relaxed and open outpost on the road to nowhere. We have daily afternoon cold pickle service for the community Monday through Friday.  We invite passersby to step under our shade and enjoy a refreshing treat. Take your photo with our giant face-in-a-hole pickle.  Ride our new pickle swing.
landmark: Pickle Swing and Giant Pickle

name: Live Birds: Sade Camp
description: Live Birds is a flock of burners with members from all over the world. Each year we bring new experiences to delight and engage the community
landmark: Colorful triangle shaped flags with pigeon stencil

name: Two Lanterns
description: Best weddings on playa, Unofficial Playa Civil Unions (incl. rings/certificate), Black Rock Temporary Divorce, Annulments. Amazing interactive light sculpture, Crazy Traffic Light and a Kubb game to boot.
landmark: Camp sign, which is lit at night

name: Census
description: The Census has been collecting information about the population of Black Rock City since 2002. The results of the Census from previous years will be on display at the Census Lab on playa. The 2018 results of the Census will be presented in the Afterburn report accessible through the Burning Man website.
landmark: We are right next to Media Mecca in Center Camp

name: JOBI: Coffee, Tea or Me?
description: JOBI: Coffee, Tea or Me, serving coffee, tea, hot cocoa and treats every morning of the event from 7:00 till it runs out, plus (new this year!) a light immersion dance experience every night.  Bring your body, acoustic music, and don't forget your cup!
landmark: Pergola w/red fabric and lights.

name: So Far So Good
landmark: Minigolf Course

name: Kavacombs
landmark: truck in the middle with a canopy on both sides

name: The Espresso Martini Organization
description: It's hot outside! The Organization will cool you down and pump your energy up with our iced espresso martinis designed to wake you up and get you ready to party again! Daily 1-3pm.
landmark: sign with the coffee and martini yin yang

name: Camp Carl
description: Carl the Carmeleon was built to be an interactive, dynamic, mobile piece of visual art and music.
landmark: Giant chameleon art car or colorful chameleon sign

name: Temple of Bacchus
description: Temple of Bacchus where we help you keep the party going.
landmark: Columns  And large Bacchus painting.

name: PLAYA 54
description: PLAYA 54 - An Afternoon Delight!! Playing the best music from the 70's, 80's and today, including hip hop, Motown and house!!
landmark: Our PLAYA 54 Sign and some disco balls!!

name: Xpat Alien
description: Xpat Alien - The Crop Circle Cantina serves up intergalactic beats in our well traveled landing craft.
landmark: Blue/silver ufo shaped structure, lettered sign

name: the black hole
description: The Black Hole is the official staff camp on operational center of the Black Rock City Gate, Perimeter and Exodus Department
landmark: Commisary

name: Playa Jazz Cafe
description: Playa Jazz Cafe is Black Rock City's premier Jazz club featuring daily   workshops, nightly concerts and Jazz jam sessions during the week of Burning Man.
landmark: Large purple rope lit letters that spell JAZZ CAFE

name: M*A*S*H 4207th
description:
We're not Doctors.

Looking for a rich full day? Come to the least disciplined military unit on the playa.
Random security Checkpoints will occur. Terrorists & Loyal Citizens will be labeled. Propaganda & commentary provided for the prevention of communism. Nightly viewings of old episodes & movies from the show, this year featuring films from the series. Signpost project open to all.

Since 1999, your bastion of Democracy in a sea of fifth column communist/socialist/lawless infiltrators and barbarian mutants! Daytime martinis, PBR, and maybe even grape Nehi at Rosie's Bar. Our new tea house offers a moment of calm in the wilds of Black Rock.

Life, liberty, and the pursuit of Happy Hour.
landmark: 10' by 3'  sign reading "M*A*S*H 4207th"

name: Disco Space Shuttle
description: Join us in the early afternoons to confess your sins and rejuvenate your mind and body with a tasty Bloody Mary.  Then join us at night to fly across the Playa on the Disco Space Shuttle.
landmark: 20' Tall Space Shuttle

name: Black Rock Yearbook
description: Black Rock Yearbook - For 11 years the Black Rock Yearbook has been your place to get your exclusive playa yearbook photo taken.  Dress up and come by our lounge for your photo, a drink and to chill.  Check out our website to see our past yearbooks - www.blackrockyearbook.com
landmark: Storage container with our large sign on it.

name: Camp EAT ME
description: Excitement Action Team (EAT) started in San Francisco as a group centered around a simple theme: family style dinners coupled with games and a playful attitude. We've grown a community centered around the family meal, as nourishment, as ritual, and as a way to call friend-family home. We attend Burning Man as a Magical Encampment (ME).
landmark: EAT Me saloon doors

name: Camposanto
description:
Camposanto is from all corners of the World, but we are mostly Latinos. We love to dance and celebrate friendship. We contribute to the playa experience with dope Latin Beats and Rhythm. 

Come and play beer-in-hand soccer in our stadium. Look for our "Solar Chiva"   Mutant Vehicle.
landmark: SolarCar, Soccer Stadium, Latin American Flags

name: Awesomesauce
description: Do you ever wonder what the ball feels like when you're watching the game? Now's your chance to find out! Come join us for Awesomeball in 2018 and strap in for an exhilarating experience. When you're safe inside a cushioned see-through sphere you'll find whole new ways to move. Be The Ball - Awesomeball at Camp Awesomesauce
landmark: PInk truck, pink dome, pink flags, giant balls.

name: Camp Random Pants
description: Are you too big for your britches? Is your cod-piece not sitting right?  Did the sun go down and now you're freezing because you didn't think through wearing assless chaps?  Stop by Random Pants get yourself a new look (on the lower half, at least).  From slacks to gators,  we've got you covered.
landmark: Two domes, one decorated with pants.

name: S'mores N Amour
description: S'MORES every night at sundown (7pm).  Children of all ages are invited to roast a marshmallow and make a chocolate S'more.  Campfire entertainers are encouraged.  Doctor Who eats S'mores with us, will you?  Marshmallows will be burned!
landmark: Light Up Pyramid and Wood Cube with S'mores Signs

name: ASPCA
description: The Association Sparkle Pony Care and Assistance (ASPCA) is a group of friendly and outgoing burners of all ages (5 to 50-something) who like to provide safe and welcoming spaces for all: our lounge is open 24/7 with shady respite from the sun and comfy seating and pillows to relax on, our hydration station will offer water and electrolyte drink mix and is kept stocked all day, and our fresh fruit stand will be restocked every afternoon. If you stop by at the right time, we might even be making quesadillas and would love for you to join us for a snack!
landmark: Inflatable air dancer with ASPCA on it.

name: Hookers & Makers
description: Hookers & Makers is here give burners a chance to make their own mementos of Black Rock City. Whether it's crafting your own swag or simply making special memories with our Bug Zapper Glory Hole, there's something here for everyone.
landmark: Crochet monkey hut, crochet lion

name: Bureau of Misinformation
description: The Bureau of Misinformation has been Black Rock City's leading source of radical ridiculosity, ambiguity, and factual inconsistency since the man still lived in his parents basement. In other words, we will ALWAYS tell you the absolute truth, as it is ingrained in the very fiber of our beings.
landmark: 15 foot tall tripod topped with a large, metal 'i'

name: Glowskull Asylum Int'l
description: Glowskull Asylum Int'l brings heavy metal and rock radical inclusion to the playa.  Are you craving some good headbanging and want to meet exotic misfits from random places all over the world?  Our bar, SkØllushery, and art car "Castle Glowskull" will be hosting mischief, ultra-violence, and METAL (and other forms of rock) daily!
landmark: White Skull Artcar, intl. flags, + heavy metal

name: Valhalla On The Playa
description: Viking themed camp with interactive lounge, bar and interactive art projects and games.
landmark: Illuminated windmill along camp frontage

name: OHM HOME
description: OHM HOME: Home of Triptobot, Samantha Ray, CrabWolf and OhmKar. We like to boogie!!!!!!
landmark: Manta ray art car, or the tree sculpture

name: Monkey Business
description: Monkey Business is an Anti-Social club established in 1999. This group is a place for monkeys to discuss Monkey Business stuff. People associated with Monkey Business generally refer to themselves as Monkeys. Being a Monkey means you are a free human being, capable of handling yourself and the consequences of your actions.
landmark: Banana on top of a 50' tower

name: Burner Buddies
description: Explore the outer city and turn the volume down!  Escape to one of our parties and enjoy one of our many events including Genital Prints, Nacho Daddies, Whiskey Galore and Drive Thru!  Ever have someone say you were gonna lose your Gay Card only to realize you don't have one? Get one @ Burner Buddies.
landmark: Lighted rainbow at corner of camp.

name: Benevolent Elephant
description: Love Cow formed to nourish the community through Healing Arts and Music. Find us on the Playa for daily yoga, sound healing, music sessions & more!
landmark: 33 foot tall cone of flowing fabric and

name: Pandora's Lounge & Fix-it Shoppe
description: Our camp keeps our fellow Burners biking: our repair shop offers education,  tools and parts, for bike repair. Actually we'll help you repair just about anything, but bikes are our specialty. We also love to mix drinks and host visitors in our adjacent lounge. We have a strong eco focus; we have been running on solar power for years, plus we recycle and reuse as much as possible.
landmark: large silver arrow that is lit red at night

name: BRC WEEKLY newspaper
description: Since 1995, the editors of the BRC Weekly have been publishing Black Rock City's favorite independent newspaper, chock full of snarky articles, opinionated editorials, and of course, the infamous Out/In List and Playa Lingo.
landmark: giant BRC Weekly logo on the side of an RV

name: PlovKraft
description:
Bringing PLOV - Uzbek national dish on the playa!
The only chance to taste PLOV! Afternoon - 1PM until supplies last.
Hurry up! We gift fast!
landmark: Big PLOVKRAFT banner

name: Honest MiSteak
hometown: San Francisco, CA Boston, MA Denver, CO  Portland, OR  Jacksonville, FL
description: Honest MiSteak is a day camp that loves to play and eat meat! We run events throughout the week so stop by early to get the inside scope. Don't miss our Bison BBQ on Monday and Tri-Tip BBQ on Wed! Check out our event board for other fun events throughout the week.
landmark: The camp with the 10' high aerialist swing!

name: Space Punks
description: Swish Embassy: An audio/visual Costume Theme bar welcoming all
landmark: 2 domes with a Box truck sideways between

name: NumbSkulls
description: Don't let the name fool you, we're not really numbskulls. We're NumbSkulls!
landmark: Illuminated "NumbSkulls" sign and skull car w/ hat

name: Jankytown
description: Jankytown features Live Music and Circus Arts - funk, jazz, samba, clowns and fire performance. An interactive creative space, stop by for open jams in the daytime and for evening performances by Jankytown artists.
landmark: 5 - 15' flags on the street and the Jankytown sign

name: Monkey Love
landmark: Monkey Love flag or spot light

name: DR. PLAYA'S EAR NOSE & THROAT
description: Pesky Playa dust packed in those head holes? We can help with that! Our decidedly *non-medical* staff can fix you up with the tools you need to clean your nose and ears. Your throat? Well, that requires an exam, possibly a CAT scan, and perhaps a shot. Most people need a shot.
landmark: Scaffolding with a cloth a face and "Dr Playa"

name: MiM0SA SUNRiSE
description: Still up from last night? looking for some entertainment? Do you like champagne showers? Come stop by everyone's favorite neighborhood morning bar to celebrate the birth of a new day and spin the wheel at the Mimosa Bar to win a prize and enjoy a mimosa. Come share your epic tales from the night with a group of fun people and positive vibes. The Mimosa Sunrise show never disappoints
landmark: sign with Sun and Champagne bottle & spiral bar

name: BloodyMaryLand
description:
For over a decade BloodyMaryLand has strived to create a relaxing living room environment to serve made-to-order Bloody Marys to the breakfast crowd. Nighttime bars are for partying, ours is a morning and afternoon neighborhood hangout, encouraging visitors to stay a while and chat.  We have a shaded bar facing the street, crab flag flying proudly.  Our crab emissaries spread the word and make sure our neighbors know the best place to find their liquid breakfasts.  We have several couches, countless chairs, carpeted floors, coffee tables, and proudly make each Bloody Mary to order, even offering vegetarian options!

Breakfast is Served!
landmark: Crab Sign with text: "BloodyMaryLand"

name: The Pink Spot
landmark: Our Pink Spot Flag.... a white flag with a pink

name: Disco Ballz
description: Camp for support of "Boogie Bug" Mutant Vehicle.
landmark: "Boogie Bug" Mutant Vehicle

name: Shwar Town
landmark: red shwar flag by day and purple pyramid by night

name: Friendlandia
description:
We have many customs and traditions for celebrating and recognizing romantic relationships. However, friendships are often longer lasting and as strong as many marriages, and yet we often don't spend the time to celebrate and honor those relationships.

What if Friends could get "Friendgaged"? What if they could commit to each other in ceremony? Wouldn't it be a better world if Friends more often expressed their dedication and love to one another?

Friendlandia is a place to celebrate new and long-time Friendships in ceremony by sharing vows, exchanging Friendship Bracelets, and expressing love for the friends in your life. Come have a ceremony at our Temple of Friendgagement, exchange vows and Friendship Bracelets, and become BFFs--Burner Friends Forever.
landmark: Neon flags, wooden dome and Friendlandia banner.

name: Land of Monkey
description: Monkey Bar in the Land of Monkey was inspired from music. We offer an amazing tea bar serving boba and milk teas daily! We have fun activities and participation games. This year we come with an art car called: Monkey Car.
landmark: Giant Monkey

name: STAR STAR ROADHOUSE
description: We bring a risque mix of dance, theater and live rock and roll to the playa. Sexy, physical, thematic. Daytime movement, yoga, and twerkshops throughout burn week in our shaded venue. Night time shows to loosen you up!
landmark: Giant "STAR STAR" lightboxes & huge red shade tent

name: Daydream
description: Share, Learn, Grow, Evolve - PlayaSkool is a global community of movers and shakers dedicated to creating positive impact through arts and education.  We are PlayaSkool!
landmark: 5 Flaming Domes and signs that say "PLAYASKOOL"

name: Galactic Cruzaders
description: Black Rock & Roll every day at sunset. Pianos, guitars, bass, drums, synths, full PA system. We build the stage. You build the story.
landmark: School buses with the instruments on the roof.

name: The Oracle of Gerlach
description: More marvelous than a Marvel comic origin story, the Oracle of Gerlach was spawned when a dust storm overturned a bank of overused portapotties. Playa dust joined with magical effluent from thousands of Burners, and the Oracle arose and came to be. The Oracle is neither male nor female, but is the spirit of humanity.  He/she will once again rise from deep within the Playa to bring order to chaos, enlighten the masses, and provide questionable guidance for a creative and fulfilling life. The Oracle has brought her priests and ministers to serve and bestow her divine enlightenment through the use of magic Oracle cards, secret wisdom, and fantastic readings.
landmark: Illuminated lightboxes

name: Sugar Bitches
description: The sweet bitches supporting the fabulous Wushu
landmark: Pink and Blue Foo Dog with Pink and Blue shade

name: Playa Choir
description:
During the sacred time between the Man Burn and the Temple Burn, connect with the "Something Other" often overlooked at Burning Man. Your international Playa Choir welcomes all Burners to come and participate in a 4-part harmony of classic sacred and secular songs. 

Singers of all skill levels, and persuasions are welcome :) Also looking for Musicians! Contact madis_service@yahoo.com for more information, or swing by our camp on the playa!

Rehearsals (open to spectators) are Wednesday through Saturday 10:30 a.m. to 12:30 p.m. To listen, please join us for the Sunday Sunrise Performance at the Temple (5:45am), or the Full Choir non-denominational, non-religious but entirely welcoming, spiritual and moving Service at 11:00am in our Dome. This performance will also be broadcast live on BMIR!
landmark: Huge 44' Dome with Playa Choir Banner

name: Galaxia
description: We are the Temple Crew - Please join us to give thanks and praise to our community.
landmark: Galaxia themed decorative elements.

name: Camp Pair-a-dice
description: Take a break from the craziness and come relax in Pair-a-dice at The Bamboo Bar. We provide libations, joy, laughter and a shady spot to relax!
landmark: The Bamboo Bar

name: Camp Beacon
landmark: Geodesic Beacon on corner - will be lit at night

name: Hammock Hangout
description: Hammock Hangout and Karaoke Lounge is a welcoming space for you to chill during the heat of the day, get cold beverages and sing your heart out at the Karaoke Lounge. The Karaoke Lounge is open every day, with the singing starting around 11am. The Hammock Hangout is open 24/8 as a public space to chill in.
landmark: White SpaceCats flag & Disco Ball on 60' tower

name: Mutant Wranglers
description: Basically I'm an old ranch truck masquerading as a rusty crustacean wearing a giant bison skull on my back, the way a hermit crab inhabits the shell of another creature. The top of my skull has been cut off, however, and is suspended between the horns about 8' off the ground - and you are my brain.
landmark: Dual scaffolding towers made into a tent.

name: Feed tHE ARTists
description: Started in 2007 w/ Larry Harvey's blessing and support, FtA has fed tens of thousands of burners, and actively modeled the concept of creating community through the sharing of meals at BRC and far beyond.  We serve as a primary resource for playa food safety, kitchen design, and playa cooking.  You never know what we'll be cooking, but whatever it is, you're invited to help us prepare and eat it, and you'll be treated to some of the finest food ever gifted on the playa!
landmark: Yellow lighting surrounding our covered diningarea

name: Arctica Ice Sales
description:
Arctica Ice Sales is your downtown resource for ice.  Crushed and
block ice are available for $4 each. During the event, ice sales hours (at this location) are Mon-Sat 9am-6pm, Sun Noon-6pm and 10am-Noon on Labor Day.

Pre-event sales are Thurs-Sun Noon-6pm at this location.
landmark: Arctica Main. We're right behind it.

name: Burning Tits!
description: Burning Tits!  art support camp.  Come chill with on out 3 story art support vehicle.
landmark: Ugly yellow truck that has a fences on upper decks

name: Fresh Squeezed!
description: Art & Lemonade since 2006. Come join us for ice cold lemonade and group painting.
landmark: Giant Lemon on of Semi-Trailer and Gateway Sign

name: Illumination Village
description: Illumination Village (now a 501(c)(3) offers the most old school, beautifully chaotic and welcoming Burning Man experience on the Esplanade. We are one of the oldest villages, celebrating 22 consecutive years of mayhem in 2018, which we plan to be our most spectacular ever.
landmark: Flaming Illville sign

name: Camp Journeylizm
description: Camp Journeylizm - home for media professionals at playa. We are a working camp setup to help media folk with a camp.
landmark: 2 large monkey huts for kitchens - Red Camper

name: Atomic Pussy Photo Lounge
description: Come hang at our daytime Bar/Lounge and Photo Booth. We serve the Best iRobot Drinks on the Playa, good vibes, and Boogie. This year our camp is staffed completely by androids – the technological singularity is fast approaching - come interact with us to map our operating systems with the 10 principles while there is still time! Try the Shot-Ski to simultaneously update your group's robotic software.
landmark: Atomic Pussy Photo Lounge banner

name: Cabana Club
description: Come and enjoy The Favorite Vacation Destination for the hard working citizens of Black Rock City!  The Cabana Club is an oasis of hospitality and friendship. We serve up a refreshing array of nosh and cocktails for your Afternoon Delight.
landmark: Cabana Club Signage

name: Vitruvian
hometown: San Francisco and East Bay Area
description:
Come and play with us!

The Pongo Lounge is an SF based community dedicated to interactive games, art and music; stop by and take a ride in our HUMAN GYROSCOPE, take part in our interactive installations with us, watch our LEDS, or just lounge and chill. We throw parties on Tuesday and Thursday.
landmark: Gyroscope giant art sign PONGO red/yellow pyramids

name: Horny Camp
hometown: Los Angeles and San Francisco, CA. New York City
description: Horny Camp is an arts and crafts camp by day and bar/karaoke camp by night. Come by and get craft and horny or buzzed and belt out a tune, as suits your fancy!
landmark: large white tent with a "Horny Goat Lounge" sign

name: Kamp Keto
hometown: Chicago, Los Angeles, San Francisco, Toronto, Rio De Janeiro
description: Kamp Keto is dedicated to the life-changing lifestyle of ketosis; cutting out sugar and carbs, and training your body to burn stored fat as fuel. We'll get you on the path to achieve your health and fitness goals, and also provide some very tasty Keto cocktails.
landmark: wind spinner garden and giant inflatable avocados

name: Children of Chaos
description: Chaos, joy, good conversation, parades and motherly advice.  Gold parade Wednesday, assemble at 5:30, parade at 6:00 pm, cocktails after the parade.  Illuminated Specters Monday, assemble at 8:30, parade at 9:00 pm.  Also, meet the Jewish mother you never had - mothering in your choice of English, Hebrew, French, or Spanish.  Come to our bar to be initiated into the cult of Maximon of Chaos.
landmark: 40 foot shade structure with bright orange

name: Paper Cranes
description: Come find your refuge from the elements of the Playa - Paper Cranes nourish your soul at The Fold, where you'll find an array of tasty beverages, pickle backs, juicy beats, and our homemade balms and salves.  Make a paper crane with your best wishes and we'll deliver it safely to temple before the Sunday burn.
landmark: Paper Crane shade structure

name: Catmandu
description: Catmandu is an eclectic herd of artists, musicians, DJs, computer nerds, climbers, bike riders, and whiskey enthusiasts. We love to make people smile, and we love to have fun. We're veteran burners who have contributed theme camps, performances, art cars,
landmark: Geometric shaped cat head sign lit by led strips

name: Patsy's Hangout
description: Patsy's Hangout is a fabulous lounge in the gayborhood to connect with old friends and make new ones while enjoying a refreshing Playa Bolli cocktail. Enjoy high-energy tunes, good company and a comfortable space all day, every day. Join us at the bar, move your groove thang, chill or just hang out. Participate in our featured events and be sure to show off your best playa couture.
landmark: 30x40 structure with gray tarps and "Patsy's" sign

name: The Parlour Room
description: The Parlor Room celebrates the participant, honoring those in our sector who honor the playa with their contributions. Our interaction is old school eclectic and one of recognition and intercommunity-play, ranging from mixers to dinners, performances, dental refresh, and friendly pranking - some scheduled, some spontaneous, some stationary, some mobile. connecting cross-community. We strive to interlace playa families. Black Rock Tie dinners, Tooth Brush Cart services and more await you...
landmark: Fancy Lamp Camp - lots of chandeliers

name: Reno Housewives
description: Costuming BRC since 1998. Do you need bridesmaids for your playa wedding, or are looking for the perfect outfit for that party? ASK US -- From frumpy to fabulous, we have you covered. Home of the world-famous Sillisculpt Museum.
landmark: Purple gypsy wagon on the street by our boutique.

name: Eyes of the Soul
description: Eyes of the Soul is a unique Burning Man experience that combines providing Eye Make-up, Astrology Readings, and delicious Tea all in a rejuvenating space with soothing sounds and aroma-therapy. Come by and RePLENISH, ReFRESH, ReFLECT!
landmark: ReFresh Vanity and the Eyes of the Soul Sign

name: Cirque de Licious
description:
Cirque de Licious will be serving cold water extract  coffee and tea from 9 am until 1 pm.  Stop by and enjoy a cool, caffeinated beverage on your way home in the morning and tell us about your nights adventures!

At sunrise each night we will have a fiery robotic buddha, playing music and shooting flame!  Stop by and see DJ Ohm.
landmark: A robotic buddha statue and a coffee bar.

name: South Bay Burner Art Collective
description: South Bay Burner Art Collective - Based in Silicon Valley, we have been building and burning art on-playa since 2011.  We welcome everyone who lives in the South Bay to participate in the build, burn, and LNT experience of this year's project, "WormWatch".  Meet the artists on Monday, join our burn perimeter crew on Thursday, or help us clean up on Friday ... we want you to be a part of this community art project!
landmark: Frontage w/ South Bay Burners banner, art posters

name: Whynauts
description: Our mission is to inspire child-like wonderment. This year, we are bringing you Robot Jesus styled Alexa! Come ask it curious questions about the world over daytime tea and nighttime wine. Visit our confessional starring iJesus, share your troubles, sins, and worries with Him, complete your penitence, and get back to connecting with your sinless inner child!!
landmark: Whynauts sign hanging from our shade structure

name: I Miss My Dog Cafe
description: We bring wine, Bloody Marys, and comfort food to the playa
landmark: flags from California & Colorado

name: Pure Playa
description:
Pure Playa welcomes you to sweat with us in Russian Banya. 
Banya increases blood circulation helping to detoxify the body; the steam opens your pores and promotes cleansing for cleaner, healthier skin; the heat creates an artificial "fever" ramping up your immune system.
landmark: Big orange shade structure with a red flag on top

name: Nipple Crime
description: Camp Nipple crime is a community space dedicated to gifting participants with custom pasties, cold beverages and lasting memories. Look for the red and white.
landmark: Red and white shade structure and furniture

name: ArtAffects Camp
description: The ARTECH CAMP is an art support camp, providing a home for local and international artists involved in various art projects and installations.
landmark: Artech Neon Sign

name: Law Enforcement Substation
description: BLM staffs the Law Enforcement Substation to allow participants a convenient place to report crimes, ask questions, and provide information to law enforcement.
landmark: BLM Trailer

name: Black Rock Explorers
description: Black Rock Explorers  is an opportunity for for Burner kids and their families to explore new practical and artistic skills, learn about Burner acculturation and join us for playa-cational field trips, events and volunteer opportunities hosted by theme camps and services all over BRC.  Fun is guaranteed!
landmark: Black Rock Explorers sign and flags

name: Start to Finish
description: Camp Start to Finish is an interactive open to anyone fictional extreme racing camp where participants, passers by and those that give in to our fun spirited peer-pressure can take place in made up events like NO distance running, walking, and cycling races that start and end on the same Start/Finish line. Warm ups, pre-race preparation, event participation and post race cool downs will be celebrated and encouraged by cheering fans, libations, and music from little know DJ's. "Winners'" will be presented with a super cool 2018 Camp Start to Finish metal as they stand a top the podium and bask in their glory of the victory in their head!!!
landmark: Start/finish line and podium

name: Zoo Camp
description: Zoo Camp - animal chilled zone - happy music and bar, cocktails served - sunset parties Tuesday & Thursday.
landmark: LARGE ZOO CAMP FLAG, 9H45 & L

name: Space Hole: Mist Opportunity
description: Visit Space Hole: Mist Opportunity.  Get misted and see some cool no-RV Burning Man camping tech!
landmark: LED Sphere 12 feet in the air at the entrance

name: Flirt Camp
description:
Flirt Camp is a vibrant and fun lounge for folks to learn and practice the art of flirting.  

Our goal is to empower Burners with the knowledge, and more importantly, experience, with how to flirt, and ultimately building amazing relationships with that knowledge!  Flirt Camp is a community of folks who study spirituality in the context of sensuality and relationship, as well as other transformational modalities.  We see flirting as an essential part of going from strangers to lovers, and we all love listening and teaching.  Flirt Camp an inclusive camp, so please feel free to drop by!!
landmark: Flirt Camp sign

name: Viking Bar!
hometown: Vancouver, BC   (part of Burn in the Forest Regional)
description:
Vikings (wannabe's), well crafted ales, drinking games, and great conversation!  Quenching burning thirsts since 2015!  

Stop by for a drink, stay because you like it.
landmark: Large bar, Viking Bar sign on top

name: N-Toxicade
description: At N-Toxicade we try to distort people's perception of video games as an art form.  We do this by altering how the game is played or even by altering the games themselves.  We feature Game Random, a game that gives you no choice as to what you will be playing.  You could get any number of modified and fan generated content that will leave you scratching your head.  We also feature Wiiner Sports, where you play sports games utilizing strap on dildos as controllers, a hands on or off experience.  We also have Destroy Them!, a multiplayer vs arcade game made and voiced by the N-Toxicade family.  We also have Twat Waffle and a lounge.  Don't know what Twat Waffle is?  Come to N-Toxicade to find out!
landmark: Mario Mushroom White Flag

name: Pig Nest
description:
Pig Nest. Come Rest!
Featuring the shady hammock Nest.
Yearly whole pig roast Mess.
Jazzy champagne music Fest.
landmark: Baby Blue 10' Tall pentagonal wooden structure

name: Sparkle Pop Kittens
description: We sparkle, pop, and well, meow.  Who knew kittens could make a giant robot?  Mechan X is one with felines.
landmark: SPK sign

name: Hushville
hometown: We're distributed through the US and Canada
description: Hushville is an aural oasis in the middle of the maelstrom that is Black Rock City! We're a Village that is open to all - Theme Camps, small groups, and solo campers; new Burners and grizzled veterans alike.
landmark: Hushville flags and "No Participant Parking" signs

name: Gears & Beers
description: Gears & Beers: Vehicle and art car repair camp and bar from Seattle, WA.
landmark: Lit up Gears & Beers signage is visible 24/7

name: Camp Shrunken Heads
description: Camp Shrunken Heads will again be making shrunken heads, voodoo dolls and tossing boomerangs. We will be making stuff Monday thru Friday during daylight hours.
landmark: Camp Sign : Camp Shrunken Heads

name: Hot Noodz
description: Come by get stamped up with a man stamp and see what else we have to offer
landmark: Walk Over Flags or Banners, Camo net, walkover bar

name: Paradise Motel
description: Come experience the American Dream that is Paradise Motel.  Established in 2008 and designed to resemble the most garish of '60s roadside motels,  we are dedicated to sharing the spirit and ethos of the noble flamingo.  We're a flamboyance of fun-loving goofballs from all over the country (and all across the gender and sexuality spectra) who invite weary travelers to stop in for a snow cone and enjoy featured music and activities every day while lounging in the shade by our "pool".   Since we have become a pretty close knit group we are only looking to bring in people that want to join our family, stay long term, and be productive, dynamic members of our tribe, so membership is limited and by sponsorship of 2 current members.
landmark: Big pink flamingo sculpture / Paradise Motel sign

name: Tierra Bomba
description: We bring the South American spice, excitement, and passion from our Latin culture to the playa; with open arms, Tierra Bomba's purpose is to spread these elements to Burning Man community.
landmark: Shade net with colorful carpets,palm trees, coffee

name: Voted Best Camp
description:
The world famous Voted Best Camp once again gets suited up to hit your inner punk rocker that flat-lined LONG ago with the defibrillator. 
Live Punk Rock, skateboarding, and an open bar presented in a contemporary "In your face" style, it will be our honor and privilege to mop the floor with you in all areas of conversation in addition to making you look like merely a moderate drinker. Enjoy!
landmark: Skateboard halfpipe

name: Banned Camp
landmark: EPIC POST - a large 4x4 upright wooden post.

name: Boots & Cats
description: Catch a sunset and dance yourself clean on our lifesize cat play house, Catopia. Boots broken? Repair them under the shade in Bootopia.
landmark: Cat flags & a life size cat tower!

name: Silver City
description: Come enjoy a piece of the old west at Burning Man.  Entertainment includes an open bar, mechanical bull, live entertainment, large dance floor, giant rocking horses and games!
landmark: Two giant rocking horses

name: Way Way SuperGood (by Full Send)
description: Come Climb inside Wall-Eeee!!!
landmark: 100x50 shade structure with a climbing cave inside

name: PlayApology Village
description:
PlayApology Village: This alliance of quirky service camps is home to camp Darkwad Patrol, which literally helps burners "get lit" via workshops and the gifting of lights; and Camp PlayApology, Black Rock City's first custom apology delivery service, featuring BRC-friendly greeting cards and flowers. 

Camp PlayApology: Black Rock City's first "Custom Apology Delivery Service" offers Playa-friendly flowers, Burner-centric cards, and singing "SorryGrams" for BRC residents who wish to make playAmends. Send out a card or two, decorate your own card, relax in our breezy shade structure or have a shot of artisanal, home-infused vodka. Check Playa Events for Sorry Soirees, fiery fetes, vod tastings and daytime workshops
landmark: Kinetic PlayApology Village sign,  9-ft LED robot

name: PlayCreate
description:
PlayCreate – We have toys!
Play under our shade, sip a drink and participate in one of our many creation workshops.
landmark: white camouflage walls & colorful center streamers

name: Risa
description: RISA is a resort planet, renowned for its breezes, clothing optional beaches and friendly atmosphere. In the afternoon you can enjoy one of our Snow Cones and lounge in an enclosed cooled area. In the evening come eat and taken in the fire art or take a ride on one of our Mutant vehicles.
landmark: Horga'hn Statue or Painting!

name: Plug n Play
description: 24/7 Solar-Powered Charging Station at Plug n Play Camp! "Plug" in your iPad, iPod, cell phone, or any small i-­device with your electrical adapter for a recharge utilizing our camp's solar-­powered 120-­volt inverter. We encourage you to not leave your device unattended, so stick around, have a drink on us, play some games, or sample some of our chill and deep house electronic dance music.
landmark: blue parachute

name: Flattery Camp
description: Self-worth in the dumps? Ego on the floor? The BM-blues got you down? We got this! Just swing by Flattery for your daily soul tune-up, and let our fully trained and certified id-mechanics set you whistling on your way. With humor, sincerity, originality, shaded comforts and hospitality, we'll lovingly bend your psyche back into shape. And did I mention just how ridiculously lovely you are?
landmark: 25-foot square Bedouin-like white tent structure.

name: Orientation & how not to die Camp
description: Sketchy Camp - Everyone has a creative spark, Sketchy Camp is a place to create connections and let your inner artist play.
landmark: Big blue signs saying Sketchy Camp & a camp banner

name: DangerNeutrinos!
landmark: Skeleton painted dome

name: Astro Cats
description: We invite all burners to chill at the Astro Lounge with special drinks during the day, and hot or cold sake at the Dragon Lounge at night. You can enjoy acrobatic performance and workshops at scheduled times, and a place to practice and spin fire and Cyr Wheel with us. If you want to join our kitties for morning yoga, bring your mat to stretch and pose with us. You can chill on our chairs and watch people pass by while sipping our special drinks. Or you can challenge yourself to manipulate the LED Matrix, walk the plank, or play the game of Giant Jenga or Simon Says while enjoying your sake.
landmark: Aerial Rig in the front, a Letter A LED on a pole

name: Interaction Café
description: We create a space where servers get to create their ideal burning man experience by choosing interactions offered to guests who come by, and guests choose whichever of their offerings tickles their fancy. The result is consensual weird and wonderful experiences, and it's hard to leave our camp, because you never know what might happen next: one moment it's sweet and moving, and the next it's rowdy and hysterical.
landmark: Interaction Cafe sign

name: HUGGZILLA Art Car Support Camp
description: We are a Burning Man theme camp started in 2015 that focuses on unlocking human intimacy among people through HUGS & MUSIC regardless of race, age, gender, or sexuality. Our camp always attracts people who are full of love and free of drama. We have our own kitchen and we all get together for the dinner at 7pm every day.
landmark: White Geodesic Dome and a 40ft wide HUGGZILLA sign

name: Be You Do You
description: Built on the ethos of Self-Love, we strive to build comfort, confidence, and connection within ourselves and our participants so that we may transmute our inner findings into our daily realm. We promote deep diving into the matters of the heart, the dark areas we commonly repress. As a camp, we are called to guide burners in recognizing the trials and triumphs of the path of Self-Love. We can't say it is an easy or pleasant path, but we can say…it is absolutely WORTH IT.
landmark: big neon pink gorilla near the trampoline.

name: Flying Falafels
description: "The Isra-early Breakfast"- A refreshing way to start your day.
landmark: "The Isra-Early Breakfast" sign

name: Suspended Animation
description: Experience full-suspension erotic rope bondage: part kinetic art, part thrill ride, part endorphin rush. Our crew of expert riggers offers bondage and BDSM rides, workshops for all levels, breathtaking performances, and night time play parties. We also rove the playa and build impromptu bondage sculpture! Rumors of daily yodeling at 10:00 AM abound.
landmark: Aerialist rig with Suspended Animation sign on top

name: Dart-O-Matic
description: Can you beat the camp Dart-O-Matic dart pro? Probably not; come play darts anyway with a few Marin Dart League players and their friends.
landmark: 8' high dart in front

name: Black Rock Beach
description: Keeping the beach clean, safe and fun for all!
landmark: twelve foot tall lifeguard tower with blue flag.

name: Disciples of the Dust
description: Disciples of the Dust have been bringing art to the playa for 7/10th of a decade.  We are a Pacific Northwest based camp.  Projects this year include I Robot Weather Plus and I Bouquet.
landmark: Light purple feather sign

name: Beats 'n Deets
description:
Don't lose your shit when you lose your shit.
Label it!!
Every year burners lose 10's of 1000's of precious treasures and playa essentials.
If it's labelled, your chances of getting it back are way higher.
So come to beets 'n deets, label your stuff and hang out with us.
Tunes, drinks and labels. What could be sexier?
And come back next year for our "label it after I've lost it" feature. (Still in development.)
landmark: Large, white canvas bell tent. 16 foot diameter.

name: Skepticons
description: Skepticons welcomes in anyone interested in making music, from absolute novices to experienced musicians.
landmark: Red Dodge Truck and 2 yurts

name: Booty Hunters
description: Hunters of the golden bubblebutt, unite! Whether your bum is flat, bouncy, perky or juicy, saunter over to Booty Hunters for some quality boozy booty appreciation. Share a drink, pick out a pair of fabulous new booty shorts, learn how to twerk, stretch it out with yoga and shake it out with samba and groovy beats!
landmark: red and tan 60ft geodesic Booty Dome

name: Camp P3
description: This year for the 8th year in a row, we be hosting the Wedding Dress March on White Wednesday! You must join us for our annual Wedding Dress Wednesday Parade! We start with ceremony to de-corks the first champagne bottle, followed with a group toast and a dancing procession to the chapel. Who gets married….does it really matter? We have dresses and champagne!  Do you like to play dress up?  Stop by and as one of our "fashion-istas" to dress your from our endless opportunities in our boutique!  Each morning we embrace the day with Nitro Coffee and a Bloody Mary Bar or join us for a spectacular evening of bourbon tasting.  One may stop by and see the "Now-A-Saurus", the most rare of mutant vehicles.
landmark: Large Pink Tent  and RV Maori Geometric Art.

name: Salon Soleil
description: Salon Soleil is a welcoming space for personal exploration, self-expression, and interaction with other beings. We invite the Black Rock City community to visit our friendly, comfy quadruple Do-Me Domes, join our Tuesday night funk dance party, audition for a role in a Shakespeare play, enjoy one of our Healing Faires or musical therapy sessions, or gather around our burn barrel on a cold night and make new friends. Come feed your power hungry devices and fill depleted batteries at our solar charging station!
landmark: Yellow 25' shipping container ("Broccoli Box")

name: 404: Village Not Found
hometown: We have almost 200 members in the village...while most are from the W.Coast we have members from all over, including Europe.
description: 404: Village Not Found has something for everyone!  This year we are home to  M*A*S*H, Swish Embassy, Unicorner, Death Before Decaf, Banned Camp, Burner Hostel, Glowskull Asylum, Dye with Dignity.
landmark: Day:24' box truck on corner/Night: Street lights

name: Camp Pendant
description: Welcome to Camp Pendant, our Best Little Camp On The Playa! Come by and pick up one of this year's pendants, rest your weary feet, and tell us how your year has been. While you're here, don't forget to pay the *all new* Gifting Tree a visit. Whether you take a little something or leave a little something, she's here to make everyone's day a little brighter.
landmark: 6' Dr Suess Truffala-style blue & red gifting tree

name: Camp Little Bitty
description: Bus stop resting station for Burner Express riders.  Water, shade, and a helping hand for weary travelers.
landmark: Large Flags that say 'camp little bitty'.

name: Camp Skynyrd
description: An Oasis of Ignorance in a Sea of Enlightenment.
landmark: Large wooden swing in or near Gigsville.

name: Radio Electra
description: Bringing you the best music news and commentary on your FM dial for 19 years on the playa. Tune in during the event for music, news, mayhem, and commentary. Theme camps and artists are always welcome to drop off Public Service announcements about interactive events and projects they wish to have everyone know about.
landmark: Tower and Radio Electra signs on the frontage.

name: Barbie Death Village
description: Now in their 19th year, the sickest bastards on the playa are again making their presence felt.  Yes, the demented denizens of Barbie Death Village--complete with piano bar and wine bistro--are back to amaze and offend even the most jaded of burners.  Join us for a glass of Barbie burgundy, relax in the shade, or step up to the plate for Fizzball.  At Barbie Death Village, we know how to make you party.  And don't miss our exciting sub-camps, including (but not limited to): Black Rock City Body & Paint, Barbie Day Spa, Barbie Death Camp & Wine Bistro, Hookers & Makers, 13th Barbie, Clan O'Crash, Pizza Cats, and Rocket Pad.
landmark: Large lit up BDC sign 30 feet above the playa.

name: Tequila Bees
description:
Latin Night - Party with the Tequila Bees! Best music and drinks ever, really! Snag your very own glow in the dark sting'a (condom) while supplies last.
Thursday from 8-10PM
landmark: Signage "Tequila Bees"

name: Black Rock Travel Agency
description:
The Black Rock Travel Agency's Theme Camp ( established 1999) is the heart and soul of the Black Rock City Municipal Airport, providing a home for wayward pilots, airport volunteers and visitors.

BRTA hosts events throughout the week, such as the Thursday morning Pancake Breakfast and the Saturday Afternoon Airport Cocktail Party.  Come by and get a birds eye view of the airport atop the Starport crows nest.
Located at 5:00 and the Trash Fence.
landmark: 30 ft high 3 sided shade structure with crows nest

name: Major Tom's Flying Circus
description: Join Major Tom's Flying Circus to experience Black Rock City from the air in one of our microlight aircraft. Flying daily early mornings and late afternoons weather permitting. Meet us at the Ground Control Departure Lounge at BRC Airport.
landmark: Circus tent with multi-colored windsock/camp sign

name: Eurotrash Sangria Bar
description: Serving the best sangria at Burning Man, along with simple tapas and music from around the Latin world!
landmark: 20 foot red banner saying, 'Eurotrash Sangria Bar'

name: 1st Bank of BRC
description: We are the bank for the gifting economy, and we have what you need! Visit the bank each day during business hours, or visit one of our 24 hr ATMs to make a deposit or withdrawal. We offer all kinds of services that you could've never imagined, but mainly we connect burners who have items to gift and others who are searching for a certain item. Deposit your gift at the bank, we will find a good giftee and take their gratitude in exchange. You can come back later to withdraw the gratitude left by the recipient of your gift. Excellent customer service is sometimes guaranteed.
landmark: 2 story wild west bank facade

name: Camp XUZA

Camp XUZA
Home of XUZA Art Car

name: Iron Monkeys

Come re-charge with us! Scale our Tree of Life for a full panoramic view of BRC and plot your next playa adventure, chill out in our hammock jungle, grab a cold Sunshine Lemonade and dance with our resident DJs. We are fully equipped to power your FUN-O-METER.

Want more zen? Come visit during our yoga & sound bath sessions!

name: Cyborg Mazu

name: Gigsville
hometown: Los Angeles, Oakland, San Francisco, Austin, Houston, New York
description: Gigsville is one of the oldest villages on the Playa (we're turning 21 this year, hooray!). We're dedicated to fire, fun, and good old fashion jackassery. You'll find us gathered around the car that's on fire in the center of camp. No ocelots or other violations of the Gigsville Code of Conduct are allowed.
landmark: Large Red G, CarBQ

name: Nordic Paradise
description:
We are the Nordic Camp, themed Dream Chaos
We support creative ways for people to invite and interact with each other. 
Dream as an alternative universe where we all find home for ideas and a way to create eclectic various events. But creativity also needs Chaos in order to bloom in its potential. 
Dream Chaos gives the opportunity to every zone and event to be different from one another, and imagination can go beyond horizons. Our camp is a platform to help co create our members different dreams and by that we will offer a variety of events and activities in our camp.
landmark: Sign lit up

name: Burning Man Studios
description: Burning Man Studios is a diverse group of crazies from across the country and beyond that love movies, self expression, and poking fun at ourselves. Come by for a drink, some shade, or just to tell us a story.
landmark: Red carpet and lighted pathway w/ LED sign

name: Lituanica Birds
description: "Lituanica Birds is the camp whose members are brave enough to fly over the ocean every year to burn the Man since 2011."
landmark: Red flag with a bird in it.

name: Grease Fairies
description: Grease Fairies
landmark: "Grease Fairies", Logo, and Rainbow Flags

name: Illuminaughty
description: Come find your naughty side with us, evenings Tuesday through Thursday!
landmark: Eye of Providence, a 40ft high illuminated ball

name: CAMP WWIT

landmark: Intake desk signs that read "TAXI CAMP" in yellow

name: Camp Samovar
description:
Come by Camp Samovar during Sunset for Persian tea and dates.
Plus, our special Friday delight from 2-4pm serving Moscow Mules and playing Madonna!
landmark: A large circus like tent

name: Mo's Mini Martini + Erotica Camp
description: Come to Mo's for the coldest martinis and the hottest erotica on the playa. Our Bedouin tent is a mecca for people watching and tasteful conversation and our book of erotica written by you,you sexy burner, will heat you up while that martini cools you down.  Limit 13(martinis not stories).
landmark: Giant lit martini glass and bedouin tent

name: witness relocation camp
description:
Witness Relocation Camp, formerly (Silkscreen camp) 
    We have been screen printing in the dust since 2004. We print the poster, when available or the ticket on your clean white t-shirt. Remember, Dark colored shirts do not show up with process printing. It is like having black paper in your printer. We also print an image on your underwear or panties if you desire. Our return customers usually gift us packages of white t-shirts in various sizes for people that don't have white shirts with them. We usually print between 800 and 1500 t-shirts a burn, we destroy the screens when we get home, so if you get one, know that they are rare, 1 out of 700 Burners get a shirt. We have repeat  visitors that have every image since 2004. Satisfaction guaranteed or double your no money back.
landmark: White circus tent with the witness relocation camp

name: Tazii
description: Lustre Village provides a bouquet of burner pleasures from daytime glittering, in the Glitterbox, to night time movies at the Drive-by Theatre.  Join us for rest, ease, and libations in the Tazii tent chill lounge 24 hours a day, or enjoy the evening tones of our David Bowie/Talking Heads cover band.
landmark: Large Moroccan tent in the public access area

name: TRANCESEND
description: TRANCESEND - OPEN YOUR MIND, BODY, AND SOUL TO THE POWER OF TRANCE - join us for some uplifting and melodic electronic music
landmark: TRANCESEND Camp Signage with Blue LEDS

name: Camp Shit Ain't Right
landmark: green "Camp Shit Ain't Right" sign

name: ParTea Animals
description: Home Camp presents Sky Mandala Par-tea, Californian built Sky mandalas adorn our camp where English Tea is served to make you feel at Home. We are a US/UK based theme camp that wants to represent Home for both our cultures and unite our friendship that was created at Black Rock City.
landmark: BEAUTIFUL SKY MANDALAS AND "HOME" FRONT DOOR

name: Wonder Camp
description: Wonder Camp is a place to bring your broken bicycle, art project, mutant vehicle, etc. Come with a tee shirt for a print and a worn body for a massage.
landmark: 6 pendant flags, and a carnival front.

name: CAMP JUICY
description:
FRESH AND FROZEN FRUIT SMOOTHIES NOON-4.MON-THURS
DJs spin filthy beats, bring your crew!
landmark: CAMP JUICY SIGN

name: Corporation Chaos
description: Corporation Chaos® ("We Own You!™") has existed since 2012 as an "unofficial" camp, and will be running both repeat and novel activities in its (hopefully) first year of official placement.  We will consolidate our previous camp roster with a handful of participants previously affiliated with Plays Well With Others and Brand-Ur-Ass.  We feature a wide variety of activities centered on philosophy, science, technology, art, and games.  We also offer public space for discussions, relaxation, and education.
landmark: Black and white flag with name and chaos star

name: Spirit Dream
description: Chords of light coming down and woven into the tapestry of the land.  Living waters spring forth and bring refreshment, healing, and freedom.  Come and rest in the Coffee Dome. Share a cup of espresso brewed with intention. Open your spirit and receive revelation in the Encounter Tent. Truth, comfort, refreshing, cleansing, transformation, peace and love flow into you with no limits. Fill your cup and then return for more. It's all here for you. Join us for our 15th year of loving people and the land. Welcome home.
landmark: 3 vertical Spirit Dream signs along the frontage

name: Mighty Misfits
description:
mis-fit: a person whose behavior or attitude sets them apart from others in an uncomfortably, conspicuous way. "a motley collection of social mistfits";
synonyms: nonconformist, eccentric, maverick, individualist, square peg in a round hole. The Mighty Misfits is a camp that celebrates the misfit in everyone. Check our listings for events and join us to celebrate the misfit in you.
landmark: Mighty Misfit lighted sign

name: Thumper
hometown: Colorado, Boston, Indianapolis, Seattle, San Francisco
description: Get lucky shopping in the best boutique on the playa, Thumper's Lucky Hutch. Clothes, accessories, jewelry, champagne, beats; all 100% off.
landmark: Thumper flag and chrome sexbots on the curb.

name: Camp Touch This
description: Camp Touch This is diverse crew of artists, tradespeople, medical professionals, teachers, seasoned Burners and virgins. Come climb our 4 Story Cuddle Puddle, ride the Teeter Totter, or enjoy one of our frozen drinks parties. Wet Woody Wednesday starts around 5pm on Wednesday and is not to be missed!
landmark: 4 story scaffolding, lit up in red lights at night

name: VooDoo Soup
description:
VooDoo Soup
Hot craft soups, day and night, available when the "soups on" sign is lit.  A great piano and live music. Miso and tea and soda most of the time.
landmark: multiple white tent peaks, 20-26ft in the air.

name: Brainy Bar
description: Brainy Bar - a neighborhood dive bar that welcomes dreamers, schemers, and big thinkers. We're also the home of Hobby Horse (of course) - Black Rock City's longest running stick horse equestrian event.  Time travelers welcome.
landmark: Big red sign with yellow letters out front

name: MAXA
description: Maxa Camp is centered on the promotion of unity and recognition of past cultures and ancestral heritage. Our camp will be a representation of the deeply rooted, ancient beliefs of the Mexican and Huichol communities combined with the contemporary views of a community of our own.
landmark: Deer

name: Camp Chomp and Stomp
description: Chomp and Stomp - a team of makers and shakers. Find us in camp for decadent leisure, merry making and bloody marys.
landmark: FLAGS flag and the massive CHOMP tarp.

name: The Lost Penguin Cafe
description:
The Lost Penguins have proudly been a theme camp since 2001.  Our founders dream was to establish a hospitality camp where all burners are welcome and made to feel at home.  We have expanded on that dream and are proud to welcome Burners into our Cafe in 2018. 

Our cafe as a place for burners to chill on our couches and seating and listen to music.  We emphasis hospitality and greeting burners into our cafe and serving wine and chocolate and snow cones and penguin pee (vodka and lemonade drink).   To go with this year's theme, we have our space ship and the Penguin oracle to answer all of burner questions.  We are a camp that provides space for musicians, poets and others at Open Mic times, and welcome burners who want to participate in an informal open mic and music experience.   We have music equipment set up or bring your own.  Burners who are musicians can check in with our Entertainment lead and schedule time to perform.    And music is scheduled throughout the day and night.
landmark: mutli  colored sign that says "The Lost Penguins"

name: Dustopia
description: The Dustopia Collective is a group of makers that work on overlapping projects for Burning Man and beyond.
landmark: Metal Cacti and Metal Sculptures

name: dust & stars
description: pose with our rainbow galaxy wings! join our cult. take or leave something on our gifting tree! join our cult. the robots have won. get anointed with glitter! what's your name again? join our cult. come warm up by our fire! stare into the flames. swallow the stars before they go out; the endless night is coming. join our cult.
landmark: big wooden stars and rainbow wings

name: Born To Roam
description: A crowd sourced, communal photo experiment.
landmark: Born To Roam Sign and White wooden towers.

name: Camp Babe
description: Camp Babe is an art support camp with fun and outgoing characters from Colorado, Utah, California, Hawaii, and then some. Looking for a good conversation or a fun adventure? Stop on by!
landmark: two tarp (green n blue) shade structure/ airstream

name: Lunar Disco
description:
Lunacy with a Pinch of Disco. Follow the sound, follow the moon.
For all intergalactic Burners on the dark side of the moon: Daily Sunset Discos – gyrate while you howl at the setting sun! Disco Mac(& Cheese) Tues/Sun! Zero Gravity. Disco Nap. Time, Space & Heart Exploration. Teleport your body & mind with Art, Dance & Music. & Get your moon all shined up with a moon massage!
landmark: Black sign board with cutout letters "Lunar Disco"

name: In Queso Emergency
description: Interstellar Business Cafe welcomes business travelers from all dimensions and galaxies for breakfast tacos and iced coffee every day from noon to 2pm. Spaceships in approved parking spots only.
landmark: Orange and Blue Diner lighting, & tall LED spatula

name: Reverbia
description: Reverbia is an All Live Music Camp, known as The Portal of Live Music at Burning Man.  Reverbia features International, National, and Regional Touring Acts.  Reverbia schedules each day with the following:  Calm Inside (breathe, stretch), our very popular Live Music Yoga in The Morning, Dancing Before Noon (Live Music Dance Workshops)...Song, Dust, Sing (Black Rock City's premier open mic and singer/songwriter showcase on an amazing sound system), Concerts in the Shade Series, and Reverbia Live Nights on our Main Stage.  Two other venues host late night music: Our LED Interactive Radiance Dome (lots of live looping and chill music) and our Jam and Teahouse (acoustic solo artists, duos, trios), where you can get hot chai and exotic teas to soothe your late night last hours.   Reverbia will also feature: Tribute to Lost Musicians (honoring musicians who passed away 2017-2018), Dance of the 7 Chakras, Classical Sunsets (BYOWine), and the sound interactive space...The Ninth Node.
landmark: The Radiance Dome- a beacon of light and color.

name: Xpander
description: Xpander practices the principles of mind body and soul expansion. Come by for an afternoon craft beer tasting, stay for the yoga/bodywork and excellent music in our Xpander Dome.
landmark: Large Wooden X in front of camp

name: Math Camp @ Group W
description: Math Camp @ Group W is A Safe Place for Mathematics:  A small, social camp, offering a place to Drink and DErive!  Daily lectures and long-winded impromptu chats on all things Math related.  We are proud Purveyors of Crunchy Snacks, Servers of Pie at 3:14, plus we have The Best Friday Morning Sunrise Cocktail Party on the playa (not to mention home of the fabulous Electric Cupcakes).
landmark: 24' tall Sierpinski Pyramid structure

name: Breakaway Republic
description: Get a new, better Playa Name from our drunk Playa Name Robot. Get new, better nightmares and be horrified by our 100-strong Robot Gerbil Choir. Top it all off with a game of bocce ball and a drink at our cosy Bar De Nom.
landmark: Playa Names Sign with Red-haired manakin outside

name: Ranger Camp Moscow
description: Staff camp for Black Rock Rangers
landmark: Ranger Camp Moscow

name: Camp 11:11
description: Celebrate 11:11--11:11 is a catalyst to unite people. It's a totally vertical moment in time. Make a wish at 11:11. Have a shot, give a kiss, or smoke a smoke at 11:11. Flame on at 11:11. Orgasm at precisely 11:11. Does anyone know what time is it? Its 11:11. Come help us discover 11:11 at Camp 11:11
landmark: The large black & white 11:11 flag flying overhead

name: Ranger Outpost Berlin
description: Ranger Outpost Berlin
landmark: Ranger Outpost Berlin

name: Ranger Outpost Tokyo
description: Ranger Outpost Tokyo
landmark: Ranger Outpost Tokyo

name: Costco Soulmate Trading Outlet
description: Costco Soulmate Trading Outlet is Burning Man's leading provider of low-cost, high-quality soulmates since 1998. We offer quality name brand and private-label soulmates at substantially lower prices than can be found through conventional wholesale sources. Costco soulmates include many products unavailable at other soulmate chains and at substantially lower prices. With a large store and a huge inventory, we are able to offer a variety not found at other chains.
landmark: large "COSTCO Soulmate Trading Outlet" sign.

name: Ranger Headquarters
description: Rangers Headquarters
landmark: Black Rock Rangers Headquarters

name: Camp Trip and Fall
description: Camp Trip & Fall; we are ambient drummers who drum for the man burns and hold daily sunset drum circles at our camp regularly.
landmark: Venice Beach Drum Circle Flag

name: Spice N Vice
description: Spice N Vice – offers Bedouin hospitality every day from 12-5 p.m. Visit us for some hot or cold chai tea and treats. Relax in an authentic Bedouin tent, share your stories and make new friends. Workshops and regional meet-ups take place after 4pm. The playa home for China Regional Community.
landmark: Red tent on poles, adjuscent 10' spiraling tower.

name: Karaoke Kafe
description: Release your inner rock star! Grab the mic and sing in front of our Live Band or croon your favorite song on standard digital karaoke, or just listen and relax in our comfy couches in the Big Blue Tent.
landmark: Big Blue Tent

name: Free Squirt Camp
description:
Free Squirt Camp is an art support camp that offers a squirt yard to cool off on the outside and an ink well for the 21+ looking for a cool black colored drink. We would love to meet you, stop on by and say hi.
Have a squirt on us!
landmark: ink well bar

name: Inappropirates
description: Avast ye blearly-eyed landlubbers! Drink deeply from the bottomless depths of our coffee! Walk the dreaded Strip Plank or find yourselves locked in the pillory (spanking optional)! Coffee Mon.-Fri. 9am-11am.
landmark: Inappropirates sign and skull and crossboners flag

name: BuddhaCamp @ the Lotus Dome
description: BuddhaCamp @ the Lotus Dome will help you find your inner Buddha...and caffeinate it for all of your playa adventures. Learn to chant Nam Myoho Renge Kyo, meditate with us, and receive expert advice from our Buddhist life coaches-- all while sipping on the best espresso on the playa. Looking for Gongyo or Daimoku on the playa? New to Buddhism? Buddhist-curious? Just really a cup of coffee? We're here for you.
landmark: "BuddhaCamp" signs and the blue and purple dome

name: A Shack of Sit
description: A Shack of Sit, where Sit happens!  At various times throughout the week you can come and get braided, painted, tattooed, Embigginated, projected, photographed, entertained, and relaxed. We are home to great conversation and fun activities. Please check the What When Where for scheduled activities! Your chair is always waiting!
landmark: Giant Snowflake of Snowflake Village & Our Sign

name: Kidsville
description: Kidsville is a village of kid oriented theme camps and individual family camps. We provide a safe haven from which to explore the magic of Burning Man!
landmark: Rainbow flags with Kidsville on them

name: Simian Akademy
description:
Bike broken and nowhere to turn?  Well, you may be 'all thumbs' but if at least two are opposable, we can help you fix it!  (And if not, we'll help you break it altogether!)  Here at Simian Akademy, our mission is to help you gain the skills necessary to adapt to today's dynamic, ever-changing playa environment.  Our dedicated team of trained monkeys will show you where it goes and how to work it.  If a trained monkey can do it, you can too!

Looking for a truly unique and interactive experience?  Come visit the Olfactorium where our Mistress of Scent will concoct a custom perfume just for you, based on your unique, personal preferences.

Feeling cranky from the heat?  Your new best friend getting on your nerves already?  You need to CHILL THE FUCK OUT AND COLOR!  Come visit our shaded dome to relax and color your frustrations away.  Choose your favorite, beautifully embellished swear word, or perhaps a picture of unicorns being total assholes!
landmark: tree sculpture & dome with 6 antennas

name: Necessarily Bureaucratic Burritos
description: Have you been missing long DMV lines and sitting on hold with your ISP? If your week at BRC isn't providing you with enough of that classic city bureaucracy, stop by and get a dose from us. Burritos, shade, and tasty beverages can all be yours if you can brave the burriteaucracy!
landmark: big burrito stamp

name: Prismaticamp
description: A community of LED light artists. Join us each night at dusk for prismatic reception, the interactive LED Pleasure Dome, and our nightly community LED procession to the night Playa.  Also see the schedule for daytime interactive activities including LED fabrication/programming classes, Yoga classes, and Zen Bell ritual.
landmark: geodesic LED dome on the corner

name: Fairy Wood
description: Stop stealing the city's street signs, you selfish bastards! FairyWood provides the materials to make your own replica BRC street sign. Charging station and treasure chest too.
landmark: Green parachute shade with an antenna above it.

name: Black Rock City Welding & Repair
description: Come to Black Rock City Welding & Repair for welding, bicycle repair, adjustment and general tinkering help. Use our tools to fix your bike yourself at our self repair booth!  Already well-adjusted?  Join us at our daytime Bar and Dance Club IGNITE for mostly pre Y2K music!  Stop by to enjoy a short climb and great view from one of our Tall Couches. Need a sign or something painted?  Come see War Rabbit at the Sign Making and Paint Anything booth.  Learn Fresco at one of the Fresco painting classes.  Learn Wool Pin Felting.  Come on over and warm yourself at the Night-Time Warming Station and enjoy a friendly hotdog on a cold night.
landmark: Yellow camp signs with red lettering and artwork.

name: Half-Ass
description: Camp Half-Ass is a group of fun loving individuals that has been bringing Peace, Love, and Laughter to the Playa since 2006. Come enjoy our GIANT MOANING SEE-SAW, infamous Bike Bar, Art Installations, and Beer Garden Parties.
landmark: Golden figure with raised arms, getting blow job

name: Anonymous Village
description: Anonymous Village provides safe, sheltered, shaded venues for 12-step groups to hold meetings and to gather and help one another.  It is also a drug and alcohol-free space for participants to camp during the event (please pre-register at www.burnanon.org ).
landmark: Circle and triangle symbol

name: Cuntry Club
description: The Cuntry Club -- Bring Your "O"!
landmark: Banner w/girl in martini glass and "Cuntry Club"

name: Rancho Sparkle Pony-The Reckoning
hometown: Bridgeport, CT Wagon Mound, NM Monterrey, CA Santa Cruz, CA Maine, Oregon, BC
description: Rancho Sparkle Pony and the world-famous Buddha Lounge return to serve and protect the errant sparkle ponies of the playa.  A bevy of true grit interactivity, we are bigger and better than we have ever been.  Stop by to fill your cup, shake your ass, and kick-start our robot.  We love you Burning Man!
landmark: Dome with the big PONY sign, Buddha Lounge sign

name: Pigmalions
description:
Don't be a Boar by yourself, come play with the Pigs! We've been hosting our famous daytime
party on the Playa since 2001. Our fabulous bartenders hog-craft each and every Bloody Mary
we make with over 10 different ingredients. Sizzling strips of pork are hoof-served to the
squealing swine wallowing on our shaded sofas. All vegetarians are welcomed....to be converted.
It'll be sooieet!
landmark: Pink pig flag

name: Camp Hotdog
description: We are the HotDog. Come meat us.
landmark: Streetside hot dog flags

name: Black Rock City Piano Bar
description: Not active yet.
landmark: "6ft X 4ft lite logo affixed above the entrance.

name: Cafe Sua Da
description: Come enjoy an Vietnamese Iced Coffee or a refreshing flavored tonic at Cafe Sua Da, and bask in the summer heat of an afternoon in Saigon. We welcome anyone and everyone to enjoy our space and our coffee and tonics.
landmark: Cafe Sua Da Iced Coffee Sign / Monkey Hut

name: Chai Lounge
description: Freedom Lounge is an all inclusive, interactive camp creating "positive space" for life redefinement, enlightenment, direction, purpose and energized "restart" to navigate the future.  Our camp is all about LIFE and displacement of negativity with an emphasis on actively resurrecting dead dreams and creating new pathways from lifes deraliments.  Offerings include,  dream interpretation, label removal, organic alignment, original root recovery, "white light" specials and other infusions that guide and direct us.
landmark: Freedom Lounge banner solar perimeter lights

name: 7 Sirens Cove
description: A pirate bohemia where merrymaking, gypsy lounging, dancing rhythms and mischief run aground.  Beware, it is futile to resist the 7 Siren's call!
landmark: Large Pirate Ship and Crows Nest!

name: DinerTown
description: DinerTown is a 24-hour 1950s diner with a burner-twist, run by a bunch of loopy Canadians that should never have been let out unsupervised.
landmark: big 'Diner 24 Hours' sign

name: Prometheatrics
description:
Bringing the gift of Fire to humanity since the dawn of time, Prometheatrics has been a part of Black Rock City since 2002. Historically located on the Esplanade, our theme camp hosts a fine collection of interactive installations and helpful hosts ready to surprise and delight you!

Step inside the temporally anomalous Tesseract, where you'll experience yourself as you truly are: infinite! Trace your face with our Self Portrait Studio and take home your masterpiece, or shoot a selfie in Clesthyra's Eye. Enjoy a bounce on our delightful Danpoline or enter the dream-space of the Infinitipi. On your way into or out of our domain, admire all the colors of Burning Man through the radiant Rainbow Scrim, or cast your fortune on our giant I-Ching.

Join us at dusk and dawn at our mirrored stage for twice-daily fire spinning jams, where there's always a safety on duty and all wicks are welcome. We're honored to be a part of what makes our city magical, and eager to share what makes us shine!
landmark: Tripod of Aluminum I-beams w/ 4" Welded Steel Cube

name: Camp Safari
description: Home of the Safari Bar, where a spin of the Safari Wheel will determine your liquid fate.  Photo ops, animal hunting, and other dusty games... it wouldn't be a Safari without 'em.
landmark: mating lion photo op and Safari Bar signage

name: Black Rock Astronomical Society
description: Come look at the moon, Jupiter, and Orion, our name sake, at night. Bring the kids.
landmark: the banner "Black Rock Astronomical Society"

name: RhythmWave
description:
Tremendously gratefull to return to Black Rock City in 2018, for our 12th consecutive year at Burning Man!

RhythmWave is dedicated to the practice of Conscious Dance as a moving meditation. With no experience necessary and no "steps" to learn, Conscious Dance offers a path, different for each person, and the destination is the discovery of ourselves and a return to our center.

Facilitators from around the globe offer multiple daily sessions of Conscious Dance and movement on our 2,500 sq.ft., fully shaded and easily-accessible bamboo dance floor. RW also hosts morning yoga and meditation, as well as workshops and intention circles throughout the week.

All citizens of Black Rock City are always invited to bless the bamboo at RhythmWave. Please join us!
landmark: Bamboo dance floor and 50x60 shade

name: Turbaza Chayka
description: Camp "Turbaza Chayka" is all about spreading love for Burning Man , inclusive culture, joy, happiness with the side of vodka and good music. Come chill with us in the heat of the day and we will warm you up in the cold of the night!
landmark: the large strobe light on top of a bar

name: Alter Ego
description: Camp Alter Ego wants to create experiences through art that challenge and expand one's sense of self.
landmark: The ALTER EGGO Sign on top of our structure

name: Planet Earth
description: Black Rock Cities indoor New Wave Nightclub, bringing you "Music with Words" 8 nights in a row from 8pm to 4am, eight nights in a row from Opening Night through Temple Burn.
landmark: 40 ft wall-entrance that  says "PLANET EARTH"

name: Rogue Nation Village
description:
Rogue Nation Village is home to a group of camps from the Pacific Northwest: Kreme Burners, Kona Zona, SeaWEED, and Dope Sauce.
Seattle's diverse village for the amazing French dessert Crème Brulée TWICE during the burn, authentic Mexican tacos, quesadillas, margaritas, a full bar, a piano lounge, a hookah lounge, outdoor games (trampoline, balance boards) and a big chill space known as "Comfort" to host various workshops.
landmark: Large Dodecagon floating Int'l, Earth, Pride flags

name: Swoon
description: A sensual space made of rope, light, softness, and of course love. Hosted by the creators of Shibari Sanctuary, an artwork at BM 2017.
landmark: Red rope exploding out 13 feet into the air

name: MindShark
description: MindShark is a community of neuroscientists, engineers, and artists who have pledged their crotches and cerebral cortices to stoke the eternal flame that blazes at the core of every individual, friend, and stranger. We all come to Burning Man to explore our inner selves; let MindShark guide your awakening with gifts of science, fire, and light. Enjoy the coldest beer on the playa at our bar, watch hippies burn on our interactive fire displays, and blow your mind(s) under our amazing responsive light shows.
landmark: Our firey pipework gateway bearing our camp's name

name: Freaks United Karma Collective
description:
FUCK - Freaks United Karma Collective

Come enjoy dozens of options of flavored ice water in our cozy lounge! Bring your vocal cords, your musical instrument or grab one of ours and come jam at our stage.
landmark: Purple FUKC flag

name: ZaZen
description: Camp ZaZen the place to find peace on the playa and home to Elvis Espresso, come get your morning cup of JO!
landmark: Tie Dye Flags and ZAZEN Gate

name: Inflatable Wildlife
description: Join the elite group of Inflatable Wildlife Intelephants for Historical Readings, Bocce, a Pre-Sunrise Party, Unbirthday Party and Open Bars! Mingle, Lounge, Dance - The Inflatable Wildlife Intelephants bring the self-aware jungle to you!
landmark: Inflated elephants (pink and gray)

name: Tectonic
description: Come bask in the shade of our fire-poofing volcano, and boogie to our ground-shaking beats while we serve you a refreshing iced libation. Don't forget to bring us your playa virgins to sacrifice to the volcano god and be sure to search for the poofer trigger!  Poof!
landmark: 3 giant candycorn volcanoes shooting fire!

name: Jake's Tent
description: Games, Drinks and Activities Planned for anyone to walk up and participate in. People are welcome to take a load off under our shade structure while we hand out spiked lemonade or tea.
landmark: Pink Bar with Charcutterie pig outline

name: Kaleidoscope Collective
description: Kaleidoscope means "the observation of beautiful forms", but we know you look into a kaleidoscope and see a beautiful mess. That's just what we are. We bring people together through the power of connection paired with a healthy dose of sarcasm. Kaleidoscope Collective. Come with an open mind. We'll take care of the rest.
landmark: Garden of Eden

name: Bitchin' Braid Camp
description: Hair harshing your mellow? Come by the Bitchin' Braid Camp and we will braid those nappy worries away and have you back in action in no time flat. (Actually 30 min on average)
landmark: Large red K in front of the bar.

name: Toxic Disco Clam
description: In the default world, the Toxic Disco Clam is a real aquatic creature. It uses its luminous lips to attract passing fish... and then it immobilizes them with acidic snot. We're pretty much the same: we draw you in with dazzling lights and entertaining activities, we ply you with our intoxicating beverages, and we hope you never leave (we promise less snot).
landmark: Blue and red shade sails in front of a GIANT zook

name: What'sYourSign? Camp
description: What's Your Sign? Camp provides raw materials to paint and create SIGNS! Burners, you are invited to come and use our brushes paints, markers, sign bases, and stencils to design and express whatever you can dream up. Take these signs home to wear, to hang at your camp, to post up, or help decorate Burning Man street signs to replace the ones that go missing!
landmark: PATCHWORK TENT

name: Sharkey's Bar and Lounge
hometown: Global - LA, SF, London, Austin, Tacoma, Amsterdam, Paris, Sidney....we're from all over the globe!
description: Known as the Preferable Party Past the Porta-Potties where Peni and Pagina Play on the Pre-Playa-Plaza-Playground...Sharkey's Bar and Lounge is a destination spot to "get your drink on"! Each day, we serve an ice cold libation guaranteed to cool you down and pick you up (unless you have too many!). We have games, music in the lounge, shade and every afternoon we are host to the infamous game called, "What Would You Do for a Klondike Bar?" - well???  Come and find out!!
landmark: The Golden Gate Bridge entrance

name: HARDLY
description: Hardly Saloon for your 24 hour Whisky rush
landmark: look for the big, red letter H 40' in the air.

name: Mos Eisley Village
description:
"You will never find a more wretched hive of scum and villainy." 
Obi-Wan Kenobi
landmark: Multiple Large Domes/Pagoda-large Mos Eisley Signs

name: Irrelephant Bird Camp
description: Colorful eyebrows? CHECK! Dunking Contest? CHECK! Juice Smoothies? CHECK! Yatch rock? Jock rock? Not rock? Check, check, and check!
