Trying to get a handle on what we do here at Irrelephant Bird Camp? Don't even try it. Just come by and get a little silly with us, touch base with reality, or take a nap overseas.
landmark: Surf lounge with painted beach backdrop

name: StarPups
description: Psychedelic Puppy welcomes all for a daily caffeine fix of cold-brew coffee in the morning and fun coffee-based drinks at night!  Enjoy our daily workshops and cuddle up with a friend while watching the psychedelic LED visuals of our puppy dome.
landmark: Dog-head shaped dome.

name: Cult of the Magic Lady
description: Cult of the Magic Lady has all your classy and non classy needs!  From our Black Rock Self Service Abortion Clinic (where our motto is "We bring out the kid in you"... and who doesn't love a tasty jello shot filled fetus?) to our Parched Koi Lounge (with beautiful decorations and morning shameful danishes), we've got what you need.  Don't forget to swing by for a book from our lending library!
landmark: Cult of the Magic Lady Sign

name: There Ain't No Virgin Mary
hometown: San Clemente, CA.... we have participated in SD YouTopia in the past
description:
Get Yer Cowboy On!  Get Yer Hat on!  Get yer day drinking started right!
Join us for some Bloody Mary's and Bloody Maria's in the morning.  Kick up your heels and stomp your boots to our favorite country music and enjoy some interactive games of your choice...
landmark: Wine barrels and salon door

name: Pepperland
description: PEPPERLAND - Our great, welcoming camp is a 12-year landmark, with all kinds of fun and diverse, active participation for everyone on the Playa. See our colorful website, too, for more smiles, fun, and info: https://www.facebook.com/groups/198208360209399/ , and see even more.
landmark: 10' wide, colorful "PEPPERLAND" sign atop our camp

name: Pickled Beats
description: We're Toneage!  Come see us for a Playa Pickletini at the Dilly Dally Bar, and dance to Pickled Beats!
landmark: 10ft X 6ft stand, green & black, 1800 sqft shade

name: Playa Biker Bear / Spin Cycle
description: "Playa Bike Repair" is both a service and a theme camp. ON-Playa:  We run a "Bike Lounge," with a bar, music, shade, and tools. Mechanics drop in. Friendly, nurturing, and supportive, they will gladly help you fix your bike! Last year, we helped over 4000 people fix their bikes! PRE-Playa, we offer bike rentals and transport; your support funds Playa Bike Repair.  Volunteers, mechanics, and campmates wanted.
landmark: 40' tall rotating illuminated bicycle

name: Two-Stroke Transit
description: Got questions about your two-stroke engine?  Maybe you just like to rev up your engine and make a lot of noise?  Come on down to Two-Stroke Transit to talk to us.  While here, you can find out how to prevent playa damage from dripping oil while improving your engine's performance.
landmark: -Signboard with markers.  Grey shade structure.

name: The Real Dilla
description: RealDilla. A fun loving group of burners from Sacramento geared up to serve you Quesadillas and libations and dance, party and play with you!
landmark: War Rig

name: Deoxidized
description: dEOxidized Camp is about creating community no matter where you are - even on the far reaches of the playa. Our camp is comprised of members of an Entrepreneurs Organization along with guests from around the world. Together, we will co-create an unforgettable experience with our community of friends old and new. Come join us every day in the dEOxidized Oasis, our lounge-type chill space featuring a 50' parachute shade structure, an open bar, live DJs and music. We’ll be hosting talks and classes in the mornings and daily happy hours from 4PM to sunset. Come meet our international crew from across the U.S. and more than a half dozen other countries. We are a diverse group of Burners with much to share and look forward to meeting you!
landmark: Parachute, 10' carved wooden dEOxidized sign

name: Barbie Death Camp
description: Barbie Death Camp:  The sickest bastards on the Playa, still serving fine wine in cheap paper cups.  Come by and be offended 24/7.
landmark: Look for the large lit BDC sign 30' above ground.

name: LAF Lazy-Ass Fuckers
hometown: New Orleans, Buffalo, Yellowknife, Israel, Florida, Puerto Rico, Pittsburgh, Italy, Long Beach, Lake Tahoe, Los Angeles,
description: The Lazy Ass Fuckers are back in their lackadaisical glory. Come chill in our neon dome, relaxation station or drum circle. Or just stop by for some lazy ass laughs!
landmark: windmill man and the LAFer banner

name: Martini Camp
description: For good drinks, fun and games, come find Martini Camp located within Martini Village!
landmark: Yellow tent, Martini Glass on top N bright red bar

name: Soft Landing
description: Camp Soft Landing offers a comfortable space to drink tea, hydrate, and rest in our Full Circle Tea House. Soft Landing also presents the Palenque Norte speaker series featuring 40 visionary talks and stories spanning concepts such as technology, community organization, medicine, art, science, design and entheobotany.
landmark: Large 60' white circus tent

name: )*(Aloha = H'Aloha
description: Camp H'Aloha is a Playanesian Paradise replete with libations, shade, fire, Musubi, and Aloha for all!
landmark: Flag covered shade with Hawaiian flag 20ft pole

name: The New Barbarians
description: Moving beyond the confines of a traditional food camp, The New Barbarians quest to provide subsistence and endless comfort in a desert land full of desire, self-discovery, and radical transformation.  Come join our barbarian tribe from 1-2:30pm daily to participate in our dusty savage nourishment project!
landmark: Giant Wooden T-Rex

name: Black Rock City Body & Paint
description: Come by Black Rock City Body & Paint, tucked away inside of  Barbie Death Village, on Friday to have your chests painted by one of our "Playa Picassos" while being serenaded on the piano and drinking the finest of cheap box wine.  This is the go-to camp to be decorated for Critical Tits.
landmark: 1400 Barbies right next door.

name: Yummy RUMInations
hometown: LA, NYC, SF Bay Area, Seattle, Miami
description: Playfully-mindful camp uniting burners through laughter, curiosity, and consciousness.  Daily experiments in vulnerability, intimacy, self-discovery, storytelling, workshops and home of The Yum Cart...people leave with a smile and often come back for seconds.
landmark: "YUM" Cart and/or shade tent w/ colorful spandex

name: Afterglow
description: Afterglow, that wonderful feeling that lingers long after the experience has elapsed—a feeling that only occurs when the mind, body, and soul has been ever so stimulated. We are a diverse camp of capoeiristas, musicians, artists, dancers, performers and all around bad mamajamas!
landmark: Our giant afterglow archway (aka "Archie")

name: CAMP COCKATOO
description: Nomad Lounge serving Ramen and Hot Towels with Pot Tong
landmark: CAMP COCKATOO ARTWALK WITH YELLOW CRAWFISH FLAG

name: BRC Wheels On Meals
description: BRC Wheels on Meals - Food coming at you at 5MPH, Circle of Necessities a.k.a., Camp go Nowhere and Stair Ramps to Heaven all live here.
landmark: Blue ice house tent and Wheels on Meals banner

name: Dusty Taint
description: The Dusty Taint Camp was born in the style of a Juke Joint featuring drinking, games, and a welcoming social atmosphere. We are a fun loving, welcoming group of burners with a camp focused on laughs, shenanigans, and getting to know our fellow burners.
landmark: black metal lighted cutout sign

name: Dusty Justice
description: Everybody loves to sue everybody else in the good old U.S. of A! So we here at Camp Dusty Justice are celebrating that practice and bringing an open, slightly impartial, fun venue for Burners of all stripes to get their dusty dirty day in court. Bring your case! You will be heard! Is it your noisy neighbor? (we had one!) Did your best childhood friend make out with your girlfriend? (a real issue from last year) Did a campmate drink your last cold beer? Maybe it was just your turn to drive the art car. Whatever the dispute, our jurist will sort it out. We will hold court three times during the week or if an emergency arises. Join us Monday afternoon, Wednesday afternoon and Friday afternoon from 3-6 for fun, laughs, and some serious judgments and some wicked punishments.
landmark: Huge Dusty Justice Signs

name: ARTery Pavilion
description: The Burning Man Art Department's headquarters in Black Rock City. Home of the ARTery, Art Support Services (ASS), Fire Art Safety Team (FAST) and Eyes on Art.
landmark: white building with Everywhere and ARTery signs

name: SIZE DOESN'T MATTER
description:
Size Doesn't Matter
We're a small, cozy, and inviting camp that welcomes any and all shapes and sizes.
landmark: Flying Prayer Flags/Green Size Doesn't Matter sign

name: Art Car Bus Stop
description: Art Car Bus Stop is  A spontaneous autonomous municipal service. Do you desperately crave the civil structure? Hail Yeah, hurry up and wait!
landmark: Blue Pyramid with 20' Flagpole & Purple ACBS Flag

name: The Big Red Toolbox
description:
The name says it all. Black Rock City Hardware Shoppe will be on-site with a variety of tools and supplies to help build or repair just about anything on the playa. We are proud to have spent over 15 years serving Black Rock City in this capacity.
We have hand tools, power tools, nails, nuts, bolts, tape, string, wire, paint, bike tools, automotive tools, glue, rivets, and whatever else we can manage to fit on the truck. We enjoy helping people work on art projects and helping camps who have suffered structural difficulties, but we also help with minor automotive problems, generator issues, and fix an inordinate amount of bikes. Whatever people bring us, we'll try and fix if we can. We do not have lots of raw building materials, like 2x4s, PVP pipes, or plywood, but do have a need/want bulletin board to connect gifts with needs. The Playa often provides!
landmark: Metal sign that says "Black Rock City Hardware"

name: Lazy Skool Daze
description: Lazy Skool Daze brings back your school days-- with an adult twist. Come join us for Drunk 90s Singalong, Recess, and sunset cuddles and drinks!
landmark: giant alphabet blocks and big trampoline

name: Drive-By Theatre
description: Drive-By Theatre brings you the best classic cinema of yesteryear.  At night.  And zebra-esque sectional couches.  To sit on.
landmark: Large Moroccan festival tent known as "Tazii"

name: Monks of Funk
landmark: Dance Church

name: FURngully
description: Come explore the lush jungles of FURngully... a sensory exploration nighttime experience.
landmark: Blacklight Tree Tower

name: Boonville Camp
landmark: Red stage curtains, small "Boonville" sign

name: TechnoGecko Grotto
description: The makers of DiscoFish have embarked on a grand project to make something bigger and better, the all-electric TechnoGecko. Whether you've loved the DiscoFish for many years, or whether you're new to Burning Man this year, you're welcome to come by to meet her younger sibling, the TechnoGecko.
landmark: TechnoGecko camp sign, or brightly lit TechnoGecko

name: China Village
description: Tattoo, Chinese BBQ, Karaoke, Chinese alcohol and tea, electrical charger
landmark: big Chinese flag

name: Clamp Camp
description: Come ride  the LOCO Motive, brought to you by Cloud City!   It looks like an old school steam train from a distance, but up close it's full of dizzy, spinning, optical illusions.
landmark: LOCO Motive mutant vehicle, Cloud City sign

name: Bad Asstronauts
description: Space and black light themed LGBT friendly camp based in Denver, Colorado.
landmark: Large blue archway "space port", blue lasers

name: Invisible Pink Unicorns
description: We are Invisible Pink Unicorns camp! Our major mission on Burning Man - make random people happy for a moment. We believe that nothing can compare to the fabulous sensation of suddenly being hugged by a dozen unicorns in soft pink fur coats (faux fur of course!). We gift these moments of pure happiness to strangers of the Playa. Most often during sunrise.
landmark: lot of lamps at the entrance

name: Solo Solos camp
description: Let's become a man's feeling and try making a map of Playa.
landmark: There is art in the form of Playa and flags .

name: T.B.C.
description: T.B.C. is a collective of like minded individuals creating new experiences and pushing the limits of art, love and interaction.
landmark: TBC sign, Glow in the Dark basketball court.

name: Old Gregg's Place
description:
You like Bailey's? Yea, we do too. It's salty, creamy beige. Mmmm...creamy.
Come get funky with us at Camp Old Gregg, where the Bailey's, creamy..., is free flowing, and the funk music is happening! Manginas and tutus are encouraged and accepted!
landmark: Large orange domes

name: Kurenivka
description:
Ukraine is very radical: we have gone through Chernobyl, we gave this planet its largest aircraft and two Klitschko brothers. It is important for us to introduce Ukraine as radically good. This means that we should dispense with references to our radical achievements, but don't go unnoticed! 

Cossacks, our heroic ancestors, really loved to fight. When the opportunity arose, the Cossacks gathered from all over Ukraine in a secret place and organized their life in a very strange way: think of something between a pirate's lair and the Shaolin monastery. 

As burners do, Cossacks from different regions of Ukraine settled camps together, and each camp was called 'Kooren.' This ancient word is saved as the name of one of the most remote areas of modern Kyiv called Kurenivka. So we call our Ukrainian camp Kurenivka!
landmark: big white trailer with huge sign KURENIVKA

name: Infinity Divinity Disco
description:
Clear your energy, enlighten your soul and shake your booty.  
Come get smudged, stretched and spritzed at Infinity Divinity Disco where we offer daily:
- Smudging (clearing of negative energy using sage &/or palo santo smoke)
- Bindis placed over the third eye
- Spritzes of essential oil infused water
- Daily Yin Yoga
- Gratitude Meditations
- Fingernail Polish (just because)
- and of course, Disco music
landmark: Red Heart w/Infinity sign on Disco Ball Material

name: Mothership
description: SPECTRA: The Prism of Perpetual Enlightenment...She can move cosmic matter separating the frequency of white light into a spectrum of colors.  Experience the playa within a sacred universal symbol from the ancient future that radiates positivity, acceptance and love.
landmark: pyramid/prism with rainbow interior on wheels

name: Media Mecca
description: Media Mecca is Black Rock City's home to storytellers, journalists, and media. All media projects must register at Mecca prior to beginning in BRC.
landmark: viewing deck above a walled area.

name: Playfully Yours Village
description: Playfully Yours VIllage is a collection of adult themed camps. We have a well equipped dungeon area for those beginners and curious about dungeon play to come and experience it in a safe and supervised dungeon. We have a variety of equipment and toys for you to experiment and play with and will show you how to use them and help facilitate your play.  We focus on the lighter more sensual side of dungeon play. Take a chance with our spinning wheel and get spanked, petted, take a body shot, or give a strip tease or lap dance. Take the Discover Your Kink quiz and find your kink interests. Cool off in our misting booth and challenge your brain with the oversized puzzles. You can live out your exhibitionist and sultry side in the Bear Naked Tramps photo booth or take individual and group photos while in costumes or using props in our WTF photo booth. Also, relax and socialize in our Marshmallow Lounge with special event nights or during our vintage B movies nights.
landmark: a 7'x 16' wall w/poles and an 8' chain spider web.

name: Frozen Oasis
description:
Frozen Oasis Lounge
-Home of the Black Rock Philharmonic
Shelter from the storm and relax under the misters with a frozen yummy slushy drink and a live classical music performance by the Black Rock Philharmonic
landmark: 50' x 100' x 15' tall trussed shade structure

name: Altitude Lounge
description: Climb our 50-ft tower and see the City you helped create! We offer magnificent views, downtempo music, and couches that will suck you in as you watch the dusty world go by.
landmark: 50 ft tower with "Altitude Lounge" across front

name: BLM/FNW Interpretive Camp
description: Informational displays and activities concerning the playa, the NCA, the BLM, and public lands.
landmark: Vertical banners along our Esplanade frontage

name: Legends of the Hidden Playa
description: Live out your 90's childhood fantasies by running through our obstacle course at Legends of the Hidden Playa. Mysterious obstacles, puzzles, and rooms await! Assemble the Shrine of the Silver Man but avoid the BLM Temple Guards by redeeming the ChocoTaco of Life. The qualifying rounds/temple games will test your Burning Man knowledge, preparedness, and skills. Each afternoon we will be open for official trials and you can try to make it on the leader board for eternal prestige and glory. Most rooms will be open for practice all day. Once the sun goes down the temple will transform into a different sort of maze. Instead of temple guards and the pressure of a timer, there will be enticing light shows and a fun journey through puzzles and mazes enjoyable for sober brains and hysterically challenging for those enjoying a different kind of evening.
landmark: Flags on the road and large scaffolding structure

name: Shotski Wanderlust
description: A Nordic Oasis awaits with cool shots, a killer chair lift, a cozy chalet & all the silliness that comes from a week at the slopes with friends new and old! Camp ShotSki Wanderlust is your ski get away and source of the best 'Powder on the Playa'
landmark: Double Chair Lift & Shotski Man in front of camp

name: Black Rock City Animal Control
description:
We proactively go out and play practical jokes on attendees.
We've been capturing people dressed like animals on playa since 2001 and have been losing a battle against the increasing bunny population...our mortal enemies.
We also are the original "You Won Burning Man" porto-potty prank, starting in 2002.  We've done "Tequila Pit Crew" (dressed as a pit crew timed how fast can you run in and lay down and have us feed you beer and tequila), "Demolition Enforcement Agency" (we had a wrecking ball art car and would service notices to camps then pretend demo them with fake dynamite by doing a countdown that ends in a dance number.  We've dressed as matadors to mess with cyclists and we hung fake security cameras in your showers last year.  Lots more  new shenanigans planned for this year as well.
landmark: Mystikal Misfits / Naarsfortown ourvillage

name: Glittercamp!
description: Glittercamp has been serving Black Rock City for the past 20 years, decorating its citizens as the decorate us.  We transform those who visit us into brilliant, glistening gods and goddesses who radiate in blissed out beauty as the reflect the desert sun.  A camp built on consent and communication, we encourage you to get up close and sparkly with friends and strangers alike as you reveal what's under those clothes and release the diamond crested being that lives inside.
landmark: Glitterbox: easy up with round sign

name: Red Bar
description: Red Bar (formerly Mason Jar Revival, Cornhole Bar, Farmopolis, ... also the home of Joule the Art Car), an oasis popping out of the desert, red and glowing at night, invites weary travelers to float through our halls to find the inner sanctum of libations and live music at the piano. Sit down and play, or listen and sing, bring your instruments and see what develops, as we are always open and will have daily drink specials plus games and entertainment. Every hour is happy hour at Red Bar!
landmark: big circular red shade panel Red Bar.

name: Playa Name Pawn Shop
description: Camp NT is a humble bunch of Australians/Australian-wannabes, who are now spread all over the globe. We come together every year to bring the cheekiness and fun of Aussie culture to the playa. Camp NT first camped in 2017, made up of experienced burners who have decided to create a new home for ourselves and our playa friends. We're back in 2018 with our old crew, plus some young blood to keep things fresh.
landmark: Two giant 6 foot pink obelisks

name: FANDANGO
description:
Once upon a time, a group of friends decided to go to this Cacaphony Society-sponsored event out in Black Rock Desert. Over next few years they convinced many of their friends to join them out in the desert.  Much merriment was had, and in 1994 Fandango proper was born. Over the years our Village has grown to at times include the SLO-Orbitals, MoTown, Butterzone, Haiku-for-Beer, The Blight and other sub camps.

So now we are a big ole village with members spread all over. Nothing has changed, and everything has changed. These are our people. We are our people. Welcome to Fandango. Be sure to say hello when you stop by for a beer!
landmark: Large LED sign on the corner that says "FANDANGO"

name: Cosmiquarium Village
description: Cosmiquarium Village is where the mysteries of the deep intermingle with the wonder of the stars.  Combining the galactic playground of Cosmic Recess and the aquatic antics of the fabulous mutant vessels.  Join us for adventures of sea and space…at our home sphere or on voyages into the deep Playa!
landmark: 20ft scaffolding tower and oversized swingset

name: Coconauts
description: An island oasis of scientific discovery. Enjoy our tiki bar and climbable ziggurat. Every-other-night demonstrations of the Large Piña Collider. Interactive Moai God for the bravest.
landmark: Large Moai statue on top of a light up pyramid

name: Blood, Rust & Whiskey
description: Welcome to Blood, Rust & Whiskey - home of Camp Tidy and The Church of Insubordination!  Chill in the Yurthedral - and enjoy a proper cup of tea and peruse our extensive collection of randy reading material in the Tea and Porn lounge.
landmark: Yurthredral and the Tea and Porn Lounge

name: Meadful Things
description: Serving mead on playa for 8 burns, our selection is inspirational and ponderous.  Have you never tried mead, an alcoholic honey beverage?  Come over!   We've been waiting for you!  Into bees and want to chat about the many facets of their abundance, come on in!
landmark: Giant Slide

name: License To Chill
description: Center for people who can't chill good and want to chill better.
landmark: Shade structure with purple and blue roof

name: Vandyland
description: Stop by Vandyland and show us your moves! Project your digital-self on to our 10ft screen and interact with mind blowing graphics for a unique dance experience. Take the spotlight with a solo performance or double team the screen.
landmark: 10ft white screen and the sign that says Vandyland

name: BORSCH CAMP
description: Borsch Camp. Feel the taste of Ukraine
landmark: large blue and yellow flag on the curb

name: Fluffy Butt
description: A place where fluffy butts can converge for a rest, a giggle, a toy, a friend, or join in for some positive heckling. Come for the kitties but stay for the hoomans.
landmark: Giant shade structure with lots of banners of cats

name: Kostume Kult
description: Kostume Kult is a costume art, theme event and street-theater club that has HUGE fun! Based in New York City with members internationally, our "kult" is an open one inviting all to pursue costumed creativity year-around.
landmark: New York City Skyline and the Brooklyn bridge.

name: Rootpile Dustopia
description: Rootpile is a North Carolina based themecamp whose mission is to bring live Bluegrass Music and Hillbilly food and culture to the Playa. We have nightly concerts, daily instrument workshops on instruments we provide, daily Hillbilly Olympix  and BBQ and Pinto Beans at our nightly concerts  and an open Jam on Weds afternoon at two with Pinto Beans and an Open Jam on Saturday at two pm with Pinto Beans served.
landmark: scaffolding towers and large tan tent

name: Shamandome
description:
Shamandome Camp guides you to FIND YOUR POWER ANIMAL. and healer
shamanistas move you to the first day of the rest of your life,
reconnection, transformation.
landmark: Shipping Container with Shamandome sign

name: Champagne Campaign
description: Champagne Campaign will be hosting daily debates on diverse and fun topics while providing champagne, come vote for our topics with your mouth! Don't forget to stop by and get your Playa Prenup before your playa marriage! Join us in front of the temple 12:00 every sunrise for a toast to the new day. Come check out our 90s/00s MUSIC WITH WORDS party on Thursday - your ears will thank you!
landmark: 2 7-foot plywood champagne bottles

name: At the Oasis
description: Robot Art at the Oasis offers robots and humans an oasis from a weary, mechanized world with jewelry making and a bar available, as well as a plush, welcoming space at all times.
landmark: Brightly decorated 20x30 Tent and Oasis Flag

name: Camp Scatter
description:
Go ape shit at Camp Scatter!
CAMP SCATTER pays tribute to the all but forgotten Prince of Mayhem, Elvis' chimpanzee, SCATTER PRESLEY, who once reigned over GRACELAND with a bottle of Bourbon and an unbridled libido. This pampered CHIMP was draped in the finest studded jumpsuits and was known to be the life of the party.
landmark: Bamboo Tiki Scatter Sign

name: This Old Camp
description: We are veteran Burners with over 125 years of experience in creating a drama free experience for ourselves and the Burning Man community thru creative problem solving and outreach.  If you are having a problem with your infrastructure or looking for ideas for improvements, come by and let us help.
landmark: Northwest corner of 5:00 & "C" Street

name: Lithic Altars
description: Lithic Altars is home to the intrepid builders of Resolute Arch. Every morning, the Mary Affair, our local watering hole, serves a killer Bloody Mary with tons of ice .
landmark: Bar painted in black and white animalistic figures

name: Lost Oasis
description:
Spit Roast Fare & Tropical drinks 

Food and Noise from 4pm. Metro Chop's DJ Cobretti and DJ Hollywood, join Lost Oasis' own DJ Tris and DJ Bee:-) Come play with us to "Rock the block and Shake Trailers"...
landmark: Palm trees at the entrance & signage

name: Ritual of Victory (RoV)
description: Come to Ritual of Victory each day to celebrate your personal victories at our fun bar Victory Juice! Join us in creating custom and unique Burning Man necklaces and art that you get to keep. Get your Tarot Cards or Palm read by our Extra Mediums. Shake your booty at our Black Rock Hard Rock Hour of Power dance party each day featuring the best hard rock music on the playa!
landmark: Large banner with "Ritual of Victory".

name: Vomiting Sparrows
description: We are the Sparrows!  We serve the best bloody mary on the playa.  We entertain, we make friends, we make fun, we welcome all.  Chirp Chirp Blarf!
landmark: Puking Bird Sign

name: Gaudium Genus Aureus
description: Golden Guy Alley, a collection of micro spaces awaiting you.
landmark: 15' Torii gate lit from within marking the alley

name: Titicaca
description: We took our name from a high Andean lake, but it has so many meanings, and is so fun to say that we just love to say it and hear it!   Stop by for a cocktail, some badminton, and some interaction and see if you don't start enjoying the sound of the word Titicaca as well.
landmark: Robot photo op

name: Comfy Cozy Community College
description: Located inside the Black Rock French Quarter, we serve both as a living room to the village - and a launching pad for our magical schemes that unfold in the streets of Black Rock City and throughout the playa.  Come place a voodoo pin in our 50" tall voodoo doll!  Surrender your pains and scheme for your future pleasures!  Lounge in our pillow filled Comfy Cozy Voodoo Lounge as you contemplate the gaze of the pin filled doll and join us in our magical moments deep inside the Black Rock French Quarter.  Come poke around - we're waiting for you with open arms!
landmark: Comfy Cozy Voodoo Lounge entrance signage.

name: Shipwreck Tiki Lounge
description: The playas only authentic vintage Tiki Lounge straight out of the 1940's South Pacific!  Beware of cannibals!
landmark: Large Tiki black light tiki paintings

name: The Bounce Car Camp
description:
The bounce car is always on the roll. We love to cruise throughout the day checking out art and exploring the playa.

We cycle DJ's through our massive custom built sound system by Jeff Peters. As the night comes upon us, we roll from party to party or throw a massive one of our own.
landmark: The Bounce Art Car

name: Camp Cleopatra
description: Stop by Camp Cleopatra any day between 1 pm and 4 pm (or any other time you see someone around) and enjoy a Cleopatra with friends. In case you didn't know, a Cleopatra is a health drink with rum, peach and cherry juice. We guarantee you a good refreshment and good conversation!
landmark: "Cleopatra Here" Banner

name: KashyyyK
description: Come join the Wookiees of KashyyyK for a stop by our bodega for all of your forgotten playa needs, and while your here, stay for a relaxing swing in one of our many hammocks!
landmark: 15 interweaving hammocks hanging next to our sign

name: Bubbles and Bass
description: Welcome to Bubbles and Bass where we rock you out from first light til midday with bubbly bass-tastic house music. Dance the AM hours away, enjoy an interesting conversation with a new friend, and drink some bubbly while you watch the sunrise over the Playa!
landmark: "Trees of Life" art project across the Esplanade

name: Cosplay Central
description: Come play with us at the Barbie & Ken Cosplay Experience!  Dancing and costuming for all!
landmark: Big Pink Barbie & Brown Ken boxes out front

name: Vietnamese Iced Coffee Experience
hometown: OC, LA, Seattle, Washington DC, San Diego, SF, Ft Lauderdale, Denver, NYC, Albuquerque, Singapore, Barcelona
description: Vietnamese Iced Coffee Experience is an all inclusive Burning Man Theme Camp offering a cool icy beverage during the heat of the day as well as several other activities for our fellow participants. We encourage diversity, participation, and acceptance and welcome new members from all locales and walks of life.
landmark: Neon "VICE" (5') sign mounted over bus roof deck

name: Free Photography Zone
description: Free Photography Zone has been photographing and gifting prints to the participants of BM for 22 continuous years.   All people are photographed on black and white film and besides the gift these prints are available to the participants
landmark: Red walls displaying black and white photographs

name: Slutgarden
description: Cum suck down our Slut juice, wrap your body in our love and pound your hips to the rhythms of the playa.
landmark: SLUTGARDEN SIGN IN ARCHED ENTRYWAY, LIT W/ LEDS.

name: DusTea
description: Nourishing passerby's, radiating love and serving tea, beats and smiles to ALL. Intimacy and connection amidst the beautiful chaos of the playa. Join us for a Yoga & Brunch event perhaps, and/or stop by and hydrate yourself at our Tea Garden and Tea Lounge.
landmark: Bamboo.

name: DISCO LIPS
description:
Swig-N-Swing 
Come for a Swig or a Swing but not a swap if thats your thing.
landmark: Swig-N_Swing Sign and swinging couch

name: Healing Foot Wash Life Truth Love
description: Healing Foot Wash, Life, Truth, Love: we are all about not only clean feet but world peace, community building, and healing.  Come have your dusty feet washed with vinegar water, then peppermint soap, then plain water, followed by shea butter or other moisturizer.  You may wash someone else's feet after yours have been washed. Come by as often as you wish, and stay as long as you like.
landmark: blue flag above 60' shade cloth, theater chairs

name: The Pineapple Motel
description: The Pineapple Motel is a friendly space to recharge your good vibes. Come for some morning coconut water, fresh pineapple and cereal bar and stay for talks, music, meditation and more.
landmark: Big green tent and scaffolding sunset deck.

name: Stardust Cove
description:
Labracadabratory brings you our fourth year of Dusty Gaijin Ramen! 
Serious ramen cooking on Monday, Wednesday and Friday nights.
landmark: Japanese lanterns outside the ramen bar

name: Wish Maker Camp
description:
Compose your Temple Wishes and Intentions: 
Come and share our comfortable shaded crafting lounge every day, 3-6pm. Use the craft materials to creatively document your wishes, thanks, blessings, farewells and intentions in spirit and style. Add your tribute to our beautiful burnable art piece, to be lovingly placed deep inside the Temple at the end of the week. 

Relax in the cool with us while your body is embellished with symbols of the the 10 Principles by one of our air brush painting artists.
landmark: Art Structure and white converted school bus

name: CURB
description: A neighborhood favorite, BRCU is 3,000 square foot, shaded, 24-hour bar, serving a different craft cocktail each day. Come relax in the shade with a refreshing drink, snuggle up for a nap in one of our cuddle puddles, enjoy music you actually know the words to, jump on our trampoline, or just hang out with us at the bar - we're terribly charming conversationalists.
landmark: Reno Arch emblazoned BRCU

name: AWESOME OVERLOAD
description: AWESOME OVERLOAD~home of the Lady Sassafras, a New Orleans Paddlewheel Steamboat
landmark: Lady Sassafras artcar (paddlewheel steamboat)

name: Ignition Rx
description: The Dusty Lady is your shady game room on the playa. Come play with our games and enjoy our shade on a hot dusty afternoon. Bring your friends and try the Mumblewaze, try your luck at "Kinko" or see what else we have going on 24/7.
landmark: lit 4x8' gold glitter Dusty Lady logo sign

name: Wanderer's Camp
description: Our Camp is an oasis on the playa for the Wandering Burner who happens upon our camp and finds HUGS, ice cold gin/tonic's, and hot dogs.  Come by every afternoon from 3:30 to 5:30 for a hot dog or veggie dog, a gin/tonic and enjoy the shade, great company and music.
landmark: Signs:  Wanderer's Camp, Toxic Tonic, Hotdog Haven

name: Nose Fish
description: Mornings, come by "Cafe Data" for a delicious cup of freshly brewed coffee and see how much our big data already knows about you, then in the afternoon come by for hands-on Bicycle and Electronic (EL Wire/LED/Robot) repair.  Evenings enjoy the MEZ interactive video screen and dance the night away.
landmark: Nose Fish sign, big fish skeletons, fish kites fly

name: Camp Morning Wood
landmark: Giant Camp Morning Wood Sign

name: Burning Band Camp
description: The Burning Band, the playa's first silly marching band.
landmark: giant snowflakes

name: ArtBarf
description: Across the space/time continuum, through galactic upheaval and hiccups, we have evolved to this chaotic existence. Colliding and reforging, StarBarf weaves workshops, discussions, and movement into our shared vision of community. We strive to connect with beautiful and messy humanity; the humbling scales in which we exist; and the unbounded possibilities that we, as StarBarf, realize... You are StarBarf, too.
landmark: Aerial dome with pink and yellow ribboning

name: Camp Peace of Ass
description: For more than a decade, Camp Peace of Ass has provided a sure-fire remedy for the tender bottoms of Burners which would otherwise be painfully seared and blistered by the heat of the Nevada high-desert sun.  Our colorful and custom-fitted fleece bicycle seat covers (in dozens of wacky patterns and colors) provide the necessary comfort barrier between those oh-so hot plastic bicycle seats and the tender derrieres of our grateful and cherished clientele, providing Peace to the Playa, one bottom at a time.
landmark: strips of fleece & wall of 36" convex mirrors.

name: Black Rock Beacon
description: We produce a daily newspaper for Black Rock City with a mix of fun articles and serious news. Our Press Club & News Room provide shade and refreshment for ourselves as well as other members of the press, bacon-bearing volunteers, and interested Burners Lux Veritas Lardum!
landmark: The Beacon banner & battered metal newspaper box!

name: Space Paladin
description: Art support camp for Seesaw Wave Machine.
landmark: Space Paladin Sign

name: Dance Belt
description: Located in VaudeVille Village, the Dance Belt offers open barre, comfy hammocks, the best Playa Mom going, bike repairs, and dad jokes.
landmark: Canadian, Kentucky, and Rainbow flags together

name: Love Bubble
description: Love Bubble Camp: A Safe Haven for Human Connection, where participants can be "bubble wrapped" in loving kindness and compassion via our safe listening space/chill dome, workshops, and menu of connective offerings from our "Spice Rack." We aim to encourage and enhance self-discovery, inclusion and connectedness not only in our camp but in the entire Burning Man community, on and off playa.
landmark: Love Bubble sign and Flag and Safe Haven sign

name: Duck Pond
description: The Duck Pond is the best dive bar on the Playa. Since 2006! Bring your ID and your cup to enjoy an ice cold drink. Dance to the sounds of our Duck Pond DJs and special guests. Ride the Bucking Duck or enjoy the view from our lifeguard tower.
landmark: 40 foot tower with lighted rubber ducky on top.

name: Dead Dave's Blacklight Lounge
description: Dead Dave's Blacklight Lounge glows every night with a psychedelic interactive space featuring coloring-changing mood lights interacting with trippy blacklight lit banners, glowing bubbles, music, and games. During the hours of 8-10pm, enjoy blackjack or craps with a glass of wine or sparkling water or come during the day to escape the heat under our shade and get to know your neighbors by playing large scale games.
landmark: Dead Dave's Lounge flag with D.D. skelten beneath

name: FUN-DO BAR
description: The FUN-DO BAR is all about having fun and fondue. Come eat cheese and chocolate with us in the afternoon, play games and listen to people play music!
landmark: Vertical yellow flag with silhouettes of people

name: Tazii Lounge
description: Join us for rest, ease, and libations in the Tazii tent chill lounge 24 hours a day.  Feel free to chill 24 hours a day or join us for happy hour from 4 to 6 pm daily.
landmark: Large Moroccan tent in the public access area

name: Playasophy
description: The perfect place to cool off during a hot day, Playasophy serves hookah and iced coffee throughout the afternoon. We also welcome guests to take a break in the Land of Soft, where the entire floor is covered in memory foam. If its a cold night, come by to warm up with Nighttime Tea. Playasophy is the perfect spot to catch your breath before diving back into the playa!
landmark: Large Playasophy Sign

name: DASHi
description: DASHi aspires to Nurture, Ground and Enrich through delicious global cuisine, radical inclusion and inspiring expansion. Make DASHi your oasis for rebalancing and vitalizing nourishment.
landmark: 40 ft illuminated flagpole with Plum Crane emblem

name: Sietch Jacurutu
description: Sietch Jacurutu is a Dune themed camp which offers daily sword instruction and nightly fire sword battles.  Come learn the weirding way from the Fremen masters, then come back later and get weird.
landmark: Across Esplanade from Institute Village

name: STEEP?
description: On the surface we are a gloriously over the top tea and herbal apothecary camp. We have over 50 herbs and teas. On a deeper level we create a conscious space for expansion, connection and love to renew all burners who join us for tea and transformation.
landmark: Large mandala doors and white tent w/ shade sails

name: Partner Dance Adventures
description: Discover what it's like to hold a dance partner in your arms and move to the music. Tango. Blues Dance. Fusion. Experience the magic of creating dance together with a partner.
landmark: Big dance floor and PDA sign.

name: YOUniversal Teahouse
description:
YOUniversal offers a Persian Tea House, daily from 12pm to 6pm.

Come by for Persian tea, cold desert drinks / sherbets and yummy authentic treats like sohan (saffron brittle) all served with a dose of Persian Mysticism and loving hospitality that Persian Sufi mystics like Rumi, Hafez and Ferdowsi would be proud of! :)

On Wednesday night we will host an open Persian Dinner Party that should not be missed.  Authentic home-made Persian stews / rice and tadeeg on the Playa!! Come on, what more could you ask for?
landmark: Tea House structure, with arched triangular roof.

name: DUSTFISH
description: DUSTFISH believes in the Power and the Glory and the Beauty of LOVE!
landmark: Large Victorian Staircase

name: Curiouser & Curiouser
description: Curiouser & Curiouser is an Alice in Wonderland goes Through the Looking Glass inspired camp. We all go mad here for aerial, games, and kooky entertainment.
landmark: Aerial Rig and Dome covered with rainbow parachute

name: Cameltopia
description:
Cameltopia 

Come HYDRATE

The Hydration Station/Inconvenience Store portion a place to stop in for a quick sip, or hang around to peruse our indoor quickie mart and enjoy some shade.  View our desert oasis mirage and play a round dof camel croquet.   Stop by the lounge provides a bar for water shots of various "flavors" . We will also offer sunglasses and other needy items for the playa.
landmark: Our Historic wooden Gas station and "gas" pump

name: Kaleidoscope
description: Welcome to Kaleidoscope!  Stop by in the mornings or evenings for some delicious home-roasted slow drip coffee and mellow beats, participate in an interactive workshop, and check out the local neighborhood from our 30ft crows nest lookout towers.  If you're lucky you may even catch some live classical piano!
landmark: 30 ft crows nest lookout tower, ribbon fences

name: Putt Putt Palace
description:
The Blissfits "Retirement" Village is a motley crew of seasoned playa vets that have been building & contributing to the playa ethos for 10 to 20+ years. Blissfits campmates offer a more mellow, "Snarkle Pony", lighthearted fun, to the event. Our camp frontage hosts a, 24/7, Shuffle Board & Bocci Ball games and holds a daily tournament. There is plenty of comfy space to hang out and get cozy around a fire in the evening. 
Blissfits is also home to a friendly Bloody Mary & Quesadilla Bar where our campmates aim to please and will take great care of replenishing you along your journey! Namaste..and f ur day.
landmark: Moon Dome

name: Burning Sky
description: Burning Sky: Skydivers over Burning Man. Come see Black Rock City from 9,000 feet in the air. Watch the skydivers exit the plane while you stay safely inside, and get an exciting ride back to the earth. Gifting rides Wednesday & Thursday 11a-5p.
landmark: Burning Sky sign and large parachute packing area

name: Give It A Shot! Vaccination Camp
description: Twice a day, Run With The Balls! Just like Pamplona, Spain, but dustier. You'll be chased around the plaza by six angry balls (people inside giant inflatable balls) and survivors will be rewarded with a custom printed red bandana. And there's booze!
landmark: 12 foot wooden sign PAMPLAYA in front

name: Sin City
description:
Sin City is a place where freedom of expression is embraced and "What happens in Sin City stays in Sin City."

There is always something happening and there are many things to see and do at the clothing optional Party Naked Tiki Bar, Black Rock City Airbrush, Sin City Day Spa, Sin City Photography Studio, Sin City Art Center, photo opportunities and much more.
landmark: Party Naked Tiki Bar banner or Sin City sign

name: Singularity Sanctuary Camp
description: Singularity Sanctuary Camp is an art support camp.
landmark: Banner "SINGULARITY"  and a flag.

name: The Church of the Open Mind
description:
Last year's Burning Man theme of Radical Ritual spurred us to create a Mutant Vehicle, a radical rolling church built on a truck frame floating around the desert with a mushroom-topped spire… The Church of the Open Mind! What a journey…

In 2017, we conceived and built a Rolling Church with a large tower emerging out of the Spire. This marks the visual centerpiece of our mutant vehicle — a vividly colored, radically-illuminated mushroom. It stands vibrant, 30 feet up and visible from afar. This Mushroom on a Church, The Tree of Life or A Light in the Sky; we invite all interpretations.
landmark: Church of the Open Mind Art Car

name: Bat Haus
description: Bat Haus, formerly known as Bat Carnival, offering a daily refuge from the giant ball of fire in the sky, with spooky aesthetic. Check out our events: Littles Storytime & Snacks, Trick or Treat and Bats For Lashes kink hour.
landmark: Black and purple bunting, Bat Haus camp sign

name: Arabella's Lair
description: Arabella lives here.
landmark: Brown and Silver Monkey Hut

name: Black Rock City Airbrush
description:
Black Rock City Airbrush with Scorch is here to provide your airbrushing needs!

This camp resides within the Sin City Village and offers the finest custom airbrushed body art made just for you! Bring in a clean, white, T-shirt if you want your art to last even after you leave home. "You-say-it-we-spray-it" at Black Rock City Airbrush.

We are creating MAXIMUM participation from gifted patrons!

Expect to participate, and/or take a guerilla course in airbrushing! You may even find yourself running our booth while we sneak away. 
 
Enthusiasm, Curiosity, Compliments, Flirting, Patience, and Cold Beer go a long way at our camp!
landmark: Party Naked Tiki Bar banner or Sin City sign

name: Sin City Art Center
description: Come by any time to enjoy our collection of Burner Art created by camp members and local Burners. See what creative minds have made for you to enjoy. If you have art that you created and to have displayed you can bring it by to add to the collection. Please, be respectful of the artists that have contributed to create this display and do not vandalize or steal from the art center.  Thank you.
landmark: Party Naked Tiki Bar banner or Sin City sign

name: Spanky's Wine Bar
description:
The infamous crown-jewel of Burning Man bars- The legendary "Spanky's Wine Bar" is celebrating our 11th year!

Lead by the notorious "Admiral Painjoy", our village is a large, group of theme camps with something for everybody; The Camp for Sensual Pleasures (The Orgasmator Experience and Eros Tangier), Hello Camp (hilarious namebadges - since 1999), The Buffer Zone (car buffer massage), Body Painting, Camp Lola (massage, grilled cheese, cattle prodding), and more.

Spanky's hosts a myriad of events;
Spank U!, MPR (Morning Painjoy Radio), Many great DJs, The Festival of Bubastis (FemDom fetish party), Spank-dat-Bootie - (mash-up music party DJ'd by Adrien Roberts), and the Wine-Down Party
landmark: Large black octagonal shade structure

name: Camp Connection
description: The connection we make with each other is the most important thing in this life.  We invite you to connect with us through interactive play and a willingness to be vulnerable.
landmark: two ten-foot tall masks

name: Ascension/Destiny Oasis
description: Ascension/Destiny Oasis Art Support Camp is an eclectic and welcoming group of friends from Canada, Britain, and the United States who passionately believe that art and community are the foundation of a vibrant and sustainable society.
landmark: Beige and black-accented Moroccan tent.

name: BRCtoh
description:
BLACK ROCK CITY TOUR OF HOMES
Your source for fabulous realty on the Playa - Come find the  Home of your Waking Dreams - We'll show you around the dustiest and most accommodating awesome abodes!
landmark: Storefront with big sign and Peaked roof white van

name: Cloudy AF
description:
Camp Cloudy As Fuck is a stormy ensemble of 5+ time returning burners, hailing from the Bay Area and beyond. We are dedicated to raising the hearts, body and souls of the broader Burning Man community through our art, events, and welcoming space. We dew take our fun quite cirrus-ly.  

Find us by looking for our Cloud Castle: At the entrance to our camp, you'll find an elevated cargo-netting platform filled with cloudy pillows that offers a sweet retreat below and expansive views above. We assemble this tower with love and care, and welcome all weary burners into its cool fluff with warm hearts. 

With open minds, playful spirits and boundless energy, we are coming together in 2018 to provide the Cloudiest, most heavenly experience burners have seen at BRC
landmark: cloud castle

name: Shady Oasis
description: The shade we serve is sexy and refreshing. Swing by our sanctuary to recharge your chi while enjoying a little refuge from the sun. We'll welcome you with open arms, luscious libations, and the promise of pleasure.
landmark: Shady Oasis Sign

name: Native Tongues
description: IMAGINEnation is a life coaching camp dedicated to the power of dreaming and radical honesty. We are gifting one-on-one 30 minute life coaching sessions, Monday thru Saturday to the people of the playa. Come work your shit out!
landmark: IMAGINENATION sign on the corner of our camp

name: Greeters Camp
landmark: Greeters Shade Corner

name: Greeters Station
landmark: The Greeter Beacons

name: Mellow Mountain
description: Come play with our swinging swings, daytime drinks, stuffy fluffy toys, spinny space-flight rocket nose cone, hammock dome flop, and smooches from the Kissy Fish mutant vehicle.
landmark: Mellow Mountain sign and swing set

name: Tafies
description: Argentina on Playa!
landmark: Argentine flag

name: Cosmic Giggle
description: Like fire?  Like muscles and sweat?  For a good time, call 1-800-Cosmic-Giggle.
landmark: Big porch with the translucent Cosmic Giggle sign.

name: Tortoise Town
description: Tortoisetown is a collection of Veteran and Newbie Burners made of greeters, lamplighters, Djs, and Artists from all over the world. Stop by, say hello and keep an eye out for one of our Hip Hop and Hot Dog giveaway events throughout the week!
landmark: 4-5 40 ft MCI Buses

name: Hologon HQ
description: The Hologon HQ is home to a secret society of lucid dreamers. Visceral experiences will take place daily/nightly, along with master plotting of future geometry. Come by and say "Hollo!" and we will guide you to our energy portal in the playa, or just to get inspired. We're always scheming art plans!
landmark: Dome with Hologon LED sign hung from side

name: Om Skillet
description: Short Stack & Om Skillet bring you a chill park vibe and gourmet grilled cheese in the desert. Join us on Monday and Tuesday at lunchtime for full sandwich service and some groovy tunes. Tuesday afternoon is the Tutu Tuesday dance party, and Friday sunset is stand-up comedy!
landmark: Colorful fabrics over green lawn, LED wall at nite

name: Boom Boom Womb
description: Boom Boom Womb is a chosen family of burners who elevate the feminine and funky and celebrate child-like wonder.
landmark: pink womb dome, large sign or huge moon

name: Camp Be Bothered
description: We Camp Be Bothered to fill this out.
landmark: Purple Shruggie sign (day); Blue LED rope (night)

name: Mycodelic Forest
description: At the Mycodelic Forest the magic of mushrooms awaits you! We are inspired by the special ability of mycelium to breakdown organic compounds and decompose biomass into compost to create new life. In this way we strive to break down barriers and educate others on how to protect the playa and the Burner Culture to create an emotionally fertile environment for everyone.
landmark: mushroom forest landscape and Mycodelic sign

name: Street Life Hip Hop on the Playa
description: Street Life is where Hip Hop meets Sesame Street. Come dance, vibe out, & drink vodka lemonade in the shade hip hop beats.
landmark: Big Bird / Street Life signs, Oscar the Grouch

name: Vines Without Borders
description: Vines is an international wine bar and lounge. People and wine from around the world. Open nightly, serving chilled, great wine. Fun, relaxing, comfortable  space to drink wine and hang out.
landmark: Atop structure, 30" ball wrapped in Xmas lights.

name: The Prize Cock
description:
The Prize cock. 
A traditional English country pub serving Guinness, Cider, lager and a selection of mixed drinks. Pub games and entertainments available. Please beware of the Bar staff...
landmark: Large Union jack (UK) flag.

name: Astral Headwash
description: Greetings dirty desert dwellers! We are Astral Headwash and we are back for our 21st trip to the playa! We will wash your beautiful dust filled head for you again this year. That's right, clean, fresh water warmed in the desert sun with wonderful smelling shampoo and a bit of leave-in condition to send you on your way! Bring your happy selves to us for first come - first served amazing pampering; Monday – Friday noon until 4 pm! Participation is required!
landmark: Astral Headwash sign,water towers/evap ponds

name: We Hot!!
description: Come and visit some HotBroads! for surly advice and assorted sundries; tampons, sunscreen, eye drops, sewing repairs, etc. Monday through Friday 12am to 3pm. Relax on our Electric Loveseat if you dare! Maybe you'll be lucky to come across our pop up DJ!
landmark: Tall bright colored flags lining the road

name: Planned Playahood
description: We are Planned Playahood and we offer pregnancy testing, fornication counseling, bicycle repair, LED art, "second aid" services to help you UN-FUCK YOUR BURN. Get reborn in the birth canal; climb our tower; enjoy bocce ball, tether ball, and other games; enjoy our bar, medical advice, bike repair, and our big ice cream social on Tuesday afternoon.
landmark: 8' lit tower w/PP logo & art of woman giving birth

name: Muffin Bottoms
description: We see the bottom of the muffin as a missed opportunity for glory, a place where tenderness is revealed and true colors shine. Let the Wheel of Destiny, our signature dish, show you the light inside your subconscious, as we delight you with an experience you won't soon forget.
landmark: Wheel of Destiny

name: Camp HellNback
description: Camp HellNback is a combat veteran theme camp, our main gift is art and art therapy. Our goal is to open up bridges and discussion between veteran and the average participant and to offer the Burning Man community to veterans who are feeling without a community after getting out of the service.
landmark: Small golf cart art car w/ corrugated metal walls

name: Orphan Asylum
hometown: Mostly west coast, From Portland down to LA.
description:
Orphan Asylum Camp
The Great Experiment Continues.
Over 50 Orphan Burners from all over BRC and the World gather together to prove again the Radical Inclusion works.
landmark: Green "T", LED camp animated sign, flags.

name: Death Guild Thunderdome
description: Death Guild Thunderdome's 20th year. Bring good, sealed whiskey.
landmark: Big dome covered with assholes.

name: Soon to be Infamous
description: Your burn is Soon to Be Infamous!   Stop by and decorate a flag with your playa name and address during our Don't Fucking Leave Your Fucking Bike on the Fucking Playa! Bicycle Flag Creation Station Events and help us end bikicide, the careless abandonment of an innocent bike to wither and die on the playa.
landmark: Shrine of the Abandoned Bicycle

name: The Homie Depot
description: Black Rock City Repertory Theatre will be bringing two plays to the playa this year: Shakespeare's As You Like It and A Midsummer Night's Dream.
landmark: Giant Black Rock City Repertory Theatre marquee.

name: Temple Guardians HQ
description: We are the staff support camp and training center for the Temple Guardians.  Our principal responsibility is providing training and volunteers for Temple Guardians shifts.
landmark: Temple Guardians Banner

name: Alice in Slumberland
description: Alice in Slumberland is a Hookah Lounge Chill Space, next to the Drink Me Bar and The Red Queen's Croquet Court. Come by to share some hookah with strangers and wonder who-you-are. Grab a potion from Alice at Drink Me, or play a game of croquet!
landmark: Green Astroturf Croquet Court

name: Camp Lip Bomb
description: Lip Bomb is all things TANK GIRL! A naughty post-apocalyptic theme camp. We are free spirited women and men with a desire to bring about an environment of "anything goes" party and fun. As such, our gift to the playa is to provide a fun and relatively safe place for those who visit to express themselves in a many manner of ways, to include wicked workshops, live music and performances. Our bar boasts ice cold beer on tap, specialty drinks, and the only camp to offer VAPORIZED ALCOHOL SHOTS! Come for the day, stay all night. As Tank Girl would say, "Some thing's going on. My life seems to be coming together, taking some real direction. This just won't do…"
landmark: 10 foot tall sign that says Camp Lip Bomb

name: One Ring : DPW manbase
description:
Home of the One Ring (L2K, L3K, L4K)
Come visit our daytime open workshop for LED lighting.
landmark: 20x40 tarp cube and the "One Ring" sign.

name: Hexacamp
description: Hexatron art support camp
landmark: hexagon shaped sign out front

name: The Enclave
description: The Enclave brings those with deep BurningMan roots while providing room for a cast of new tendrils. We are united by a passion for art, design, performance and self-depricating behavior. The Enclave brings a spicy hot mess of Playastani charm to the 9's of Black Rock by celebrating the civically-minded gifts, we have to offer, in a format that intends to suspend and expand our visitor's expectations
landmark: Flaming ball at top of 30' spire

name: Camp Brewhaha
description: Visit in the morning for coffee, conversation, and good vibes with an opportunity to be around other early risers and overcome self-imposed limitations. In the afternoon we have a bicycle repair maestro and martinis in the shade.
landmark: canopy of colorful international flags

name: Ski Patrol
landmark: telescopes and a three ring hammock stand

name: The Last Mercantile
description: Word Play for the masses. Come play scrabble. Come recite your favorite poem or your newest creation. Need to insult someone? Need to better communications with a campmate. We can help. We have words.
landmark: Burgundy Red Gypsy Wagon at the intersection

name: Love Puddle
description: A neighborhood bar, playground and lounge open every afternoon that serves the most refreshing punch on the playa, to enjoy before or after playing foursquare or swinging on the swings. Ask nicely and we might give you a Love Puddle or whip out Dildo Jousting. We make sure passerby are assaulted with friendly invitations to join in the fun whenever we are open. Check out our events in the What Where When or just come by and look at our calendar to see when we're having Strip Rock Paper Scissors, sing alongs, and other ridiculous fun!
landmark: Love Puddle Sign!

name: Perihelion
description: As our name implies, at Perihelion, we soar as close as possible to the sun. Welcome a brilliant morning at our Intergalactic brunches, laze through a luminous interlude at our High Tea, or soak in an incandescent sunset with stellar frozen cocktails at our Star Bar!
landmark: Blue & gold camp, lines of blue streamers in front

name: PANORAMA
description: PANORAMA camp - home of the Deep Playa Diver!
landmark: Red and blue PANORAMA signs and giant disco ball

name: FUR
description: FUR is a theme camp of furries from all over, who come together to collaborate in the shared theme of Anthropomorphic Art, Costuming, and Culture.
landmark: Circus wagons + circus barrels + 25' tower

name: LuvClub
description: Luv Club, where the sacred meets the profane. Ain't nothin' but luv in our heart and dancin' in our toes!
landmark: Dome w/ gold heart arches and LED "Luv Club"

name: Floasis
landmark: Floasis LED sign

name: Camp Contact
description: Camp Contact offers Contact Improvisation Dance, AcroYoga, Ecstatic Dance and Authentic Relating workshops, among many other topics including Tantra, Meditation, Yoga, and other realms of embodiment, movement, and relational practice.  We are an international camp that shares space in Anahasana Village along with Naked Heart and DECENTRAL.
landmark: Large Domes, Pinwheel & Alps with Firehoses

name: Twisted
hometown: Our hometowns in the default world: Nevada City, Reno, Green Bay, LA, Tahoe, Truckee, Oregon, Japan
description:
Twisted G Spot- loose knit group of burners offering for your pleasure the Twisted G Bar serving up PVD's (playa vodka drinks) w/ mostly organic fruit juices and always lots of ice and playa talk! DJ N8Tron will be spinning as we reach out to all you dusty residents with our complement fairies, wish tree activity and several feather duster maids and butlers to clean your dusty selves.  Check out our Bedouin Chill Space and enjoy tea and hookah on occasion.  
P& J, Root Beer, Yoga and Improv Games will be listed when we post events. Inclusivity is our drug, come by and visit!
landmark: 6 ft pagan bunny, Twisted G Spot sign, Blue

name: HeeBeeGeeBee Healers
hometown: Boston, Boulder, New York, San Francisco
description: HeeBeeGeeBee Healers is an oasis for nurturing, grounding and healing. Stop by to hang out and chill, take a class, or to receive bodywork and healing of all sorts.
landmark: Three large green army parachute tents.

name: Freak Akademy
description: Freak Akademy is an Dust League University offering certifications, BA, Bsc, MA, PHD, STD in Freakory & Freakademcis. Widely known as the top notch schooling option for the freaks of the universe. We take you in and spit you out, perhaps slightly better off, or perhaps just off. If you thought Trump University was a rip off, well...
landmark: University Gates

name: Raditude
description:
The goal of Camp Fer Sherbert and its members is to nurture and be stewards of the ritual creative overlord spirit of Burning Man. We do this by having frosty vegan superfood treats to support the hundreds of dedicated artists, volunteers, and citizens in Black Rock City who build large-scale art installations on the playa in the heat of the midday sun. Through our reverently ridiculous expression of this service over the last three years as a placed theme camp, we have created interactivity of new friends, lovers, international treat-enthusiasts, and learned that spontaneous love transcends all spectators into divine interactivity!

It's like 'For Sure', but 'Fer Sherbert' :)
landmark: Red LED ROPE Lighting and 8 Sherbert Colored Flags

name: Mirage Garage
description: At Mirage Garage we are excited to offer programming that entertains and stimulates, while simultaneously offering a refuge where the community can come together to rehydrate, reconnect and rejuvenate! Come play with our kinetic sculptures on wheels, get stimulated by our daily speaker series, get washed, lubed, and henna tatooed, get bathed in sound in our Gamelatron tent, dance to our dj's nightly, our desert oasis overflows with iced water 24 hrs/day, and we live to serve you.
landmark: 20 foot high main tent, 3 stainless steel art cars

name: ICARUS Spaceport
description: ICARUS is a moving sculpture, a roaming art gallery and music stage all in one massive vehicle and camp. Think Firefly, Elysium and Alien meets Studio 54.
landmark: Giant Spaceship, and 2 x 20ft air dancers

name: Oh No You Didn't!
description: Be our guest and get it off your chest at our playa confessional lounge, featuring libelous libations and scornful judgment by our panel of experts.  Commiserate with the best as we help keep your shame in perspective.
landmark: "Oh No You Didn't" sign on the front of our shade

name: Cosmicopia
description: Cosmicopia is a community of Bay Area philosophers and astrologers. We believe in an enchanted cosmos and are dedicated to co-creating a new worldview in these uncertain times. Stop by our camp for a thought-provoking discussion or a mini astrology reading. Don't forget to look up at the stars!
landmark: large Cosmicopia sign with planetary glyphs

name: Leaky Tiki
description: Come be leaky in our tiki space!
landmark: Tiki Sign

name: Friendgasm
description: Friendgasm is all about friends and having fun together. Come get fwedded (friend+wedded) 24/7, or come to a seminar on firebreathing or one of our multiple parties.
landmark: Dome with Friendgasm sign on it.

name: Happy Seats
description: We are a group of friends that enjoy lifting people to the moon. Come join us and climb our scaffolding to get a lay of the land!
landmark: Large all-steel scaffolding with roof beacon light

name: Giraffelot
description: Come by Giraffic World and play on our 20' steel cube day and night, with tree house suspended 15' in the air, some swings on the bottom--an amazing place to catch the sunrise or sunset. Come by and grab a drink at our craft beer bar or sit by the fire at night, or just come hang out; we're pretty nice.
landmark: 20 foot steel giraffes at our entrance

name: Dept. of Tethered Aviation (DOTA)
description: The Department  of Tethered Aviation presents the Temple of of Embracing Wind.  Come by  and explore all things wind and kites.
landmark: Multicolored banners , giant hands, geodesic dome

name: Gender Blender
description:
Boy? Girl? Ze? Unidentified? Gender Blender is a safe haven for those bending and blending gender norms. We create safer spaces for Trans, GenderQueers, & Gender Non-Conformers. We provide a welcoming place for those curious about gender play, mixing up one's gender, and general discussions on how gender impacts our lives. We'e a gender conscious open loving community into sparkles, theatrics, drag, running anti-oppression workshops, and making queer smoothies on playa.
Check us out at www.genderblenders.org
landmark: 6 purple feather banners with "Gender Blenders"

name: BRC3PO (BRC 3:00 Post Office)
hometown: Sonoma County, Joshua Tree, and Copenhagen
description: Set in a giant rural postbox, the Black Rock City 3:00 Post Office (BRC3PO) provides postal services up to 24 hours per day that include authentic one-on-one creative interactions that can range from the supremely silly to the sublime. You never know what will happen next at BRC3PO -- YOU could be what will happen next at BRC3PO, if you pay us a visit!
landmark: Giant rural postbox. Can't miss it.

name: Its All Made Up/Home Rule Village
description: Home Rule Village welcomes you to an amazing camp where you can learn, play, explore or just be with each other!
landmark: 6 story tower!

name: Happy Acidents
description: There are no mistakes, only Happy Acidents! Come experience our Bob Ross and Chill Dome, 7pm-7am every night. In the words of the man himself: Let's get crazy.
landmark: Giant Connect-4 board or spinning Wheel of Destiny

name: Favela Culture
description: Focused on sharing the Brazilian culture and Favela soul experience! Simple life, good food, good music and party people. Crazy brazilian girls will shake their asses.
landmark: Looking for Brazilian flag green, yellow and blue

name: Funky Monkey Camp
hometown: Truckee, CA, Durango, CO, Los Angeles, CA, Reno, NV, Sacramento, CA, Burlington, Ontario
description: Funky Monkey Camp - Furthering Funky Merriment of Maniacal Monkeys Everywhere!
landmark: tower with the large orange Funky Monkey sign

name: Dream Followers
description: The Dream Followers are a loving, open, silly, and soulful crew ready to make new friends on the playa. Come follow your dreams and join us for epic dance parties, morning flow jams, inspirational crafts, and more!
landmark: A large flag saying "Follow your Dreams"

name: I Need An Adult
landmark: The stop light, two story bar, and music

name: Zoom!
description: Undersea Oasis of fire!  Join us for our daily fire spinning lessons and our nights of fire!  Firebase ball tuesday after dark and late wednesday for fire dodgeball.  Our playground equipment is open 24/7 but one new piece will be operated by zoomer direction only.  Of just chill in our bubble lounge or black light snail dome.
landmark: Large Z on a 30 foot tower in the center of camp

name: Peanut Butter Jellyfish
description: Peanut Butter Jellyfish is a playful nourishment and refueling lounge which brings people together to replenish their bellies with food and drink, and reinvigorate their hearts with laughter and dancing. We draw our inspiration from the jellyfish "blooms", a process which brings together thousands of jellyfish for a short period of time.
landmark: jellyfish

name: Fancy Flamingo Society (FFS)
description: Come and visit the Fancy Flamingo Society's fancy as f*ck pizza kitchen! You will train with the finest pizza chefs in all the land and produce the fanciest playa pie known to man! No matter your skill level, you can still participate in the gift of giving a pizza surprise, and everyone knows that the gift of gifting is the best gift of all!
landmark: Tower with giant flamingo + pizza flag

name: Wetspot
description: The Wetspot Bar: Welcome to the best place on the playa to enjoy a craft brew or our infamous Skip and Go Naked cocktail. Wetspot is about making new friends in an open to all setting while engaging in musings around one of our favorite pastimes: consuming libations.
landmark: Oversized western saloon doors

name: Maximal Viable Pyramid
description: Maximal Viable Pyramid is a new camp dedicated to the appreciation of the most perfect shape in 3-dimensional space (pyramids).
landmark: 17-foot tall pyramid

name: Empire of Dirt
description: Empire of Dirt is the landing base for the long thought lost spaceship EMPIRE.
landmark: Metal Empire of Dirt sign.

name: Cranky and Sons Bike Repair
description: Come to Cranky and Sons for assistance, education and advice for all your cycling needs, from a flat tire to exploded derailleur — we'll help you get back out onto the playa.  If you've got some free time and can lend a hand, grab a beer and a wrench and help us help those in need!  Mechanics on duty 10am to 2pm; DIY tools and supplies available any time.
landmark: "Cranky and Sons Bike Repair" flag

name: Shangri-Lawless
description:
A forgotten paradise to soothe the wary adventurer, or a lawless land of risk & reward? We are both.  A yin and a yang.  An amalgamation of two elements, each playing off the other. 

Come and enjoy our beautiful bar-lounge replete with delicious concoctions and hookah or meet the love of your life getting nasty on the dance floor.  We are here for you!
landmark: Large Shangri-Lawless Sign at camp front

name: OKNOTOK
description: OKNOTOK is a multi-purpose venue featuring a variety of surprising events all week, including Ruby's Power Hour, the Disney-Sing-Along, a nightly funeral.
landmark: large red tower topped with the letters "OK".

name: Where the Sidewalk Ends
description:
If you are a dreamer, come in,
If you are a dreamer, a wisher, a liar,
A hope-er, a pray-er, a magic bean buyer…
If you're a pretender, come sit by my fire
For we have some flax-golden tales to spin.
Come in!
Come in!
landmark: Giving Tree

name: BeeYond:
description:
WeCharge! is the next evolution of the camp formerly known as bEEcHARGE!!! and before that rEcHARGE!!!.  We have been buzzing the playa for more than 20 years now, and we are ready for more! 

This year please come by to sing your lungs out with Live Band Karaoke, or to hop on to a Playa Adventure Tour (guided shenanigans), or to visit the Moonshine Bar with the Golden Guy cluster, or to hop on one of our two art cars:  the Apis Inlusio and the Red Hot Beverly.

Bottom line, stop by and visit!  We welcome all, especially newbees and travelers from afar!
landmark: large metal WeCharge! sign

name: BRINY DEPTHS!
landmark: Wooden dome and red lace

name: AquaZone Intentional Water Bar
description: Come join us in the revitalizing Ritual of Drinking Love-Infused Water. Replenish your soul and your water bottle at our 24-Hour Self-Serve Water Buffet. Recharge your body through the healing powers of our Reiki Masters -- as well as recharge your cell phone/device at our Solar-Powered Cell Phone Addiction Retox Station. Reinvigorate old and new friendships at our "Do Your Friend" Nail Polish Stations. The Life-Changing Power of Positive Ritual happens when YOU show up.
landmark: AquaZone mailbox,Brilliant Blue lighting at night

name: Silver Spoon
description: We at silver spoon cafe will feed you. When you sit down at one of our tables you get to be spoon fed a small but delicious meal by one of our servers. All we ask is that you consider leaving us a life tip. It can be about relationships, loss, technology or just food; anything goes. Oh, and we can also spoon you a tasty drink in case you're not hungry.
landmark: Look for the large silver spoons behind the bar.

name: Electric Cheese Land
description: Say "Cheese" and enter our Electric Cheese Land, where delicious fondue and other cheese dishes are being served.
landmark: Gate with name of "Electric Cheese Land"

name: Camp Bang Bang
description:
Camp Bang Bang is a community of open hearted and open armed adventurers from Australia and around the Globe. 

We welcome you to our playground where you can play & drink. Music, laughs, dancing, Aussie-ness and if you are unlucky  eat vegemite. Scale our Viewing Tower, Climb into our Harmony Hammocks, zone out trying to understand what we are saying, dare not to eat Vegemite at Risk & Reward Saloon and spin TWoR (The Wheel or Risk).

Or came for our Monday Gardens of Babylon Landing ceremony & music experience and get down on Wednesday with Wild Animal Party. 

Not there to party, join us for Hot Mess Yoga or our Immersive VR Fear Healing.

Heck we even do a back street bike bandits tour to help you with your cardio-ish. 

Hometown: Sydney, Australia. With strong links in Los Angeles, New York, England, Sweden, Netherlands, Hong Kong, Singapore, Mexico City, Italy, Uruguay, Spain & Bali just to name a few.
landmark: Elevated large Neon Bang Bang Cowgirl sign.

name: The Last Starfighters
description: The Last Starfighter is an art support camp filled with lovers of science fiction. Stop by our porch if you need a good book for your burn or a good conversation about science fiction & futurism.  We are supporting the Augmented Reality Porta Potty's this year.  You may see us riding to and from deep playa on our ARP support bike.
landmark: The Green Garden Windmill with the Camp Name

name: Syncytium
description: Syncytium is a collection of artists, engineers, scientists and performers who do. We work hard together and play hard together. Stop by for some frozen goodness during the day, or at night to heat yourself up when you're cold.
landmark: Large steel spire lit with LED's and fire.

name: Jipangu/Bijou Boutique
description:
Enjoy the best green tea and sake on the playa in our relaxing and welcoming tea lounge.  Take some time to visit our Bijou Boutique's collection of fine jewelry, and join one of our artists to make your own.  

Sling some ink with Squids of the Sumi-e dojo.
We'll load your tentacles up with our homemade brushes and let you experience large scale sumi-e painting! This is sumi-e painting as a flow art. 

Need to relax?  chill out with some Tibetan singing bowl meditation.
landmark: Jipangu sandwich board at the curb

name: Champagne Lounge
description: Come by the Champagne Lounge for your daily dose of bubbly fun! The Champagne Lounge will be quenching your midday thirst with happy hours featuring ice-cold champagne. Not in the mood for bubbles? Grab some friends and take a shotski! Bring your own cup, and be ready for booze, music, and fun! Also check out Champagne Lounge Audio Programing, or the C.L.A.P, on your radio at 99.9 fm!
landmark: Blue&white striped shade cloth, champagne signs

name: The Lavender Lounge
description: The Lavender Lounge provides tired and exhausted guests with a Lavender water misting and scalp massage treatment. Take a break from the dust and sun, come in, and get LAVENDERIZED!
landmark: Large silver tent with "Lavender Lounge" on it

name: Miso!
description: Hot miso soup and sake by night, fresh insight into sex positivity and expression by day.
landmark: Big yellow Buddha beacon

name: Dancing Cat
description: Camp aLittle! Where there's aLittle something for everyone!
landmark: Black geodesic structure by 2 smaller silver domes

name: Kin-Dza-Dza!
description: Camp Kin-Dza-Dza!, bringing space-junk dystopia and tea to the Playa since 2006!
landmark: Flag pole flying crimson pants.

name: Mystic
description:
Camp Mystic has a 20 year history at burning man. 
BY DAY... we host a Visionary Speaker Series themed 'The New Story of Humanity's Evolution' and healers and lucia light in our Dome.
BY NIGHT... we host some of the most talented artists, musicians, performers, fire spinners, aerialists, and singers during our Wednesday, Friday, & Saturday Night events themed 'A Transmission of Truth & Beauty'... truly magical.
Our award winning mutant vehicle The Mystic Flyer can be seen on the streets of the playa lit by 1200 LED lights encased on beautiful visionary playing incredible tunes on our roof deck.
landmark: Large 6000sqft 3-story scaffolding structure

name: Smidge Haphazard
landmark: Yellow flag w/Astronaut inside green triangle

name: HellVetica
description: A Swiss Chalet for travelers from Switzerland and expatriates.
landmark: Orange flame effect around 14 feet high.

name: Camp Short Bus
description: Camp Short Bus XOXO is truly about hugs and kisses. Year-round community is what we live for and joining our camp is a lifelong commitment. We will be hosting a variety of events this year including Yoga, exotic dance workshops, spa services and a happy hour.
landmark: Big yellow sign that says "CAMP XOXO SHORT BUS"

name: Toast & Jam
description: Toast & Jam invites you to drop into your neighborhood watering hole and enjoy some good ol' fashioned live music. There's one drink on the menu: BEER SHOTS, and every shot is accompanied with a toast. So come one, come all, share a laugh, learn to toast in a new language, form a band with your newfound friends. You will find yourself always coming back to Toast & Jam!
landmark: Toast & Jam sign above the bar

name: Camp Lip Service
description: When the harsh Playa takes its toll on your lips and on your soul... come see Lip Service for bad advice and chapstick!
landmark: "Bad Advice" booth, w/ 2 sets of lips, plus flags.

name: Dusty Pineapple
description:
Dusty Pineapple is a tropical oasis for burners looking to connect, share, learn, and celebrate! Come by our camp for yoga, hip-hop Pilates, Tarot reading, outer-space talks, absurd games, and pineapple drinks. 

The Dusty Pineapple is home to the "DP", which ventures out at sunset to the farthest corners of the deep Playa to provide wandering burners the joy of discovering a tiny oasis of light, groovy jams, and camaraderie where it's least expected. The DP does not disclose their locations in the deep Playa or timing (but if you hang out at camp, we may give you a clue). Rather, we prefer to be that moment you find by chance.   We look forward to you stumbling upon us along your journey in BRC or the Deep Playa!
landmark: Colorful pineapple flags!

name: The GASS Co.
description: The Good & Stormy Scoundrels come from Los Angeles.  We are fire spinners, artists, teachers, and mischief makers.  Come sit in our shade and we may show you a thing or two.
landmark: White tension shade structure

name: Square One
description:
