Getting some conclaves and other flow artists together in one big space is a great opportunity to collaborate on playa events such as fire parades throughout the city, and deep playa renegade spins. Our mission is to really light up each night and bring something special to the playa for everyone to enjoy.
landmark: Red Scaffold with bright RED Light on top

name: Naked Heart
description:
Naked Heart is devoted to the full embodiment of the divine feminine. We offer amazing experiential and experimental workshops that allow you to feel your feminine heart your radiance your inner goddess. This work requires the masculine as well; Everyone is welcome.

At Naked Heart we recognize the need to embrace both the light and the dark in our journeys. When we pursue the light we use movement, the senses, sensuality, sexuality and connection.  This beckons us in and brings the light of awareness back into the bodies we have vacated. We are particularly interested in the seat of power and intention housed in our bodies. To go there fully requires confronting our shadows. We embrace those as well as we dive into shame, fear, anger, unsavory memories from this life and past lives, and disempowering images of our bodies. Welcome home.
landmark: 40' x 70' shade cloth flying off a semi-trailer

name: Gnomeman's Land
description: We're a bunch of gnomes who took over someone's lawn and we'll have everything a good gnomely neighbor should have. People can stop by to enjoy our lemonade stand or hang out on our pristine front lawn (replete with white picket fence) and play lawn games or take a seat in the shade of our tree / the comfort of our hammocks.
landmark: Large sign that says "Get On Our Lawn!"

name: Kindred Spirit
description: Kindred Spirit is 30-feet of audio-visual stimulation designed to spark conversation about the American Bison's complicated past, present, and future.
landmark: 30 foot long bison, Kindred Spirit.

name: Pleasant Camp
description: Come to Presence Camp and delight in the joy of the now.  We have a meditation station open 24/7.
landmark: "Be. Here. Now." sign.

name: Olympus
description: The mission of Olympus is for every burner to foster radical self-love, self-expression, and a connection with their own divine spirit to uncover the highest version of themselves - to realize their own inner god or goddess.
landmark: 15-ft Lightning Bolt

name: Baconeers
description: Join the Baconeers once again for good music and parties! Join us for shade and friendly fun on any day, but definitely stop by Sunday, Tuesday and Thursday for afternoon parties. Resident DJ Exodus and special guests will play classic 90's hip-hop, funk, break-beats and misc. other fun stuff! Come get a cup, a drink, and maybe some bacon! And if you're passing by in the morning, stop by for a cup of coffee and relax on the couches in the shade!
landmark: Big Stuffed Pink Pig Head on a Pole & Misc. Signs

name: Rainbow Sparkle Peach
description:
Do you enjoy legends, glitter, glamour, fruit, queerness ,and polyamory in epic proportions? If so, then come visit us at Rainbow Sparkle Peach (and the Legend of the Polyglamorous Queerdo). We offer advice, peachy keen hosting, cold fruit, hot kisses, and a whole hell of a lot more...

We love connecting, cuddling, storytelling, and maybe if you're lucky, you! Also of note, we are inclusive as fuck, leave your phobias behind and find a new way of lovin'...just sayin'...safe spaces for all!
landmark: Lit sign with "Rainbow Sparkle Peach"

name: Bad Education
landmark: Camp Industry sign and flag on the scaffolding.

name: Camp Anything Can Be Fixed
description:
Camp Anything Can Be Fixed.  
From broken shoe laces, flat tires, and dead batteries to broken hearts - anything can be fixed.  We begin with radical acceptance.  Every experience is an opportunity to learn and to grow.  We are active, productive; we practice and teach radical self-reliance - unabashed, unrepentant adaptability and make-do.  Sometimes, you need an inner tube patch, a battery, an LED, a needle and thread, a drink, a snack, or a shady spot to rest.  Camp Anything Can Be Fixed is your Playa General Store, gifting all the bits and pieces you need to keep your burn going strong.
Obstacles are just things to be overcome, after all.  Darling, we care about your suffering.  Please relax, take respite, have some nuts and juice.  Everything is going to be alright.  It is getting better all the time.
landmark: Large Bear with "Camp Anything Can Be Fixed" sign

name: Smiley Girrrlz
description: At the Smiley Girrrlz lounge you can choose a spirit stuffed animal for your bike, make your own pasties, and get big hugs from our smiling ladies. Then join us in deep playa at sunrise for some chai tea and a bit of dancing.
landmark: Creme wedding tent with the white and pink banner

name: Habitat for Insanity
description: Habitat for Insanity embraces the creation of novel burner technology and events. We're a do-ocracy, meaning that although we do not assign tasks, we manage to accomplish a lot!
landmark: Dome with two black pizza ovens to the side.

name: Iceberg Cowboys
hometown: Oakland, Tampa, Johannesburg, New York, Tel Aviv
description: Iceberg Cowboys - Wranglin' Icebergs and Ridin' em off into the sunset
landmark: Big Blue Icicles

name: Preservation Society
description: Preservation Society: Come find what has been lost in the dust. Our events refresh you with movement and dance, challenge your frame of mind with talks on topics far and wide, and satiate your hunger with delicious roasts.
landmark: LED "Preservation Society" sign

name: The Key Camp
description: We guide you to find your KEY! We have camp members from Japan, Malaysia, Indonesia and of course the United States! We will help you to find your key so please come and visit us!
landmark: Red Flag with the Key and Man Sign

name: Deep C
description: Deep C, a collaboration from Seattle Washington, was conceived to share our love of creating interactive music and light displays with the Burner community. Come join us for karaoke and play on our interactive musical art project!
landmark: Illuminated Deep C sign placed on the road

name: Slightly Conscious
description: Celebrating the traditions of ancient Greek sports, arts and philosophy with naked oil wrestling, competitions, yoga, pottery making and philosophical conversations in our Taverna.
landmark: Greek columns and graphics on the buildings

name: Tough Titties
description: No gurus here! This art support camp houses "This too shall pass- Moondancer", part of the art honoraria this year, when it's not flying around playa. It also houses strong women and men who will be happy to make you coffee, stamp you with our unique tough titties art and sit down and chat endlessly about life, the universe and titties.
landmark: Large, inflatable boobs with pixellated nipples

name: Luxurious Vagrants
description: Lux Vag is where sandy bodies come to get fancy! Visit our temporary tattoo and bedazzling parlor Tuesday-Thursday afternoons.
landmark: Canopy with LED diamond, and LUXVAG sign

name: The Santa Man Cometh.....
description: Who doesn't love Christmas? We certainly do and we want to share our joyful Christmas Spirit with our fellow campers and we hope that a visit to our camp will help to remind others of the joy and pleasure of giving to others. The camp will have a 25 foot decorated tree as its focal point and Santa will be available for photos.
landmark: 25 ft Christmas Tree

name: Black Rock Blind Tiger ArtSupport
description: Art Support camp for an immersive, puzzle and riddle locked Speakeasy full of art inventions in the deep open Playa.
landmark: Blind Tiger & Prohibition Signs, Tiger Flag

name: Yellow Bike Project
hometown: NA (but most of us are from Austin)
description:
We are a department within the Department of Public Works that builds 1,000 bicycles every year and deploys them for free use around Black Rock City. Get on our bikes and ride!
Our crew also manages bicycle lost & found, and abandoned bike clean up efforts on playa post-event.
landmark: the sea of hundreds of bikes

name: Insomnia
description:
It's the return of the Evening Cartoon Party! 
Every night all Burners are invited to chill in our cinema and to enjoy a variety of breath-taking cartoons.
It's that special time when kids-at-heart get to relive the exciting ritual of non-stop cartoons. As always, this 3-hour trip into the weird and wonderful world of yesteryear's animated antics will be accompanied by an all-you-can eat popcorn. The cartoon lineup is always a mystery,
so get ready for a sugar rush and an explosion of nostalgia all wrapped up in one candy-coated package.
landmark: look for the white sign "Insomnia"

name: Camp Good Soup
description: Above the Limit is an all-inclusive camp filled with a love for collaborative music, coffee, and the ocean.
landmark: 40' dome with a big ol' green ATL sign

name: Dust Monkeys
description:
The Dust Monkeys' revolutionary Fauxtobooth is guaranteed to make you smile and will always capture your good side. Don your best duds and come on down to experience the mystical power of fauxtography first hand!

We'll also be hosting sound baths, yoga classes, partner stretching sessions, and serving gyoza on Thursday. Don't forget to check out the book for days and times!
landmark: three story scaffold, monkey bars and fauxtobooth.

name: Red Nose District
hometown: Los Angeles, San Francisco, Santa Fe, Bend/Portland, Denver
description: Red Nose District History, background: Red Nose District (RND) has been in existence, in one form or another, since 1998. In 2013, we resolved to keep our hearts, minds, and noses RED from now until the end of time! RND has roots and participants in Los Angeles, San Francisco, Santa Fe, Oregon, Canada, Israel, France, and various states and countries around the world. Our members are involved in (or are lovers of) the circus arts, and work to bring our various skills and talents to the playa in forms that allow for an immersive, participatory experience for the citizens of Black Rock City. Notable past projects/activities include: High Chair Stilt Bar, Pedalbump, Muse, Fire Wire, Wheel of Fortune, Zenobia Blanca stilt limo, Zeppelin art cars, afternoon stilt lessons, the Stoop, Whiskey Kickball, and circus variety shows of all forms!  Want to know more?  Come find us on the playa!
landmark: 30' truss with Red Nose District flag on top

name: Giants Workshop
description: Learning, sharing and exploration stemming from solution-oriented, positive thinking and an unguided, free social environment. Even giants feel small when they gaze at the stars...
landmark: big "giants workshop" about 8 feet off the ground

name: Sacred Cow
description: Consider yourself wrangled. Join Sacred Cow every evening for horchata, shade, and tequila and look for our Moroccan theme beast floating on playa. Enjoy the views from our bus roof while we bath you in drinks, fruit, bacon, and beats.
landmark: Mexican themed wall+ big ole Moroccan Cow art car

name: Draft Punk
description:
Like the Legend of the Phoenix, Draft Punk returns to supply ice-cold beer to the denizens Black Rock City.
Bring us your hot, your tired, and your thirsty.
Grab a cold one on the go, or hang out for the day.
Get there early for Baby Huey's famous cocktails.
SEE the world's biggest pool table.
Mention this ad and get 50% off!
landmark: "Draft Punk" sign atop the shade structure

name: 2049 Olympics
description: Our five psychedelic neon Saturn rings represent the Olympic ideals of Friendship, Respect, Inspiration, Courage, and most of all - THE TAKING PART - all the kind of characteristics we all like to see at Burning Man!
landmark: The 5 Neon Olympic Rings

name: Node
description: Node Republik celebrates the FUTURE in an optimistic, loving and expressive way. We host music, dance, meditation, sound healing and talks about what the future holds, abundance and empowerment to create our own destinies.
landmark: Large Diamond shape high up.

name: PlayAlchemist
description:
EXPERIENCE RADICAL METAMORPHOSIS ON A JOURNEY THROUGH THE SEVEN STAGES OF ALCHEMY, IN SYNERGY WITH THE   SEVEN DAYS OF BURNING MAN.
Throughout history alchemy has been recognized as the process of transformation. This year at Burning Man we embark on our own journey as a community called PlayAlchemist.
landmark: Very large pyramid

name: Clevian Circularity
description: Home of Playa Speed Dating, and lore 30,000 years old.
landmark: Huge illuminated Snowflake on a tripod.

name: CUBHOUSE
description:
Cubhouse brings house party vibes to the Playa. Music, dancing, games and best of all good company.

YUNG ANIMAL SQUAD // NEVER LEFT ALWAYS RIGHT 
"Mi casa, su casa. That's our cosa nostra"
landmark: DISCO PYRAMID

name: 17 Virgins
description: We started out as 17 fresh-faced Burner-virgins, and one dusty vet - all with a shared philosophy: that we treat our friends as family, and that we're always open to new friends. And oh my, has our family has grown! So come by for a rip down the portal, we'll pour you a cocktail in the jungle, and let's get acquainted.
landmark: 200foot long Tunnel, or 17 Virgins Owl Flag/LED

name: LOBE
description: Come form new [neural] connections at Campus Callosum. Bring your most nagging questions or share your own scientific knowledge, and if you don't leave the camp smarter at least you'll leave drunker.
landmark: Large El-Wire Brain (1x1.5m) above shade structure

name: A Huevo? A Huevo!
description: A Huevo? A Huevo! Come and relax at our chill bar and enjoy handcrafted drinks crafted especially for you. Specials change every day - from hot toddies in the morning to get you going to white drinks on Wednesday and signature bull drinks everyday. Open Mon-Fri 12pm to 8pm.
landmark: Big wooden front gate with camp name and flagpole

name: IDEATE
description:
IDEATE is a space for ideas, innovation, collaboration, and designing new paradigms to address the biggest challenges we face on spaceship earth - and bringing them to the world.  

We have something to delight and inspire everyone. We embody the Burning Man Principles and we live by the axiom, "Be the change you want to see in the world."
landmark: a large shade structure with tables and benches

name: STRANGELOVE
description: STRANGELOVE! Come enjoy a pleasant layover at our Jet-Age lounge - sip a tasty beverage of your choice while our DJs pilot you to a variety of lovely destinations. Fly the Friendly!
landmark: shade structure with white/blue airliner walls

name: Alborz
description: If you find yourself parched and disoriented, listen carefully. Follow the melody and you may just stumble across camp Alborz. We'll be happy to nurture your body and soul before we send you back off to find the next adventure.
landmark: Aluminet shade in the shape of a mountain range.

name: Chop Shop
description: Chop Shop is the Best Playa Repair garage in BRC! We are ready to repair a wide variety of Playa transportation with parts, repairs and advice.
landmark: Green Shade Quonset hut on the corner.

name: Party Naked Tiki Bar
description: Cold alcohol Tiki Punch is served, for those age 21 and over (ID required), starting at 11:00am daily. Enjoy the sounds of classic rock in a cool, relaxing clothing optional environment. Stop in and have a seat where you are bound to meet someone new. You never have to get naked to enjoy but if you do, you may get "leid". Come party with us for our 9th year & please bring your own cup to be LNT friendly.
landmark: Party Nake Tiki Bar banner or Sin City sign.

name: Black Rock Wine Cellar
description: The Black Rock Wine Cellar returns once again to provide delectable dabblings from our unique wines made from Deep Playa Vineyards. Join us for daily tastings and discussion, and look for us in our secret pop-up locations!
landmark: French Quarter structures

name: Burntown
description: Don't call it a comeback, we been here for YEARS! Burntown offers a smorgasbord of FUN. We have the SNUFF Emporium dispensing fine nasal snuffs. All day, some late nights...come find out what tobacco and other non-tobacco snuff can do for your burn! Take a trip across our Rope Bridge of Death, only the strong will survive! We have a Corner Store that is not to be missed... stocked daily for those special needs only on the playa. We welcome any and ALL brave enough to enter our camp.
landmark: black and white light cages that line the boundary

name: MythMaker
description:
From Deep within the Valhalla mountains of BC Canada

MythMaker merges the ancient arts of storytelling & theatre with the dramatic skills of the circus arts creating a
multidisciplinary art experience, delving into the mystical, magical and profound. Performances include theatre, music, dance and ceremonies, including the dynamic circus arts of fire spinning, acrobatics, aerials and stilt walking.
Their multi-dimensional performances strive to
integrate a new cultural mythology through ritualistic performance art inspiring a new dream, which empowers the individual and community to co-create a sustainable future for all life.
landmark: Large Pirate flag

name: Secret Passage
description: Go from analogue to digital at SECRET PASSAGE AUDIO BAR. Bathe in sounds, listen to tales of robots, and dance with spacecats.  You may enter as a hellacious hippie, but you'll leave as a radical robot!
landmark: Red LED Path, Light Up Triangle with Eye in Center

name: PickleBack Mountain
description:
PickleBack Mountain has the world famous home-made PickleBacks! And the Great Bucking Pickle! 
Come by and ride our pickle and enjoy a PickleBack!
landmark: Green Lit Saloon Doors and the Bucking Pickle

name: Brand-Ur-Ass N More
description: Brand-ur-Ass N More will stimulate your entire being, from your mind to your ass. Bare your butt at the hitchin' post and get a temporary brand. Bathe in gong vibrations, do some cock ropin', enjoy tunes, belly up to the saloon, enjoy the giving tree, play some carnival games and hitch a ride on our vehicles. Y'all come N play!
landmark: Wooden Corral structure on the corner

name: Camp Meow
description: Come to camp meow after dark to control the color patterns of the illuminated 15ft pyramid tent, or jump on the Stargazer Artcar for a tour of the deep playa.. a 40ft bus turned spaceship, with full length dance floor on the roof, LED entrance tunnel, fire effects, covered from head to toe in seamless labyrinth patterned LED panels, and new in 2018 - a giant synchronized kinetic sculpture array attached to the roof. Come join us crazy Aussies for a trip down under and back up again!
landmark: 15ft Illuminated Pyramid

name: Polar Bar
description: Welcome to the Great White North! We've brought a taste of the Arctic to the playa. Come chill in our air-conditioned igloo, escape the daytime heat, enjoy a frosty cocktail and bust a move.
landmark: Inflatable white and glowing igloo!

name: Ice Ice Maybe
description: Dive into our colorful tropical island and sea environment featuring Darwin the turtle dome and Glitz the interactive LED jellyfish! Bonus: we have a really big swing.
landmark: green turtle dome, 20-ft swing set, Galapagos sign

name: Hyperbole
description: Hyperbole is a place for dreamers, artists, builders, makers, druids, reptaliens, time travelers, cynics and jokers...
landmark: CNC art of hands

name: In a pickle
description:
You, me, 2 others, some paddles and balls.

That's pickleball.
landmark: 2 large pickleball courts on the edge of camp

name: Candyland
description: Come join the fun at Candyland and have a treat dispensed from antique and homemade candy machines.  Candinistas show you how everyday from 10 am until 6 pm.
landmark: large lollipop discs at the Candyland sign

name: Organic Fruit & Veggie Camp
description: We are an group of givers and doers that offer thousands of pounds of organic fruits and vegetables to the people of Black Rock daily in a small, intimate setting on the far reaches of the playa.
landmark: Large yellow vertical flags that say "ORGANIC"

name: Amulet
hometown: Castro Valley, Pebble Beach, NY, Chicago, Santa Cruz, Oakland, Alameda & SF
description: ROBOTS AND HUMANS all are welcome to craft a brass Amulet- recording your experience, your mark, or a symbol that represents your burn.  Our Amulet counselors will guide you in creating a personal token on a brass dog tag with metal stamped words, numbers & symbols.
landmark: Vertical Gold & Blue AMULET flags outside our dome

name: Nacho Campo
description: Come to Nacho Campo for Luchadors, Ceremony and Fiesta. Experience the art of culture, tradition, spirituality and pleasure in our wrestling ring, you could be the next champion or a pantsless referee.
landmark: Wrestling Ring

name: Camp THREAT
hometown: Black Rock City (San Francisco, CA, USA)
description:
The Warning, Not the Example. 
We are NOT a cult.
landmark: "Located under the Blue Light" "Camp THREAT" sign

name: Camp Homeslice
description: Drop in for a cheerful "Slice of Home"—Playa-style.  Participate in our Experimental Grilled Cheese Theatre, climb the sky-high HomeSlice Tower's inverted pyramids, or re-engineer your Playa duds and gear at our Radical Alteration clinics.
landmark: 30' wood tower (wide bottom & top, narrow middle)

name: Playground
description: Playground is an oasis for the intrepid burner crossing the vast expanse of BRC.  Filled with sights, sounds and music, Playground will entrance and delight with fun, fire and dance.
landmark: The large sound stage with eight towers

name: Ganesh Camp
description: Ganesh Camp is a lush retreat for dusty desert denizens, providing shade and drink noon-5 Mon-Fri to celebrate and beat the heat in the bar in a large, cool desert tent from India; or at night sit by the fire or Engage with the Cosmic Theatre Chronosphere Robotica; or day or night play full court basketball with glow-in-the-dark balls and cheerleading gear or give and receive gifts at the gifting tree.
landmark: Large beige Rajasthani tent; sign for Camp Ganesh

name: Darwin Fish Tank
description: Dive into the Darwin Fish Tank! When you are ready to grow a pair (of legs that is!) climb out of the primordial ooze and beat the heat with our misting system for a genuine adventure in the belly of the beast. Come for the flowing beats, stay and chill within the waves with some liquid joy.
landmark: Giant Aluminet-skinned Fish on the corner

name: Armageddon Bike Camp
description: Armageddon - it's not the end of the world, it's the Safe Word! We offer professional bike repair daily, providing bike-love to the 3:00 sector for over 10 years.
landmark: bmx bike suspended HIGH above our dome!

name: Tropical Lunartics
description: Tropical Happy Hour: Slushy pina coladas, space helmets, spam musubi, and tropical house. Hawaiian shirt attire encouraged; shirts provided for those who need it.
landmark: Wooden Spam can in front of a large dome

name: Entheos Community Village
description: Entheos draws together shamans, scientists, artists, builders, instructors and activists from around the globe who are exploring the healing benefits, and consciousness raising capacity, of the natural entheogenic medicines traditionally used throughout world history. Entheos points to the creative, collaborative spark within each of us, and the divine fire we can ignite when we gather to play and learn together.
landmark: six foot tall lit-up Heart on a 40' tall mast.

name: Bike Gods
description: Bike trouble got ya down? Come visit the Bike Gods, where we practice self reliant bike repair 24 hours a day.  Our camp features 8 fully equipped workstations and spare parts. We have caring and compassionate bike mechanics to assist you M-F 10am-6pm.  Out on the Playa, look for our Bike Gods Taxi Service running yellow tandems and our famous Lanterne Rouge art car.
landmark: Lighted bicycle above bike repair entrance

name: In Case We Miss Each Other
description: We are an Art Support Camp for In Case We Miss Each Other.
landmark: school bus

name: Star Whores Cantina
description:
CMGC - Camp Make Good Choices
Come by the Mos Eisley village and meet us and our cohort!
Fun, games, and inclusive events for ALL!
landmark: Multiple Large Domes/Pagoda-large Mos Eisley Signs

name: Golden Cafe
description: Golden Cafe is your home on the playa for exotic cocktails, home infused liquors, and live music since 2003. Swing by for elegant libations served in real glassware, jam with our house band, and sample strange infusions from our cellars.
landmark: Large White Dome or Pagoda

name: The Moon Cheese Grill
description: Satisfy your hunger with the best late night grilled cheese sandwich goodness served directly to your mouth.
landmark: Large octopus Moon Cheese sign with poofers

name: Milk + Honey
description: Milk + Honey is excited to offer our tenth Playa Shabbat service and dinner which draw on secular and spiritual traditions for the creative expression and collective healing of individuals and communities. We nourish the hearts, spirits, and bodies of all who find themselves wandering in the desert!
landmark: Bright Flags, Big White Dome & Banner on Container

name: Earth Guardians
description: We inspire, inform and encourage our fellow Black Rock City citizens to apply the Green & Leave No Trace principles and practices to life in our temporary desert home and to leave positive traces in our desert home. Come, volunteer and participate in our daily talks about Black Rock and Leave No Trace or just grab a MOOP bag!
landmark: Earth Guardian sign

name: The Institute
description: Visit the Institute of Higher Yearning where our overeducated undermanaged staff will jam in your brain all the science, electro-shock therapy and swordplay that you can take. God created the playa to train the faithful and we will teach you EVERYTHING you need to know.
landmark: Tall white monolith. "The Institute." White dome.

name: BELLIGERENT GAP
description: THE BELLIGERENT GAP is a Western-themed, homebrew camp dispensing cold beer daily (from high noon to whenever we want), served up by the most lovable assholes this side of the 6 o'clock suburbs.
landmark: Look for our swinging doors with the big BG.

name: Hoot 'n Holler Camp
landmark: Metal archway with a giant painted antler rack

name: Tea & Turbans
description: Tea & Turbans provides a space to cool down and relax in the midday heat through a tea ceremony similar to what has been done in the Magreb (North Africa) by the Amazighs (Berbers) for centuries.
landmark: Dome "Tea & Turbans" at Black Rock French Quarter

name: Jungle Oddity
description: Lost in the jungle you'll never know what creature you might discover. Come discover your spirit animal and walk on the wild side!
landmark: Hexagonal climbing tower with 5 green flags on top

name: French Manila
description: Sharing inclusive and shining vibes since 2012! Lovers of trolls, pineapples, and bike gangs.
landmark: French Manila sign in the front of our camp

name: fLOVEida
description: fLOVEida will brighten your morning with a dose of OJ and time to day dream from the comfort of the Everglades Lounge.  Enjoy the good vibes from fellow Floridian and Caribbean Burners who love to make you smile.
landmark: FL State Flag flying above 17' 6" high geodome

name: Brain Freeze Camp
description: Brain Freeze / Got stickers camp will again be serving up frozen margaritas and stickers. Along with our various forms of entertainment, no one will get bored.
landmark: 30' tall flag pole with bright red fireworks flags

name: CampProper
description:
Do you think of yourself as a Proper Burner? Have you always wanted to become a Proper Burner? Stop by CampProper to take your Proper Burner exam and earn your Burner License while enjoying some ProperTea! Think you can pass the exam? Stop by and find out! Oh…and we have some proper beats throughout the week at our ProperTea Dance parties. 

CampProper espouses the virtues of being a proper burner. We are an LGBTQ+ welcoming space for all citizens of Black Rock City who might want to become a little more proper.
landmark: Large letters that read "P R O P E R"

name: Spartan Martians
description: Out and about in the desert, find us - humans  and robots alike - dancing, communing, defying the boundaries of our consciousness aboard the Robot Warrior. Ride alongside our robot SWARM. Perhaps become one yourself. And if you seek to further plumb the depths of whichever consciousness you embody, join us back at our camp. Within our pyramid, find deep relaxation and an even deeper and mystifying incarnation.
landmark: Pyramid!

name: A Touchy Subject
description: Shady Waffle is a full-service breakfast restaurant in a brilliantly colored one-of-a-kind forty foot tall elliptical dome. A machine that converts cranky hippies into happy hippies. Come eat, cool off, relax, and make a stranger even stranger.
landmark: brightly colored, 40 foot tall, elliptical dome

name: Weird Steel
description: Reared In Steel's Camp Fire Ball.  Come shoot some balls of fire from the Flower Tower!
landmark: Giant bouquet of flowers blowing fire

name: Never Never Camp
description:
""You know that place between sleep and awake, that place where you still remember dreaming? That's where I'll always love you, Peter Pan. That's where I'll be waiting."

Never Never Camp is a radically inclusive, radically irreverent, and joyously unabashed group of misfits and discards who just wanted a place to fit in. A place they can call home. A place where for once in their goddamn lives feel like they didn't miss the party.
landmark: Big Ship's Wheel

name: Celtic Chaos
description: CELTIC CHAOS is so unpredictable as to appear random, owing to great sensitivity to small changes in conditions and creations of the universe.   Come join the CHAOS and dance your socks off!!
landmark: Bertie's Bar

name: Mystic Metaverse - MM22
description:
Participants are invited (or dared) to enter through our apocalyptic transportation tunnel where they will be treated to video screens, audio loops, artifacts relaying the downfall of mankind, and the start of something new. Once through the tunnel, guests enter a swanky, otherworldly Piano Lounge and speakeasy.

The lounge features a Robotic Piano that will play any song requested. Come take a turn at the ivories themselves, or test your luck at the Burner Friendly casino tables:  (s)Craps, Poker, and Roulette. The games mimic their real world counterparts with an emphasis on gifting and a few unusual additions.
landmark: Large Bright Purple Beacons, 46ft up in the sky.

name: Space Ninjas
description: "What? I've always been a Space Ninja!!" says anyone who meanders into our relaxing shade tent, sits awhile and pontificates upon the minimalism and agility with which one can relax. Yes, yes, we are indeed quite adept at sitting back and doing less. We can be so good at relaxing, we're basically ninjas at it. Come enjoy some chill-out music, rest from the sun during the day, and enjoy fire puffers and burn barrels at night. Experience one of the signature sensations of being on playa: the warm puff of a sudden fireball above you, the energetic glow dissipating into space but remaining in your memory forever.
landmark: 4 pyramid-shaped tents and fire effects out front.

name: Camp L'Attitude
description: This may or may not be our camp. We may or may not be able to help you. We may or may not look forward to seeing you. There may or may not be snacks (probably not).
landmark: Monument of Indecision Flag- thick neck man

name: Brulee
description: Brulee is your kinky Esplanade camp with 24/7 interactivity, including Bacon Communion and nightly play parties
landmark: 20' structure with the large BRULEE sign

name: Golshan
description:
Camp Golshan is a  international newbie camp
We help the international burner coming to Black Rock City with nothing more than a suit case. Spanish, Mandarin and bad English spoken.
landmark: Driftwood camel or 10 foot mini man

name: Anahasana Village
description: Anahasana Village brings awareness to a fully embodied knowing of the power and the wisdom of our own hearts.  Through movement practices, emotional sharing, dance, yoga, meditation, breathwork and more, we aim to allow for freedom and honesty to be a part of all of our relationships.
landmark: Large Domes, Pinwheel & Aluminet Shade w/Firehose

name: Bumblepuss
hometown: San Francisco, Boston, DC, Boulder, Costa Rica
description: Bumblepuss brings a spa theme to the plays with the addition of the aromatherapy focused Lavender Lounge. Visit and soak in the aromas while you relax in the shade.
landmark: steam bath and lavender dome "unlisted"

name: Afternoon Delight
description: Celebrating endless possibilities of afternoon delights: iced coffee, yoga on demand, a sassy cocktail, a quick snooze...
landmark: Isle of Man flag and sign with camp name

name: Slippery Tentacles
landmark: Octavius Tentacle with lighting at night

name: Brave Heart Brigadoon
description: Brave Heart Brigadoon - Scottish Tea and Kilt sharing extravaganza! Med in skirts! Let's do this!
landmark: 20 foot flag poll with a kilt on it.

name: Kentucky Fried Camp
description: Start your morning with a fried bologna sandwich to coat your stomach & a bourbon shot to rinse the Playa from your throat. We bring sweet Kentucky hospitality, combining elements of sweet down home with a sprinkling of agro/punk for spicing up the scene.
landmark: Glorious red gingham & large KFC sign atop a dome.

name: DeMaTerial
description: DeMaTerial once again returns to the playa—our international diaspora of American, Australian, Kiwi, and other burners from across the globe welcomes you to our fantastic dome. Featuring a Bloody Mary bar in the morning, hot, savory, sometimes truffled fries at random times, Licensing Bureau during the day, and the homiest Christmas on the playa (enquire within).
landmark: 40' Rainbow Colored Dome

name: Sundowners
description: 'Sundowners' is a wonderful South African drinks ceremony honoring life, art and friendship at sunset. Join our community and celebrate the special transition from day to night with safari inspired beverages, music and performances before your night of adventures. During light hours, our Safari Day Spa will soothe your body and lift your spirits with personalized healing, an oxygen bath and rejuvenating refreshments.
landmark: Observation 'tree', lion-logo totem, Airstream.

name: BMIR
description:
BMIR- Burning Man Information Radio  94.5 FM
Black Rock City's official radio station.  The Voice of The Man

Tune it to BMIR for theme camp event announcements, entertainment, traffic, weather, burn info and important official Black Rock City announcements.  We also stream on the internet at www.bmir.org and will start broadcasting live from the playa on Monday 8/20
landmark: The BMIR tower, we are next to Ranger HQ

name: Thunder Gumbo Camp
landmark: Large pirate ship carousel and whale skeleton

name: T-Car
description: Wickedland is a place for you to get in touch with your wicked, creative side. During the day you are welcome to use our photo booth, join one of the art workshops, or just relax in our communal tent with a beverage of your choice. In the evenings we'll have our interactive music machine running which will help you create an original sound track even if you don't have any music background.
landmark: yellow sign WICKEDLAND, glowing cube,pagoda artcar

name: Burners Without Borders (BWB-BRC)
description: Burners Without Borders (BWB) camp is home to participants involved in disaster relief, social impact, civic activation and engagement projects around the world.  We host talks, workshops, a maker space and a nightly fire to bring together our community and create new friendships.
landmark: Giant wings ~18' across, with a BWB logo in center

name: Appropriated Dragon Dim Sum
description: At Appropriated Dragon Dim Sum, we borrow a little from the East and a little from the West to bring you an immersive experience where the greatest gift is sharing.
landmark: Black Rock French Quarter and Walkway and Pagoda

name: Soul Mate
description: Soul Mate (sōl mah-tay) invites friends new and old to join us for funky mate tea cocktails delicious vintage soul music. Revitalize your soul with mate, music, and friendship.
landmark: Wooden "Soul Mate" sign and bright LED light staff

name: ACatemy Ltd
description: The aCATemy, Burning Man's most prestigious cat university, engages students in art, science and philosophy through classes, readings, and fun, cat- and robot-themed making and learning! Come learn strategies for survival under our robot/animal overlords in our decked out cybernetic forest.
landmark: Faux stone archway and large wooden aCATemy banner

name: AMAZONE
description:
AmaZONE camp is a community of Brazilian artists and dream builders. We are an international family creating inspirational and positive experiences.
This year we continue our mission of providing interaction to the city and bring our honoraria art project "The Altar of Intentions". It aims to capture the energy of the Burning Man, thanks to the help of the Masaru Emoto Institute.  The Altar collects intentions of thousands of people and proves that the "reality" is a state of mind.
landmark: The Big Vortex Dome with Canival Customs

name: Arctica Ice Sales- Ice Cubed
description:
Ice Cubed is the ice sales igloo located on the 3 o'clock side of the
city.  This year it is located a few streets back from where you
normally find it.  Crushed and block ice are available for $3 per
bag/block or $18 for a 6-pack of crushed ice.  Ice Cubed sales hours
are Mon-Sat 9am-6pm and Sun Noon-6pm
landmark: big blue and white '3' at G and 3 o'clock

name: Porch Catz
description: Come cat around at Haüs Catz! Stick around for our house music, events, stories and see why we are such a close camp year round. After you've been christened with a cat collar, grab a nipple button and recite the three rules. Sunset Naked Happy Howls, questionable Yoga & decisions, in general - we've got it all! Keep your hands and arms inside the vehicle, but don't forget to maintain thigh contact!
landmark: Wooden House Facade with Two Domes

name: Bunny Meth Lab
description: "More bunny than bunny is our motto" -Dr. Psycho, Blade Hopper
landmark: INSANITY sign

name: Sleazy Beaches
description: Cool butt, you Sleazy Beach
landmark: Seagull Infested Lifeguard Tower

name: Salt House
description: Salt is one of the most important building blocks of life and one of the most important elements playa-goers need to sustain a healthy Burn. Salt House provides the playa with salts of all kinds: homemade salty snacks and drinks, sweaty (salty!) yoga classes, and mind-expanding conversations that conjure the good kind of salty tears.
landmark: Salt House Logo Flag

name: Arctica Ice Sales - Ice Nine
description:
Ice 9 is the ice sales igloo located on the 9 o'clock side of the
city.  This year it is located a few streets back from where you
normally find it.  Crushed and block ice are available for $3 per
bag/block or $18 for a 6-pack of crushed ice.  Ice 9 sales hours
are Pre-Event Saturday and Sunday, Noon-6pm, Event Week: Mon-Sat 9am-6pm and Sun Noon-6pm.
landmark: big blue and white '9' at G and 9 o'clock

name: U.F.O.
description: UFO - home of Ur a Fabulous Organism spa day!
landmark: color changing UFO sign in the living room

name: Camp Mom and Dad
description: First burn, or maybe just an especially rough one? Mom and Dad want you to have a great burn, so we're here for hugs, advice, a healthy snack, or maybe just some tough love.
landmark: Camp Mom and Dad sign

name: Booty Kitchen
description: Booty Kitchen is a place to honor and worship the two most important things in life: food, and booty. We are a group of individuals filled with passion for celebrating the magic that food has to bring people together. We support body positivity and encourage others to celebrate the gifts they are given (both physical and non-physical), as well as the ASSets they recognize in others (in a manner that is safe and comfortable for both parties).
landmark: Sign with two hand-painted bodacious brown booties

name: Fade to White
description:
Lumber-J Camp
Escape from a world ruled by machines and step into a playground challenging human strength and cunning. Look for the plaid and engage a contest or two where dust becomes snow.  Learn some useful knots or join us for storytelling around the campfire.
landmark: White Mail box on street labeled 'Fade to White'

name: Disco Fuck Yourself
description: Disco Fuck Yourself is a camp dedicated to Music, Dance, Self Love, and Self Deconstruction. We will be holding events along this theme including dance parties, fire spin jams, singalongs, and group meditations.
landmark: Disco themed dome

name: Tantra Mantra at Anahasana
landmark: 30' tipi

name: The Carrot Club
description: More Carrot: Sure, you could live off protein bars and MREs all week if you really want to, but how about giving your dusty soul a treat? Come by the More Carrot Camp and get yourself something crunchy, cold and crisp; we gift fresh vegetables and fruit at the More Carrot Camp. Tues. - Fri., 8 - 10 a.m.
landmark: Decorated Farmers Market Stall

name: Heroes & Super Villains
description:
Heroes & Super Villains is an exploration of integrating all the best from the Light and the Shadow in individual, group and societal settings. We offer hospitality for those on their own Hero's Journey, mischievous assignments of intrigue and henchmen for those aspiring Super Villains with visions of taking over the world. 

Open from noon til sunset, drop in for guided meditation, our sophisticated slow bar with craft cocktails, sexy soulful music, missions, therapy and storytelling. 

Friday is our epic SOUL BRUNCH with world class DJs & delicious treats.
landmark: the orange & yellow HSV skull flags

name: Camp Kühloff
description: The shaded oasis of Black Rock City and home of ice-cold lavender towels.

name: The Breakfast Club Village
description:
The Breakfast Club Village Houses,
Scarbutts Coffee-serving hot& cold coffee with brisk Spankings 9am-12noon
Pancake Playhouse- serving hot pancakes 9am-12noon
Pajama Burn-making the least of your burn
Identification Corp- Identifying Robots and Humanoids throughout the universe

name: Cosmic Casbah
description: Cosmic Casbah celebrates diversity and provides to all citizens of Black Rock City. Come visit our magical shade lounge, enjoy our libations, robotics, photo booth, music, and games.
landmark: 15" tall flags lining the corner of 5 & G

name: ZAPHOD
description:
The World War One Flying Ace once said "The Red Baron is wise. He doesn't stay up all night dancing and drinking root beer."  That was a clever ruse. 100 years ago, the legendary Red Baron escaped for a day with his nemesis--the Ace himself--to go drink absinthe and root beer with the bohemians. Some say, he never really came back... 

The Green Hour Root Beer and Absinthe Canteen returns to Black Rock City serving the Baron's legendary original-recipe absinthe to adults during the hour after sunset, and ice cold root beer and other old-timey nonalcoholic refreshments to participants of all ages throughout the day. 

Come visit us to talk about absinthe, meet the fairies, or dunk your whiskers in the coldest ginger beer on the playa, chill with us for awhile and let us help you enjoy your day.   We are a Leave No Trace camp, so, please bring your own drinking container. We do not serve alcohol to minors.
landmark: silver shade structure and Green Hour sign.

name: Intergalactic
description: Journey to a galactic journey, in a faraway universe...
landmark: large black GJ flag!

name: Bring A Pheromone
description: Are pheromones the secret to lasting love and connection? Or, do you just want an excuse to smell a stranger's armpit? Not Sure? Just Bring a Pheromone!
landmark: Red white and blue armpit smelling booth

name: Cornstars
description: Are you corny all the time?  Guess what?  So are we!  Come to Cornstars.  Have a drink at the Silo Bar.  Stuff your cornhole.  Make your own "corn shoot" or "corn film."  Show us your cob, your silk, or whatever kernels you have hiding in your husks!  We're looking for the next Cornstar, and we're set up to feed your corn addiction!  Get corny with us!

name: Spec-Taters
description: Our enchantment with, and disenchantment from, the modern world are not so easy to distinguish from each other - They exist in a reciprocal relationship. Rosa Parks sued Outkast. The key to happiness isn't the search for meaning, it's to just keep yourself busy with random nonsense till you die. A time period called, they want their object back. Nilbog! It's goblin spelled backwards! 7 Minutes!

Visiting The Hanging Gardens means opening yourself up to the possibilities of chance meetings and unexpected adventures.

The upper deck features The Watering Hole saloon where we will serve electrolyte drinks, teas, and good 'ol plain water. Join us for a unique western experience and get re-hydrated before moving on to your next adventure. We can't wait to Saddle Up! with our fellow Black Rock Citizens.
landmark: Fire pit, solar rock lights, and trees.

name: Cascadia Lodge
description: The Parasol Mafia is dedicated to helping you energize and sustain your body, heart, and mind. Enjoy our shaded self care station with essentials like sunscreen, earplugs, chilled flavored water, electrolyte drinks, and other sustenance; groove with us at our reggae/ska happy hours; revitalize yourself in our parasol dome with guided workshops; get funky at our night time dance parties; Love yourself, it's an offer you can't refuse.
landmark: Parasol Mafia sign

name: Shine Town
description: Welcome to Shine Town. Come help us celebrate our 3rd year on playa with awesome moonshine, awesome humans, and awesome experiences.

name: Celestial Alchemy
hometown: 10 Different Countries. US: Denver, NYC, LA, Portland, Bloomington Puerto Rico, New Jersey, Texas, San Fran and more!
description: Camp Anita Cocktail: Hailing from 16+ countries around the globe, we contain traces of Australians, Kiwis, Chileans, Saudis, Turks, Nuyoricans, LA-LA Landers, New Yorkers, and other nutty products from afar. Serious reactions may occur. Activities abound all week in our chill space, craft cocktail bar, tea house, spiritual center and cuddle puddle tower. Our cups runneth over with welcome. Let's get down and boogie together!
landmark: Big Orange Flags, All orange tarps

name: Camp Delicioso & Creperie
description:
Camp Delicioso & Creperie was born 9 burns ago when founding members, Jethro and Zesther, who met for the first time in Black Rock City as virgin campers in 2005, decided to create a camp with their international community of friends, family and foodies from around the globe.

What you'll taste and see are yummy creations of love from a colorful menagerie of Deliciosans cooking and serving hundreds of crepes for campers from every delicious sector on the Playa! 

We genuinely love people and strive to provide a warm, colorful and inviting environment for our visitors—from our beautiful bistro tables to our colorfully decorated dome to our bar and giant lampshade and stage, we strive to create a beautiful oasis in the desert.
landmark: Big Red Lamp Shade

name: Galactic Relay
description: The spaceport of love on the playa.  Home base of Out Of Band III.
landmark: Half plane, Half car, Half love shuttle

name: Future Robots

name: Machine Yearning
description:
Machine Yearning: Why is humans?

Our goal to foster a dialogue about the interface between humans, machines, and the decisions that they make. Members of the camp embody our Deep Yearning algorithm, a parafictional state-of-the-art smart assistant that creates personalized experiences for our visitors.
landmark: Martyville Piano Bar & Malthus mutant vehicle

name: Temple of Unitea
description:
Come and have tea with us!  
Learn Gong Fu cha style tea ceremonies while chilling to tunes and misters.
www.templeofunitea.com
If you want to come and perform a tea ceremony with us let us know!  We take in tea refugees from all over the world.

name: GLAMCOCKS
description: GlamCocks is a global family that was started at Burning Man and is dedicated to creating experiences that bring people together to find inspiration, explore their creativity, and express their fabulous, authentic selves. We believe that creativity, authenticity, and love for yourself and others are critical to having meaningful connections that make life fulfilling.

name: AwesomeTown
description: A camp founded on the principles of radical self-reliance and coordinating group costumes, AwesomeTown once again expects to win Burning Man with Breakfast of Champions, a daily cereal offering served up by cereal mascots in a real 50s-inspired kitchen, just like mom used to make!

name: Synchronicity
description:
Using biofeedback, our aim is to engineer group flow through interactive, multi-sensory community art projects. 

Visual arts
-Easels, canvasses, brushes, paint, paper, and glitter will be provided to participants. 

Music 
-Heartbeats and brainwaves will be digitally channeled and amplified to create a live symphony of the scientific soul: "Biofeedback De La Banda." We will convert your biofeedback data into soundscapes and broadcast your personal frequencies at Black Rock City. 
-Using GPS satellites to synchronize musicians in remote areas without delay, selected participants located throughout Black Rock City will vibe out in a geographically-diverse jam session, synched with our Global Metronome.

Meditation with Biofeedback
landmark: Pink LED lined perimeter and a cotton zebra

name: *cats
description: fearless felines, feeling frantic? feel free to fervently flutter up our fantastically fanciful yet firm fabrication. (please climb on our dome!). comatose cats, come crawl climb or clamber into cool and comfortable cushioned cradles for a cathartic catnap. (we have hammocks, sleep in them).

name: Zendo 6:00

name: Yes Please
description: To the weary and the dreary, we provide an oasis - a place of refuge - that will recharge your batteries, fill your soul with love and leave you calling out "YES PLEASE!"  To the frisky, the floozy, or otherwise freaky, we supply a fertile fellowship of sexual misfits that celebrate all types of consensual carnal connections. To anyone else needing a friend, a word of advice, or maybe just a place to dance the night away, we're here for you too. Come chill in our revitalizing sanctuary, experience our inclusive oasis of sex-positivity, queer empowerment and love. Yes Please is the answer to every question!
landmark: Our flag is a rainbow embracing a heart, on white

name: Golden Buddha
description:
Golden Buddha is a 12th Century Silk Road theme camp focused on consciousness, wellness, and love. There are four main features:
Golden Buddha Tea House: sharing essential oil blends, meditation bracelets and a daily tea ceremony.
Yoga, Meditation: daily guided meditation and yoga practice in the mornings and additional sunset events for playa wellness. 
Speaker Series: we've recruited amazing speakers on subjects such as meditation, love and relationships, and mental and physical health.
Smile High Art Car: an airplane-shaped art car graces our visitors with a full sensory experience. Come enjoy the lights, sounds and energy; leave feeling more enlightened and alive!
landmark: Golden buddha in front of a 20'x30' Moroccan tent

name: Black Rock Brewery
description: The Black Rock Brewery offers daily afternoon tastings that include about 15 different home brews. Cold brewed coffee,hot coffee and tea will be served in the morning hours.

Do you need a place to get away from the pandemonium of the playa? Fur the love of the man, honey! Come join us for our soothing sound healing and aromatherapy session to paws and reflect on your time at the bearn.

For all you young and young at heart we invite you to browse our BOOTique - open daily until the goods run out! Come mend those broken soles at BRC Shoe Repair and enjoy our in-house DJ's spin sets. If your a morningish person try our Lazy Morning Yoga and meet a fellow Tacoman or just snag a little love, we've got plenty to go around.

BLACK ROCK SPATIAL DELIVERY

name: BAAAHS Station
description: The BAAAHS Station village is the framework for several queer burning man theme camps (and mutant vehicles!) to offer a nexus of activity to help facilitate queer art and participation on Playa. Our mission is to get queers out of the 'gay ghetto' and to drag any and all Black Rock City denizens into the our hood to mix things up.

name: The Heart Collective

name: My Reply is Yes!
description: My Reply Is Yes celebrates organic human intelligence and honors our millenia-long search for advice, guidance and wisdom.  Rather than using artificial intelligence to dictate our interests and suggest our next move, My Reply Is Yes allows burners to reveal their own desires, and set their itinerary for the next 7 days or 7 minutes.  We do this with an oversized Ouija Board, a giant Magic 8-Ball, a wise Zoltar booth ready to grant any wish, and a burner-centric Tarot Card reading station.  All your questions will be answered, and it may be you providing the answers!
landmark: Giant Magic 8-Ball

name: Space Potatoes

We are Camp Science Camp. If you love science we'd love to meet you! 

If you ever mixed all the colors of paint thinking they would turn out super cool, we want to be your friends. Come by our camp to learn an alternate color scheme where all the colors add up to white instead of brown. Play with our hands on example of the difference between additive and subtractive color schemes! Dance in the light and maybe have a bit of fun while you're here.

Our art is cooking and hosting our friends !

During the day, come and relax in our lounge or meditate in our dome. We will also offer a variety a day time activities: art and beer, tea and meditation, healing session...

Hometown: San Francisco / Paris

name: Stag Camp

name: Drawn Inn

name: Cuddle Oasis
description:
Too hot? Too cold? Partied out? Need a break? Need a cuddle or two? Or ten?

You've come to the right place.

Cuddle Oasis is bringing you the best chillaxation and rechargation on the playa. Hang with us, stay a while, get misted, do some yoga, take a party nap, rejuvenate your senses with our fresh tropical drinks, and let us liven up your spirits with our chill tropical tunes.

Now you are ready carry on with your burn.

name: Volunteer Village

Come by for daily afternoon activities, featuring specialty drinks (Alligator Bites!), music to replenish your soul, activities to refresh your mind and body, and, the hallmark of any good cult, a soupcon of brainwashing so light you won't notice till it's too late and you're one of us.

name: Priscilla

Priscilla, Queen of the Doof! 
Wait, who is she and what is she Queen of?? 
She is a giant pink bus full of fabulous Australians! 
The Doof is Australian for electronic music party and all the color and sparkles that go along with the scene. 
Priscilla is a big pink party bus full of fantastic party people! 
Come check it out, we are very friendly.

name: PO9
description:
We connect you with the world, we are the ONLY way to get USPS mail to the playa, as we have been for years. We do: USPS to the Playa, Playa to any (international) address with a unique artistic postmark!, and friendly (and not-so-friendly) posties: stand in line, and fill out your form... in triplicate... with crayon.

On-playa updates: http://twitter.com/brcpo9

name: BRC HOA
description: The BRC HOA prides itself on offering a wide range of options for any prospective Black Rock City homeowner. Hydration! Dehydration! Art! Craft! Heckling (the good kind AND the bad kind) and so much more!

name: Steam Bath Project
description: Steam Bath Project offers a playa twist on the ritual cleansing tradition and embraces the possibility of transformation.
landmark: The large solar array.

name: No Bikini Atoll
description: Camp No Bikini Atoll is a enclave of dancers, doers, awareness awakeners, movers, and shakers of shakas. As ambassadors of aloha and purveyors of pacific positivity, we strive to reach the masses with our message of light and love, to perpetuate the energy of collective kindness, understanding, and creativity as we voyage into the waters of the future.
landmark: No Bikini Atoll banner and Lamē Coconut trees

name: Stellar Dusty Moon
description: Stellar Dusty Moon is an out of this world experience that blends artistic expression, live music, performances, and a wide variety of interactive workshops, all with the accompaniment of delicious craft cocktails from our Full Moon Saloon! Our mission is to provide a comfortable environment to get silly, get sexy, and get fun with our galactic visitors, so come get cheeky with us!!
landmark: Stellar Shade Structure!

name: Social Cancer
description:
Social Cancer is an All-Theme Themeless Theme Camp made up of a core of 8 veteran burners and has a total of 14 members. Each member is carefully selected to ensure the "secret recipe" to the flavor of the camp is beautifully blended and complementary to the village in which we reside.

Over the years, we have learned that instead of quantity, we want quality in our camp. That means that every scheduled camp event is always "All Hands on Deck"!  All of the camp members, unless engaged in a volunteer shift, are to be present and contributing to the overall feel of each event theme, including drinks, music, and heckling.   

We strive to make our events as interactive as possible, from personally making each individual drink to the Shenanigans of our Lifeguards urging you to practice "Safety Third!", or our Police Force that will assign you "community service" before you get to enjoy that drink. Each day, we have scheduled events for no less than 4 hours per day.
landmark: 32 ft, multi-colored dome

name: Dr. Carl's Collection of Depts.
description: Dr. Carl's Collection of Departments has diversified to bring you a carefully curated selection of participatory options. With a nod to our past we have created a distinctly smaller version of our big, imposing board of stuff for you to find, do or be. Last year's remote controlled shenanigans will also be available to you the citizens. Should you desire something more thoughtful we are hosting not one but two talks on subjects yet to be divulged. If none of that suits you there's always beer...from the Dumpster Divebar!
landmark: Low and wide porch like structure

name: Malice in Underpants
description: Ocean360   Bringing the Ocean to the Desert with a message of Conservation, Sustainability, Emerging Technologies and Educational Outreach
landmark: Poseidon, Mermaids Fish w/ Helium Marine Balloons

name: JANKY as FUCK
description: Janky as Fuck brings you SPOONS AND TOONS!  Serving up cereal and all your favorite 90's cartoons!
landmark: Black Flags

name: Polegasm
description: Come over to our exclusive facility. We provide the best equipment and instruction there is for creative essence, existential growth, and Polegasms!
landmark: Pole stage well lit! / Large lighted geodesic dome

name: Sensual Pleasures (The Camp for)
description:
The Camp for Sensual Pleasures is dedicated to providing pleasure for women in an environment that's sensual, safe, comfortable & private.  

The well-known Orgasamator Experience is back, enhanced to give women an even more intensely enjoyable experience, and the very popular Eros Tangeré, an Erotic Sensation Performance, is also returning.
landmark: Sensual Pleasures sign within Spanky's Village

name: Piano Bar
description: Come join us for some live piano music!
landmark: Huge pair of eyes on the side of our bus.

name: Mansonian Institute of WWIT
description: The Mansonian Institute 4 Urban Studies celebrates and teaches Burningman history through large graphic informational banners and take-offs of each year's theme with data going back to the first event. Stop by and ask us questions about Burningman history, get some swag and daily events. See our Museum of Burningman Artifacts or artful facts?! It's got to be seen to be believed, or not. Tubatron, the Flaming Tuba Guy, may be firing up also! Tuesday at 1:00 PM there will by Burningman T-shirt transfers – bring a blank t-shirt and leave with a Burningman t-shirt! There will be two Talks –  Wednesday at 5:30 by Will Chase , former Communication Director for Burningman (Jack Rabbit Starts) and Thursday at 5:30 by Nora Adkinson, Curator  Renwick  Gallery Exhibit at the Smithsonian Museum "No Spectators: The Art of Burning Man". Come and learn about Burningman and ask questions/get answers.
landmark: 4'x3' red lit MAN face 25'n air-100' timeline

name: Elliot's Bicycle Service
description: Bicycle repair, full service & DIY.  Also, massage, foot washing, body painting, piano for all to play.
landmark: 40-foot bus with murals on both sides.

name: Bubbly Ever After
description:
Bubbly Ever After is a community of cheeky Happiness Agents that seek to empower people to feel better about themselves in a world that that they are helping to improve.

BEE is looking forward to creating nurturing community experiences that provide healing, abundance, love and authentic connection at Black Rock City and beyond.

+ A Heavenly Shanti Affirmation & Restore Lounge that will be open 24/7 for anyone looking for a place to connect learn and grow in a safe, healthy and friendly space with affirmation stations, pampering and more.
+ A Bubbly Celebration of Life on Tuesday calling all Burner Birthday Babes to come share a toast. 
+A champagne lingerie picnic on Friday. 
+A schedule of talks and workshops on the state of this planet, health, When Robots and Humans Meet, abundance, sustainable systems, trust, self love, mindful leadership, meaningful innovation and more. 
+A sign up sheet for folks who want to host a support group meeting or play some music in our communal space.
landmark: silver balloon dogs + yellow brick path!

name: Bat Country
description: Gonzo Village is where you'll find Miscreants and Bat Country serving up their usual Hunter S. Thompson inspired shenanigans; flames, machetes, explosions, strong drink and bass.
landmark: Flame poofer 3 stories up and Gonzo Fist

name: No Sleep Hotel
description:
You stumble through the night and into a small open doorway, clicking your EL wire off and wiping the playa from your eyes. You blink in the dim flicker of oil lamps, a chandelier swinging overhead. This place seems somehow familiar. 

You have found yourself in the Copper Ruins, a harbor for wayward drifters lost in the dust. Be gathered in and welcomed. Peruse the experiential wares in the Great Hall, catch a glimpse behind the veil of the Copper Theater, and explore what Mystery the night has in store for you. The Copper Ruins--where this time the dream will have you.
landmark: Rustic, Western facade next to Miso Horny

name: Waffles & House
hometown: Los Angeles, San Francisco and New York
description:
The sky's the limit, and welcome about the "747 Experience". entering the 747 aircraft, the largest moving art car ever to grace Burning Man, each visitor will be checked onto the plane, and through the Insecurity Checkpoint where they can receive hugs and praise from our crew members and volunteers. Proceeding further into the 747 fuselage, they will be asked to fill out an Emotional Baggage Tag, to let go of anything holding them back.  Once completed, they hang the tag on the wall of baggage handles. Next, a flight attendant asks them for their destination (where they are going on their journey through life), which will be shared on a Boarding Pass.  This pass is hung onto the Destination wall. Once completed, the traveler is given a pair of airplane wings. 
Come and be inspired, and dream of what is possible, while letting go of the things that hold you back in life.
landmark: Boeing 747

name: Extravafuckingganza
description: Extravafuckingganza
landmark: the various flags surrounding the trampoline/bar

name: Camp Shark Cage
description:
We are a nautical Nicolas Cage theme camp here to help answer the question -- You can cage a shark, but can you shark a Cage?  

(spoiler: we sure did)
landmark: Large blue Camp Shark Cage sign at the curb

name: The Fountain (of youth)

name: Iron Rose

name: SERENDIPITEA

TO UNEXPECTED ADVENTURES AND TEA, IN OUR DUSTY PARADISE.
We focus on celebration of life, awakening transformation and spontaneity with workshops, ceremony and parties with a range of carefully curated dj's to provide a camp that is filled with mystery, excitement and even some delightfully healing gifts. Let us linger in the beautiful foolishness of things, and revel in our playful essence.
landmark: Huge white Camo Shade, Serendipitea flag & Tea Urn

This tiny oasis embraces diversity and serendipity, humbly promises to invigorate passersby and send them back to the mysteries of the playa refreshed and re-energized.
landmark: A gate that says "Welcome to GloryWhole"

name: Carpet Camp
description: The home base for the legendary Magic Flying Carpet, the widely beloved ride enjoyed by thousands for 18 years now.  If you end up swooping in to Carpet Camp after an epic magic carpet ride, feel free to hang out with us in our shady spot.  If you're not lucky, get seduced by some sweet treats from the infamous Free Candy van.
landmark: Magic Flying Carpet and the Free Candy van

name: Never Sleep Again
description: A beautiful house music oasis is created with an elegant dance floor flanked by inviting chill spaces on all sides. We cultivate an environment conducive for fun, love and good times. We an international bunch of dreamers and doers from all walks.

name: Larynx Lounge
description: A cartoon gameshow oasis, providing a wild interactive experience that keeps it surreal. The Price is Wrong, Bitch!

name: DECENTRAL
description: Join DECENTRAL in Anahasana Village to learn more about the Unstoppable Decentralized Revolution that is happening. New tools are empowering communities and individuals to build a new way to live, govern, connect, and exchange with each other. Learn more by joining us at our many talks, in our dome and on the DECENTRAL Stage, and please teach us more about the experiments your communities have undertaken so we can build this new world, together.
landmark: 7 domes in a circle and a kissing booth

name: People of Color Camp
description:
People of Color Camp (POC) is a Melanin kaleidoscope, all hues, all colors, all nations, all religions, and all gender identities are welcome to express their visions. We invite dreams sprung from every corner of the Earth, especially dreams outside of America and those suppressed within it. 

POC is an intentional tribe with an eye on recreating our Playa family in the real world.  

A living experiment in creating a family outside America's socioeconomic defaults. We are a foundation for a peaceful future. Come and build with us!
landmark: Multicolor Peopl of Color Camp sign

name: Dew Drop Inn
description:
I, Reboot 
Let us help you feel human and LOVED. Leave our camp feeling rebooted and ready to play!
landmark: red candy cane striped poles

name: 1001 Nights
description: 1001 Nights is a warmly inviting, casually laid-back, heavily oriental-influenced lounge space. Our variety of community Dome offerings are here to please the masses from starting the day with yoga, sharing love through our unique Makateeb experience, releasing into a delicate cranial sacral massages, transforming your look with a personalized braiding session, withdrawing from the playa commotion for an afternoon Tea laying in comfortable Majlis seating, to dancing the night away under the stars.  We are confident you will enjoy paying us a visit. Artists from all horizons are welcome to flow into the Dome and jam their tunes and share their talents.
landmark: Geodesic Dome with oriental souq decoration

name: Deux Ex Detective Agency
description: The Deus Ex Detective Agency is a theme camp dedicated to bringing the era of hard-boiled 1940's detective noir to the playa. It is both an artistic space to explore and a dramatic interaction with live characters in our fictional world. We provide ambient experiences and planned events, within our theme area and across Black Rock City.
landmark: 1940s-themed noir detective office

name: Arrakis Spice Market
description: The Arrakis Spice Market provides a communal spice market and gathering place and spice-infused cocktail bar. We gift spices and related culinary items and craft cocktails from 1-4 pm Monday-Saturday.

name: Valhalla (inactive)
description: Valhalla is the majestic hall of the god Odin; Chosen by Odin, half of those who die in combat travel to Valhalla upon death, led by valkyries, while the other half go to the goddess Freyja's field Fólkvangr.

name: Stars And Bikes
description: HammerAndCyclery.com is a resource for bicycle-related Playa-prep, how to keep bikes moving in the dust, and what to do with your ride after Burning Man (Give it to us. We'll send it to Africa!). Connect with our camp any time of year, see a list of our on-Playa events, join us in Minneapolis for year-round events, learn our camp story, or support us by renting a bike.

name: Salty Jacks
description: Camp Salty:  Day and night we are the local deep dive bar of the [9:00 neighborhood].  Nautical, underwater themed, we are your safe haven from the fervor of the playa playing R&B, Soul, Blues, Electro-swing, Hip Hop, and Disco.
landmark: Lighthouse beacon

name: Inflation Station
description: Inflation Station provides 24/7 bike tire repair and replacement services which encourage participants to learn bike repair techniques through guided instruction.  Come relax is our shaded bike repair lounge while fixing your bike and enjoy a cold bar beverage while checking out our unique costume exchange area.
landmark: Two bike repair kiosks and bike repair shade tent

name: Good Grief
description: Amid the clouds and dust, a glorious steampunk airship appears on the horizon—Airpusher is returning to dock! Skytown is bustling with activity, ready to entertain, refresh, and resupply voyagers before they set off on their next adventures.
landmark: Anchor in the clouds, Airpusher, & Amphora-stones.

name: Spank the Monkey Bar
description: Wet your whistle at Spank the Monkey Bar, enjoy virgin-burner shots, playa-friendly poontang as well as other refreshing beverages.  They come with free harassment from our assortment of monkey-clad bartenders, we'll try not to throw poo.

name: Gauchos del Fuego
description:
Come by to have some mates every morning and learn how to prepare it the traditional way. Also take home a souvenir fro Fuego Austral, the only regional burn in Latin America.

On Thursday show your Gaucho's skills at the Guachopartooza, a Pampa's Rodeo BRC Style.
landmark: Large Argentina Flag and Guachito Gil Shrine

name: Pink Heart
description: We welcome our robot overlords… but your humanity is still sacred at Pink Heart. Re-calibrate your human body, mind and spirit with chilled cucumber water or vegan ice cream.  Share your experiences (and yourself) on our pink fur couches while gazing upon the open Playa.
landmark: Look for the bright pink shade and art.

name: SnoHo
description: A calming, relaxing, refreshing Oasis, where Burners of every sexual proclivity can enjoy a cold drink, a snack, and a deep conversation stoked by intrusive (yet illuminating!) personal question cards. Come every afternoon for our daily events!
landmark: Rainbow flags, rainbow oasis sign (lit at night)

name: Yurt Cafe
description: Yurt Cafe serves afternoon tea, authenticity, and presence inside a beautiful Mongolian style yurt.
landmark: white canvas yurt with a red sign over the door.

name: Three of Cups
description: Three of Cups
landmark: Look for the tent with the three glowing chalices

name: BLACK ROCK ADVENTURES BUS STOP!
description:
BLACK ROCK ADVENTURES! Magical Mystery Adventure Tours 2X daily, for our Burning Man Community. That means you! We go where  we want to go, sometimes, and where you do too, sometimes. We have room for about 16 people,  priority given to the Mobility challenged, followed by the Walking Wounded and then the Able Bodied, first come are first served. Looking to score some of our tours with musical themes, and such - the ideas we have thus far:
-Grateful Dead Sing-a-Long Tour
-Black Metal Sing-a-Long Tour
- 5 minute Poetry Readings Tour (Read yours or someone else's)
-Nerd Tour
-Silence Tour
-Discovery Tour
-You be the DJ Tour
-DIY Tour
- Bring a paper and Pencil-type thing Tour
Tour Ideas welcome!

Please visit us at www.blackrockadventures.org, send your tour ideas, and see where we will be taking off from - 2X daily!
landmark: BLACK ROCK ADVENTURES! Green flag + silver carport

name: Coyote Club
description: The playa can be exhausting! Need a refuel and some fun? Stop by Something Spacey for the galaxies best Bloody Mary, a crepe made by a Frenchman from Earth, and get a foot soak face mask spa treatment in our SpaceSpa! Come have your galactic passport made and do some dancing with us, then recharge with some Rocket Fuel and a SpaceDilla for your night out!
landmark: Big Top Tent Lit with Stars

name: Beardhaus
description: Beardhaus. Home of the Beard Love.

Overhead water misters and temporary tattoos offered all day and week long.
DIY Essential Oil Body Sprays offered Monday-Saturday from 11 am - 3 pm

name: The Notorious Scoundrels' Club
description: The Secret Gentlemen's Club is a place in which a person—ladies can, of course, be the most Secret Gentlemen of all—be they commoner or king, aristocrat or ruffian, can be the fanciest version of themselves; our mission is to bring manners, culture, refinement, top-notch cocktailcrafting and expert gamesmanship and to this savage land. The Secret Gentlemen's Club politely reminds you that proper attire is required (or will be provided).

name: NuTz Camp

name: Things That Swing
description: We're a lounge and rest-stop for wanderers who want to get off their feet for a while. If you favor a community built on the intimacies of storytelling and consensual touch, if you need a break from bar-crawling and the sonic hypnotics of booty shaking, if swinging is in any way your thing, then this could be your place. With adult-oriented events and play space cuz some of us swing that way too; consent means not being too afraid to ask.
landmark: large porch swing and soccer-ball shaped domes

name: Meow Now
description: Meow Now provides mirror-based interactive art installations, interactive photo-cut-outs, and interactive sound experiences using immersive bass.
landmark: The 4'x6' hi-res photo of two lions having sex

name: Square Zer|o|
description: In an age where even Black Rock City is threatened by the Matrix, the FAFF Lounge provides the antidote to robotic control over your life. Burners are running around BRC in harried straight lines from Point A to Point B like electric squirrels -- overscheduled, and decidedly under-faffed.  The FAFF Lounge disrupts the madness with a space uniquely designed to ritually unravel your expectations in a deeply therapeutic decompression space, the perfect place for burnt-out Type A Burners to faff!
landmark: 25-foot dome close to the street & large FAFF sign

name: Tragic School Bus
description: Campy Camp dedicates itself to daily activities for all BRC campers and supports the playa's unabashed queerness by offering visitors regular summer camp-themed events and experiences that help them sense a place of inclusion, entertainment, and of course the opportunity to earn merit badges -- BRC style.
landmark: Summer camp style wood welcome sign and totem poll

name: Houpla
description:
Houpla is Houston's largest theme camp and part of the Houston Burners non-profit organization. We specialize in bringing new burners to the playa each year and providing friendly, Texas-style hospitality.

Come by to play our hoopla carnival game and win a prize. Put on our homemade robot costumes and take photos. Take a ride with us on our battery-shaped mutant vehicle. Toast marshmallows with us and beat your drum at our fire pit. Hang out with us under our shade structure in our lounge. Everyone's welcome!

After Burning Man, join us weekly on Wednesday evenings at our warehouse space in Houston and at our annual Houston-area regional burn Unbroken Spring in March. Everyone's welcome! Learn more at www.houstonburners.org
landmark: Red and black Houpla sign and Texas flag

name: Camp YNot
description: Everyone Welcome! Interactive all ages games available.  Robot Unicorn Attack, Robot Ring Toss and Robot parts games. Robot parking available.
