name: DISCO PUTOS
description:
We channel happiness. We cherish all kind of self-expression. Listen to your body and share it with us. 
Wanna dance?
Wanna eat?
Wanna sing?
Wanna heal?
Wanna freak out?
Wanna feel?
Come share/dance/feel/act/sing with us putos.
landmark: DISCO PUTOS Flag. .

name: Frogma
description: Frogma is the little theme camp that could, where everyone is your friend and neighbor! Hop on over to our lily pads Monday and Friday at 5:00pm for BRC's one and only Hoppy Hour. Serving up ice cold slushy Frogaritas in our dome sweet dome. You're guaranteed to make a rainbow of connections.
landmark: Large childrens blocks & dome with long red carpet

name: Crashing High
description: crashing high-stamping asses daily ,viewing from scaffolding of brc.
landmark: Coloredlights the shape of a robot

name: Humano
description:
Humano is a place to connect with yourself and likeminded individuals, which use tools such as arts, culture and music to spark human progression.

Humano is an ideology, a place where you can free your mind, your soul can dance and your heart can flourish. A place where we connect in the pursuit of happiness. Happiness here is being free. Free to be yourself, to do any and all things possible.
landmark: Large bamboo 9 meters tall star (bamboo spider)

name: Lovin' Oven
description: Lovin' Oven @ Desert Morning: Greet the morning, and let the smell of our freshly baked bread draw you into our oasis, where we will will soothe your soul and nourish your body.  Since 2011 we've been serving hungry, dusty, lovely Burners hot Tuscan Flatbread, organic jams and fresh mint tea and entertainment with funky DJs and eclectic performances. Our bread is lovingly baked by our campmates in our beautiful wood-fired Lovin' Oven. In the middle of the desert: hot, dry and dusty, we bake bread. Every morning. Just for you! Performers needing a space or anyone wanting to use the oven, please drop by and see us or email us in advance.
landmark: 14' illuminated slice of bread with wings!

name: Mindless Movement
description: Bust open your mind with physically semi-risky and thought provoking activities.
landmark: Large white step-van with rock wall on side.

name: I, ORBOT
landmark: a smaller version of our ORB

name: ConTent
description:
ConTent presents: Beetlejuice Beach Party

Come jiggle your bones back to life at the "Dome of the Dead", or enjoy some activity at the "Volleyball Court for the Recently Deceased"!
landmark: Volleyball court / geodesic dome labeled "ConTent"

name: Camp to be Continued...
description: Camp To Be Continued... is the home of the Art To Be Continued... collective. We enjoy cold beverages, delicious food, good laughs and beautiful art.
landmark: Red painted mailbox and Camp To Be Continued..sign

name: Double Down
description: The Soup Kitchen: We are a group of volunteers/non-profit organization that utilizes littered bikes to make an impact in impoverished disaster zones. Our Camp, The Soup Kitchen is a place where you can soup up your two wheeled steel stallions, pick up your Art Bike Relief bikes for the event, go on crazy scavenger hunts for days or ride a tall bike.  We got all kinds of mischief going down. Find some lights and some spray paint so you can deck out your bikes right.
landmark: Big Ass Bike Sculpture

name: Deep Psyche
description: Deep Psyche is a fun, beautiful, shaded space for Visitors to drop in, grab a snack and cool drink, and give their psyches some reprieve.
landmark: Large white star tent and "Deep Psyche" sign

name: Art Car Camp
description:
Art Car Camp
Come visit with some of the Playa's favorite Art Cars and Mutant Vehicles
landmark: Red Rocket on the dome, Mused cars out front

name: Black Rock French Quarter
description: The heart of the Big Easy come to Black Rock City, including cocktails, bakery, fresh roasted coffee, live music and burlesque, wine cellar, vineyard, Mardi Gras, Jazz Funeral for the Man, and a few other surprises. Our French Quarter buildings are based on an open design that your camp can build to join us. And this year, look for Asiatown!
landmark: Giant Neon Pagoda

name: Heavy Petting Zoo
description: Heavy Petting Zoo Art Car Camp welcomes all species of animals and aliens. Inclusive! Expressive! Welcoming!
landmark: Red & Yellow Animal Cracker Art Car/Mustache Ride

name: The Black Rock Bandits
description:
The Black Rock Bandits are back for a second year with our art-car Azeban, aka The Bandit, aka Trash-Panda! Follow this glowing neon creature across the playa, and experience a musical lineup of funk, disco, dance beats you won't hear anywhere else.  

There is no better way to enhance the magic of the playa than unexpectedly appearing out of the night with lights blazing, or offering rides through the city to its' citizens.   This is a smaller car that will be more approachable and accessible to the public.  We'll have room for at least eight occupants, and at night the car will be an interactive spectacle with improved LED programming.
landmark: Janky Barge or Bandit!

name: Mystopia
description: We're a desert experiment. A French Toast Mecca. A home for mysterious misters. A Burner family that tastes the rainbow: a truly informal family of adventurous friends, partners, parents, children, gays, straights and everything in between. Come play with us!
landmark: Rainbow Colored Neon Mystopia sign

name: The Dirty Chip
landmark: banner with camp name and robot near the street.

name: Straight Outta Wakanda
description: Black Rock City outpost for citizens of Wakanda. A radically inclusive camp celebrating Afrofuturism.
landmark: Red and Green Flag

name: Finer Diner Art Camp
description: Finer Diner Art Camp - A place to rest, refresh, and get your art on.
landmark: Finer Diner Art Camp sign

name: Magic Lantern Society
description: Trading booth, hookah, curiosities, and cocktails. Mysterious delights in store. Chill space open 24/7. Come and find what you're looking for...

name: Goodbye Horses
description: Goodbye Horses is a union of global Burners (USA, Japan, Sweden & Saturn) who have met and connected through Burning Man, regional Burns and local events. We are filmmakers, inventors, circus performers, chefs, rockstars and more. It's a meeting of cultures inviting more--best known for Kernel's World Famous PopCart, home of the best popcorn on the Playa, the one and only original, no bullshit authentic desert C~O~R~N for your grit. NO WOO-WOO LA TURNKEY CORN HERE FOLKS.
landmark: Wooden horses at the gate.

name: GoatFire
description: Multicultural burners mix - come get a lot of fun in the goatrampoline full of screaming plastic goat toys! Fancy some Pétanque as well? we've goat some tournaments and teaching going.

name: The FriendZone
description: The FriendZone is a safe haven for all wayward wanderers, burnt out burners or anyone else needing an escape on the playa. Come find the comfort of the FriendZone if you need an uncharged space to unwind or unravel.

name: Saltkin
description: Salt is survival. Salt is balance. Salt is preservation. Salt is life. The Saltkin invite all of Black Rock City to celebrate, consume, and learn mostly true facts about salt.

name: Awesome!(ville)
description: The home of Awesome!(ness), providing and inviting all to enjoy music, art, performances, and good times.  From crafts events to daily parties, come get AWESOME with us!

name: Vault 21+
description: Welcome To Vault 21!  We've survived the end of the world in our vault and have surfaced hundreds of years later to find a world completely new to us. Luckily we have the booze and the music they all lost when the world ended, so we're here to bring the party.
landmark: Glowing "Vault" sign behind an S shaped bar.

name: V-Spot 3

Get Involved!  Volunteer!
Part of being a good Black Rock Citizen is communal effort.  Not sure how?  Come to the V-Spot and we can show you and plug you in.  We have volunteer opportunities for everyone.  Volunteer to help your community.  Volunteer to help the event run.  Volunteer to help build art. Volunteer to be more involved and a part of the magic.

name: ILLUMINALIA
description:
Sin City's own fire tribe born in 2016 with the sole intent of participating here at Burning Man. We have succeeded for 2 consecutive years so far! 

Illuminalia will be teaching prop manipulation classes this year (fire staff, dragon staff, hoop, poi, rope dart, ect) as well as opening a massage parlor, having tea and cookies, fixing fire tools, and gifting a few things here and there. Come by and say hi!
landmark: The lit up Star & tourqoise & purple jungle dome

name: Beats Boutique
description: Come where love is always in fashion, dancing is a way of life and every person you know is waiting. Grab some beautiful threads, have a drink and dance till there's holes in your shoes. This camp is devoted to turning your energy UP!! We will have Beats Droppin, Booze Flowin and a Boutique to enhance your style on the playa! Our positive and loving vybes will make your stay at our camp epic!
landmark: 26' tall Circus type tent with colorful spandex

name: Honey Puddle
description: Honey Puddle is your shimmering golden oasis wherein chill vibes, brilliant live music, and masterfully brewed honey wines (meads), craft beers, and cocktails await. Come enjoy our people, our drink, our welcoming, warm, intimate cuddle puddle

description: Welcome to Planet Awesome!

name: Aruna Fire Camp

name: My Monkey, My Circus
description:
Come one, come ALL! Awaken your inner flow artist! Self expression in the kinetic form! Renown Flow Masters! Sages with wisdom of health! Thinkers and Tinkers! YOU!
Take a class, teach a class. Watch a show, show n' tell! Experience the core principals like never before!

name: Voodoo Shooting Gallery

name: Utah Fire Tribe
description: Utah Fire Tribe home to lovely fire folk and a few assholes. Music, lights, and fun. Just be sober if you wish to play with fire with us.

name: Que Viva!
description: Que Viva! is a Burning Man camp of activists and artists of color dedicated to social justice and radical inclusion, bringing issues like racial justice and immigrant inclusion to the playa in a celebratory and magical way. Our camp leads hands on art workshops for Burners of all ages, hosts compelling art installations about human rights issues, facilitates workshops and group discussions about race and inclusion, and serves as a relaxing chill space for Burners.
landmark: Look for the butterflies on the shade structure

name: BLD
description: The BLD Village
landmark: Colorful flags on bamboo poles every 5 feet

name: What Camp
description: Do you hate yoga, meditation, and coffee? So do we! Come by so we can talk about it.
landmark: Spread the Love Booth (table with sign)

name: Bao Village
description:
Come see the BaoChickaWowWow village, find rest in the shade and taste our buns: fresh steamed-to-order pork, red-bean and veggie bao (chinese dim-sum buns).

Join us for BrunchBao, NightBao or the food themed Far East Night Market!
landmark: 20 ft+ Dome, dressed like a white dim-sum pork bun

name: The Arcognomies
description: An arts support camp for the Honorarium Project "Luna Flora", a 15 foot tall blooming lotus with a moon at her center.
landmark: Bamboo front fence and 2 domes, purple and white

name: Kinesios
description: We are an art support camp for Kinesios.  We are here to answer questions about our art, discuss the nature technology in our lives, generally philosophize about the nature of life, or just shoot the shit  and, if there's enough interest, we'll even go out with you for a tour.   And of course if you helped make Kinesios a reality we'll be giving out the best hugs on the playa.
landmark: Not sure at this point, can we provide later?

name: DISTRIKT - Bike Battalion
description: DISTRIKT - Bringing art & beats together - A rambunctious playa day party of vociferous beats from live DJ's, original art, and luscious blended libations from a shaded bar.  Your daytime dance, debaucherous and disorderly, DISTRIKT. You, our guests, are also our performers so BRING IT!
landmark: DISTRIKT Bike Battalion Parking Signs

name: Sparkle Donkey Village
landmark: Climbable wooden towers and 2 big 40' trailers.

name: Deep Orbit
description: This year Deep Orbit is our base for providing support to our art, EI-Robot, which will be performing live art on Playa building 4-foot diameter illuminated steel sculptures in real time.
landmark: Deep Orbit Sign and Wind Turbine

name: Camp One New Earth aka Camp ONE
description:
Camp ONE is calling upon all i-Robots, wisdom keepers; from global indigenous tribes, leaders and creators of all ages from various facets of our modern world. We believe the creation of a new earth is interdependent on the co-operative efforts of those passionately leading the way to what is sustainable and regenerative. We invite you to share knowledge, tell stories, sing, and drum around sacred fire. Join in performing the largest dance circle with our Native American families. Learn from a wide array of available classes with topics in health, sciences, finance & alternative currencies, technologies, and more - you would not want to miss! Share your vision and mission with everyone as we compile them to inspire generations -in years to come!

Camp ONE is here to facilitate global-wide co-operation and co-creation to manifest a true sustainable future and harmony with all life on our home planet - Earth. A family that burns together, stays together! 

“We are all indigenous because we are borne from the same Earth. We are ALL wisdom keepers  - We trek different roads leading to the same destination ~ H. Angeles
landmark: Medicine Wheel w/ fire pit (center) and 8 tipis

name: Zen as Fuck
description: A shady place in your mind. An important step on your path to enlightenment is to stop by, relax and give your face an ego melting Dunkaroo. You'll leave wondering, "Who am I?"
landmark: Volleyball Net

name: Miscellaneous Heathens
